jobs.Job_Description:
As a Network Analyst in our Tier 2 IT Helpdesk Team, you will play a crucial role in ensuring the smooth functioning of our client network infrastructure. You will be responsible for diagnosing, troubleshooting, and resolving a wide range of wireless and wired network connectivity issues, network printing problems, and audiovisual (AV) device issues reported by end-users. This role is pivotal in providing high-quality support to our clients.
Our ideal candidate is highly autonomous, possesses effective written and verbal communication skills, a strong sense of ownership, adapts quickly to new technologies, and has high career growth potential. The desire and ability to work in a fast-paced, collaborative environment is essential.

Essential Functions: 
Diagnose and resolve wireless and wired network connectivity issues promptly and efficiently.
Troubleshoot and address network printing and AV device problems reported by end-users.
Utilize knowledge base (KB) articles and documentation to effectively resolve issues.
Escalate unresolved issues to the Network Operations Center (NOC) Resources and other technical teams as per established procedures.
Collaborate with Tier 1 support and other teams to ensure timely issue resolution.
Provide clear and concise technical documentation for issue resolution steps.
Maintain up-to-date knowledge of networking concepts and devices.
Participate in network infrastructure improvement projects as needed.
Leverage monitoring systems to effectively identify outages or network degradation.
Develop and maintain consistency within the networking infrastructure standards and documentation.
Troubleshoot and remedy network related issues.
Ability to participate in a regular on-call rotation.
Analyze complex business problems and issues as it relates to enterprise network infrastructure.
Provide technical guidance to IT professionals and members to correct issues encountered with network software & connectivity.
Manage the needs of multiple customers, prioritize needs and manage the daily workload.
Assist with internal projects as necessary, and work with project managers to set the scope and timelines of new projects to meet completion deadlines.
Interface with all levels of employees internally and within client businesses to support engagement requirements (business owners, project managers, customer employees, and executive management.
Write technical procedural documentation for co-workers and for delegated tasks.

Required Education, Knowledge, and Experience: 
Bachelor's degree in Information Technology or a related field is preferred.
Minimum of 2 years of experience in handling wireless and wired networking issues from end-users.
Strong knowledge of networking concepts, protocols, and devices.
Proficiency in configuring and troubleshooting routers, switches, and access points.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English.
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
Ability to work effectively both independently and as part of a team.      
A practical understanding of network protocols, including IP and related transports, BGP, EIGRP and OSPF.
A practical understanding of network hardware internals, including forwarding, filtering, and policing mechanisms.
A practical understanding of application protocols, including DNS, IPSEC, HTTPS, and TLS.
Familiarity with network hardware and software, preferably including Brocade, Cisco (IOS, NX-OS) with CCNA, JNCIA certification preferred.
Understanding of wireless protocols.

Abilities and Skills:
Ability to adapt to a changing technical environment.
Ability to communicate clearly with all team members and end-users.
Ability to work with a sense of urgency.
Self-directed and sufficient.
Ability to analyze complex business systems and proprietary application configurations, document the configurations and processes, and support them as needed.
Ability to prioritize and manage competing demands and tasks, and successfully manage multiple engagements that may require additional resources.

Physical, Mental Requirements and Work Environment: 
Must be able to work in a fast-paced environment.
Must be able to input data into computer systems.
Must be comfortable working in nightshifts.
Must be comfortable with rotational week-offs.

Equipment Used: 
Computer
Headset

Conditions of Employment:
Must successfully pass pre-employment (post offer) background check and drug screen.

jobs.Skills_Required: Cyber Security, IT Audit, ISO Implementation, ISO Audit, ISO Documentation, Compliance Management, Asset Management
jobs.Job_Description:
Position Overview:
As a Cybersecurity Auditor, you will play a critical role in evaluating and assessing the security posture of an organization's information systems, networks, and infrastructure. You will conduct thorough audits to identify vulnerabilities, analyze security controls, and ensure compliance with industry standards and regulations. Your expertise will contribute to enhancing the overall security resilience of the organization and safeguarding its valuable assets.
Key Responsibilities:
Perform Security Audits: Conduct comprehensive security audits of information systems, networks, and technology infrastructure to identify vulnerabilities, potential risks, and compliance gaps.
Compliance and Standards: Evaluate and ensure adherence to industry standards, best practices, and regulatory requirements such as ISO 27001, NIST, GDPR, HIPAA, PCI DSS, etc.
Fulfill local authorities' cybersecurity compliance requirements by fulfilling technical and administrative control that includes certifications, asset management, setting policies, procedures and strategy.
Risk Assessment: Assess the effectiveness of security controls, risk management processes, and incident response plans to identify areas of improvement and potential risks.
Vulnerability Assessment: Conduct vulnerability assessments and penetration testing on systems, applications, and networks to identify weaknesses and recommend remedial actions.
Audit Planning and Execution: Develop audit plans, execute audits, and provide detailed reports with findings, recommendations, and remediation strategies.
Security Policies and Procedures: Review and evaluate the organization's security policies, procedures, and guidelines to ensure they align with industry standards and best practices.
Security Awareness and Training: Promote cybersecurity awareness throughout the organization by conducting training sessions, workshops, and providing guidance on secure practices.
Collaborate with Stakeholders: Engage with various teams, including IT, risk management, compliance, and legal, to gather information, validate findings, and ensure alignment with organizational objectives.
Stay Updated: Keep up-to-date with the latest industry trends, emerging threats, and technological advancements in cybersecurity to enhance audit techniques and knowledge.
Requirements:
Education: bachelor's degree in computer science, Information Systems, Cybersecurity, or a related field. Relevant certifications such as CISSP, CISA, CISM, CEH or similar are highly desirable.
Experience: A minimum of 3 years of experience in cybersecurity, information technology, or audit-related roles, with a focus on security assessments and audits.
Strong Knowledge: Deep understanding of cybersecurity principles, standards, frameworks, and regulations. Proficient knowledge of network security, operating systems, databases, and cloud environments.
Audit and Assessment Skills: Experience in conducting security audits, vulnerability assessments, risk assessments, and penetration testing. Familiarity with audit methodologies, tools, and frameworks.
Compliance Expertise: Demonstrated experience with compliance requirements and standards such as ISO 27001, NIST, GDPR, HIPAA, PCI DSS, etc.
Knowledge in United Arab Emirates Cybersecurity regulations is plus.
Analytical Thinking: Strong analytical and problem-solving skills to identify security gaps, assess risks, and provide effective recommendations for remediation.
Communication Skills: Excellent written and verbal communication skills to prepare detailed reports, present findings to stakeholders, and provide guidance on security best practices.
Attention to Detail: Meticulous attention to detail to identify vulnerabilities, evaluate security controls, and validate compliance with policies and standards.
Collaboration: Ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams, build relationships, and influence stakeholders to prioritize security initiatives.
Continuous Learning: Proactive attitude towards self-learning and staying updated with the evolving cybersecurity landscape.

jobs.Job_Description:
Pro-Riterz is a 360-degree content marketing agency and we're on a lookout for OUR VERY FIRST Business Development Executive (BDE) experienced in end-to-end sales for IT/Digital marketing agency (mandatorily)

This is a target-based position where your primary focus will be driving sales and securing new clients in digital marketing sectors. During the two-month probation period, you will be offered a base salary, with the potential for your earnings to triple based on performance.

Afterall, will we ever mind to pay you in lakhs if you can generate that scale of business for us? ;)

Our vision is very clear, we want someone who believes that 'Marketing' industry is ruined by low-ballers. We want to build a system of data-driven decisions to make, ultimately a company, where everyone grows- be it our clients or our pillars, our team mates. We all should and must grow.

Responsibilities:
Target Achievement: Meet or exceed monthly sales and lead generation targets during the probation and beyond.
Prospecting: Identify and connect with potential clients in the IT and digital marketing industries through cold calling, emails, and networking.
Relationship Management: Build and maintain strong client relationships, understanding their business needs and presenting tailored solutions. You might need to attend local meetups and networking events in Kolkata or across India
Sales Funnel Management: Maintain an active pipeline of leads, ensuring consistent follow-ups and deal closures.
Market Research: Stay informed about industry trends, client pain points, and competitor offerings to refine sales strategies.
Proposal Development: Prepare compelling proposals and presentations to pitch our services, proposals and presentations to pitch our services effectively.
Collaboration: Work closely with internal teams to ensure a smooth onboarding process for clients.
Reporting: Provide regular updates on sales progress and strategies to management.

Qualifications:
Sales Experience: Proven experience in sales, especially in IT or digital marketing sectors.
Target-Driven Mindset: A strong focus on achieving and exceeding sales targets.
Networking Skills: Exceptional interpersonal skills with the ability to build connections and uncover opportunities.
Industry Knowledge: Familiarity with IT services, digital marketing solutions, and customer acquisition processes.
Communication: Excellent verbal and written communication skills, including presentation and negotiation abilities.
Self-Starter: Ability to work independently, take initiative, and thrive under pressure.

What We Offer:
Probation Period: A basic starting salary for 2 months, with clear & EASIEST performance targets.
Performance-Based Growth: Achieve results, and we're ready to triple your salary post-probation.
Career Growth: Join a fast-paced industry with significant room for professional development.
Supportive Environment: Collaborative team culture to help you succeed in meeting targets.
Ad hoc team activities: We spend heartily on yearly trips, lunches and quick meetups all on us ;)

Preferred Candidates:
Proven track record in meeting or exceeding sales targets.
Experience working with IT or digital marketing services.
Confident networkers who excel at uncovering opportunities
outgoing attitude.

IF you're in for a challenge, and ready to shoulder the responsibility of being the first official BDE of the team, please apply and we'll schedule a call within 3 days!

Job_Title: Freelance Business Analyst
Location: Remote
Company: Ntrix Innovations Pvt Ltd
Duration: Project-based (with potential for long-term collaboration)
Payment: Competitive/Hourly Rate/Fixed Price

About the Role: We are seeking a highly skilled and self-motivated Freelance Business Analyst to join our team on a project basis. The ideal candidate will be experienced in analyzing business processes, gathering requirements, and providing actionable insights to improve efficiency, effectiveness, and overall business performance. As a freelancer, you will collaborate closely with stakeholders to understand business needs and translate them into clear, structured documentation and solutions.
Key Responsibilities:
Business Analysis: Identify and document business requirements, goals, and pain points from stakeholders, both technical and non-technical.
Process Mapping: Design and document business processes, workflows, and systems using industry-standard modeling techniques (BPMN, flowcharts, etc.).
Requirements Gathering: Facilitate workshops, interviews, and surveys with stakeholders to gather and prioritize business requirements.
Data Analysis: Analyze historical and current business data to identify trends, bottlenecks, and areas of improvement.
Solution Design: Collaborate with the development team to translate business requirements into functional specifications.
Documentation: Prepare comprehensive business analysis documentation, such as requirements documents, user stories, and use cases.
Reporting: Provide regular progress reports to stakeholders and recommend strategies for achieving business goals.
Testing: Assist with user acceptance testing (UAT), ensuring that the developed solutions meet business needs.
Skills & Qualifications:
Proven experience as a Business Analyst or in a similar role in diverse industries.
Strong knowledge of business analysis methodologies and techniques.
Experience in requirements gathering, process mapping, and gap analysis.
Familiarity with project management and collaboration tools (e.g., Jira, Trello, Confluence).
Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
Ability to work independently and manage multiple tasks within tight deadlines.
Experience with data analysis and visualization tools (e.g., Excel, Power BI, Tableau) is a plus.
Familiarity with Agile and Scrum frameworks is highly desirable.

jobs.Skills_Required: Upselling, Cross Selling, SAAS, Account Management, SMB
jobs.Job_Description:
Business Unit: Global Business Direct
Customer Segment: SMB- North Americas , Shift Timings - 6:00 PM - 3:00 AM
Adobe Solutions: Adobe Digital Media Solutions
Location: Remote

Adobe

Changing the world through digital experiences is what Adobes all about. We give everyone from emerging artists to global brands everything they need to design and deliver exceptional digital experiences. Were passionate about empowering people to create beautiful and powerful images, videos, and apps, and transform how companies interact with customers across every screen.
We’re on a mission to hire the very best and are committed to creating exceptional employee experiences. We realize that new ideas can come from everywhere in the organization, and we know the next big idea could be yours.

We are looking for Digital Sellers who would be responsible for a defined patch of Adobe’s SMB customers and the role is pivoted around upselling and cross-selling Adobe Cloud based Solutions. You would be responsible for the Digital Media portfolio of Adobe. The incumbent would be responsible for helping the customer adopt the solution with ease, optimizing their product experience and guiding them to internal support teams if need be.

What you’ll do as a CSAM

Develop understanding of Adobe's Digital Media line of products and lead with value-led conversations with customers for these solutions.
Create a value-based relationship with new & existing North American Adobe SMB customers.
Drive Up-sell & Cross-sell by prioritizing accounts with highest propensity to buy by clearly defining ideal customer profile and contact them via phones & emails.
Execute Marketing Qualified Leads with a defined SLA to maximize Revenue.
Research customer contracts and purchasing history in Adobe's various customer management systems & external sources such as LinkedIn, ZoomInfo, etc. to figure out the expansion opportunity in an account
Managing the opportunity pipeline from week to week, providing accurate and timely updates to management on progress and outlook.
Collaborate with Solution Specialists to maximize footprint of growing Adobe Solution streams like Adobe Sign, Substance, Stock, Frame.io, etc.
Engage as required, with the supporting functional teams to resolve issues raised by customers related to their Creative Cloud Subscriptions.

What you need to succeed

SMB Segment exposure and proven ability to manage a large customer set
3+ Years’ experience in a similar role, with experience in selling SAAS solutions preferred
Excellent communication Skills, both oral and written
Flair for Technology and ability to lead a customer conversation with value-selling rather than product features pitch.
Demonstrated ability to be a quick learner. Task oriented with focus and drive to complete tasks at hand.
Strong organization, follow-through and documentation skills suitable for customer communication.
International Sales Experience with exposure to NA markets preferably.
Working hours will coincide with the US Time Zones
Bachelor’s Degree or Equivalent

Get to know the team

Adobe’s Digital Media Business Unit

Adobe’s Digital Media Business Unit focuses on advancing state of the art content and driving digital transformation of industries. It provides tools and services that enable individuals, small businesses, and enterprises to create, publish, promote, manage and monetize their content anywhere through the Adobe Creative Cloud and Document Cloud.
Adobe’s creative and document solutions are used by designers, photographers, filmmakers, content publishers, storytellers, UX designers, knowledge workers, consumers and more. Through our connected apps and services, customers have all the tools and assets they need to create and manage content across desktop and mobile devices.

jobs.Job_Description:
Job_Title: Midlevel NodeJS + ReactJS Developer
Contract: (1yr Auto Extendable)
Work mode : Remote
Experience: 3+ years
CND-based location: Mumbai, Delhi, Chennai, Bangalore, or Pune (any one of the mentioned locations)
Job Description:
As a AWS NodeJS Developer (Full Stack), you will play a pivotal role in designing, developing, and maintaining our web applications using NodeJS (backend) and ReactJS (frontend). You will work closely with cross-functional teams to ensure the seamless integration of front-end and back-end components, delivering exceptional user experiences. The ideal candidate will have a strong foundation in software development, a keen eye for detail, and a passion for keeping up with emerging technologies.
Responsibilities:
Collaborate with product managers, UI/UX designers, and fellow developers to design and implement robust software solutions.
Participating in daily standup, sprint planning, retrospective meetings during project implementation phase
Develop responsive and user-friendly front-end interfaces using ReactJS, ensuring optimal performance across various devices and browsers.
Design and implement RESTful APIs and back-end services using NodeJS to support front-end functionalities.
Participate in code reviews, providing constructive feedback to maintain code quality and best practices.
Identify and address technical debt, performance bottlenecks, and other development challenges.
Work with databases and data models to ensure efficient data storage, retrieval, and manipulation.
Stay up to date with industry trends and emerging technologies and propose relevant improvements to the development process.
Skills
Proven experience (min 3+ years) as a Full Stack Developer with hands-on expertise in NodeJS and ReactJS.
Familiarity with the NodeJS frameworks (e.g. Express, NestJS) and design/architectural patterns (e.g. Microservices, Model-View-Controller (MVC) and Middleware)
Strong understanding of web development fundamentals, including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Experience with front-end state management libraries (e.g., Redux) and front-end build tools (Vite, Webpack, Babel, etc.).
Proficiency in designing and consuming RESTful APIs.
Solid knowledge of database systems, SQL, and data modeling.
Proven experience in creating quality SQL store procedures and scripts
Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git) and agile development methodologies.
Excellent understanding of OWASP standards
Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to work effectively in a collaborative team environment.
Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal.
Experience using IDE tools like Visual Studio.
Familiarity with the .NET and .NET Core framework is a plus.
Education and Certification
Bachelors or associate degree in IT discipline
Certification in AWS (AWS Certified Developer Associate or equivalent) is a must.

jobs.Job_Description:
Overview:
We are seeking a motivated Sales Engineer with excellent communication skills and a background in mechanical, civil, electrical or construction engineering or construction sales. This role is ideal for an engineer/construction sales associate looking to transition into a dynamic software sales focused position. The successful candidate will be responsible for supporting our sales team, acting as the technical expert to facilitate communication between the customer and the estimating team, clarifying technical details, and ensuring seamless operations in alignment with US timings.

Responsibilities:
Communication Facilitation:
Represent the organization on customer calls to clarify technical queries and provide detailed explanations of our offerings.
Collaborate with sales representatives to understand their needs and effectively communicate product updates and construction knowledge.
Create and maintain clear and concise communication channels, ensuring vital information reaches the sales force promptly.
Develop training materials, presentations, and documentation to assist in conveying complex technical information to sales professionals.
Technical Expertise:
Utilize your engineering background to comprehend intricate technical details of our products or services.
Translate technical jargon into comprehensible content for sales personnel, enhancing their ability to articulate product benefits to potential clients.
Communicate customer requirements clearly to the estimating team
Contribute to product development by capturing and evangelizing needs expressed by the client.
Sales Support:
Assist in the execution of sales strategies by providing valuable insights garnered from technical expertise.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams such as operations, product, and customer support and the sales team.
Ensure success in enterprise pilots with prospective customers
Time Zone Alignment:
Maintain availability and flexibility to work within US timings to ensure effective communication and support for the sales team based in those time zones.

Qualifications:
Should be comfortable with Night Shifts (US Time Zone)
A degree in mechanical, civil, construction, or electrical engineering or experience in construction sales
Strong communication skills, both written and verbal, with the ability to simplify technical information for a non-technical audience.
Eagerness to transition into a SME role and contribute proactively to the sales team's success.
Ability to represent the organization on customer calls, clarifying technical details effectively.
Ability to adapt to US timings and work collaboratively across different time zones.
Strong organizational skills with the ability to multitask and prioritize assignments effectively.
This role presents an excellent opportunity for a motivated individual with an engineering background to leverage their technical knowledge in a sales-focused environment. If you are passionate about communication and , and seek a challenging yet rewarding career disrupting the construction software industry, we encourage you to apply and be a part of our dynamic team.

jobs.Skills_Required: EDI, Order Processing, Order Management, Inventory Management, E-commerce
jobs.Job_Description:
As our Order Fulfillment Associate, you will be directly responsible for the processing of all our online orders in a timely fashion so that we guarantee same day shipping to help the company grow our sales. Today, our customers expect fast shipping as a basis for placing an order. As a result, your performance will be critical in getting all of our messaging right, and assisting the customer in making their decision to buy our products.

We are looking for a team player who gets excited being organized, loves working methodically and deeply, and is not afraid to roll up their sleeves. Our ideal candidate loves to be on top of things and working with other people.


What you will do
Process customer orders through our EDI
Create sales orders and invoices in Sage 300 ERP
Process online orders from warehouse and ensure that orders are properly picked and prepped for shipment to customers in a timely manner for best customer satisfaction
Update inventory using transaction manager EDI and various customer websites.
Reconcile outgoing shipments.
Review and manage shipping lead time and delivery time performance of key accounts and work with respective Internal Teams and External companies (Warehouses and FedEx/UPS).
Manage delivery performance issues gather data and analyze data, communicate with carriers as well as warehouses
Monitor inventory levels and submit orders to the various warehouses.
Communicate with warehouses regarding tracking updates and shipments
Communicate daily with various internal teams (fulfillment, customer service, warehouse, logistics, finance, e-commerce)
Review any order processing issues
Ensure that any order or shipping delays are addressed and corrected immediately
Ensure orders are shipped out as promised by reviewing reports at the end of each day
Manage reporting to verify all e-commerce orders have been fulfilled by the order ship date
Communicate any shipment delays or order issues to the warehouses and e-commerce retailers
Work in our ERP system to ensure orders are closed out daily


Does this sound like you?
Self-starter working in an entrepreneurial environment
Minimum of 2+ years experience as an Order Fulfillment Associate
Bachelors degree in relevant subject
Ability to manage many conflicting priorities in a fast-paced environment
Highly Detail oriented
Excellent organizational and planning skills
Excellent professional written and verbal communication skills
Excellent teamwork skills
Excellent computer skills including Microsoft Word, Excel with exposure to databases and statistical analysis software.
Proven ability to influence cross-functional teams without formal authority
Ability to work well under pressure, multitask, and maintain attention to details
Ability to manage many conflicting priorities in a fast-paced environment
Good Time management
Ability to be customer-oriented
Ability to work to strict deadlines


Why Work with Us?
Simpli Home is fast paced entrepreneurial company committed to excellence and innovation. Our mission is to move fast with the goal of creating unique affordable beautiful furniture. We are a rapidly growing company filled with great people all over the world. You will be working with a team of exceptionally committed and talented partners who want to see you succeed.
As an international company, we have employees located all over the world. This role will be a remote role located in India.

To Apply:
We are a respectful workplace committed to building a skilled and diverse workforce. We believe in fostering an inclusive work environment where all individuals have an opportunity to succeed. We welcome and encourage applications from everyone.

jobs.Job_Description:
Job Summary:

We are looking for a creative and strategic Social Media Strategist to develop and implement social media strategies that drive engagement, increase brand awareness, and boost online presence. You will manage our social media channels, analyze performance metrics, and collaborate with internal teams to create a cohesive digital strategy. The ideal candidate is an innovative and creative thinker with a deep understanding of social media platforms, trends, and analytics.

Role & responsibilities
Develop and execute effective social media strategies aligned with business goals.
Manage day-to-day content creation, posting, and scheduling across all social media platforms (e.g., Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, Twitter etc.).
Stay up-to-date with current trends, hashtags, and updates on all social media platforms.
Monitor social media engagement and promptly respond to comments, messages, and reviews.
Collaborate with internal teams (e.g., design, content, and marketing) to ensure brand consistency across all channels.
Analyze and report on social media metrics and adjust strategies based on insights to improve performance.

jobs.Job_Description:
For company profile please visit https://www.bluearcus.com/

Blue Arcus Technologies is the most reliable network partner and delivers telecom solutions targeting Urban, Rural and Remote communities with 3GPP-compliant interface capabilities. We offer 2G/3G/4G/5G solutions with high-speed connectivity, superior coverage, enhanced trusted security, performance, smooth integration, and cost-effective network services. We use practical and application-based on-field expertise to create successful project schedules in implementation and management. Our future-proof telecommunication network software services enable people to be connected anytime & anywhere. At Blue Arcus, we liberate our customers to manage and in turn leverage robust telecommunications networks, The optimal use of technology translates to churning the best potential of business ventures.

We are looking for a skilled Tableau/MySQL Developer to join our team and help manage and develop Tableau dashboards, data pipelines, and reporting solutions. The ideal candidate will have hands-on experience with Tableau dashboard development, SQL queries, and database management (particularly MySQL), as well as a strong ability to analyze and visualize data to support business decision-making.
In this role, you will be responsible for managing customer dashboards, ensuring the accuracy of data, resolving issues with reports and systems, and providing training and support to both internal teams and customers. You will work closely with cross-functional teams to ensure that data and insights are easily accessible and actionable.


Key Responsibilities:

1. Data Analysis and Reporting
Develop, maintain, and deliver monthly reports for customers, summarizing key metrics related to revenue, network performance, and other relevant KPIs.
Generate ad-hoc reports as required by internal teams, management, and clients (e.g., revenue reports, aged debtors, postpaid bill runs).
Assist in the creation of custom reports (e.g., recharge card revenue, user payments) based on client-specific requirements and business logic.
Prepare and present reports summarizing analytical results and insights for business stakeholders.
2. Tableau Dashboard Development & Maintenance
Design, develop, and maintain Tableau dashboards for customers and internal stakeholders, ensuring they are visually appealing, user-friendly, and aligned with business requirements.
Perform manual dashboard refreshes as required to ensure data accuracy and timeliness.
Implement enhancements and updates to existing dashboards, including new graphs, UI changes, and sections, based on customer feedback and evolving business needs.
Customize Tableau visualizations to meet specific business requirements, utilizing Tableau features such as calculated fields, table calculations, filters, and actions.
Monitor and resolve any discrepancies or issues in Tableau dashboards and underlying data sources.
3. Database Management & SQL Development
Manage and maintain MySQL databases, ensuring data integrity, efficient queries, and timely updates.
Perform data cleansing, validation, and transformation to ensure that the data used in Tableau reports is accurate, consistent, and reliable.
Write and optimize complex SQL queries for reporting, data extraction, and data transformation.
Monitor and manage data source connections, ensuring smooth data flow between Tableau and MySQL databases.
4. System Maintenance & Administration
Ensure the smooth functioning of the AWS Tableau instance, including tasks such as adding storage blocks and managing system performance.
Perform system administration tasks in Tableau, such as setting up user access, managing roles, implementing multi-factor authentication (MFA), and performing upgrades as required.
Regularly monitor the health of Tableau and database systems to identify and resolve issues proactively.
6. Coordination and Collaboration
Collaborate with internal teams, and customers to troubleshoot issues and implement solutions for improving system performance and functionality.
Coordinate with internal stakeholders and customer teams to support performance, resolve issues, and enhance reporting.
Provide technical support and training to customers, ensuring they understand how to use Tableau dashboards effectively.
Facilitate knowledge transfer and training support to new team members and internal trainees.
7. Ad-Hoc Tasks and Support
Handle ad-hoc tasks and requests, including but not limited to setting up reports, implementing custom features, and addressing urgent data issues.
Assist in data management and reporting tasks as directed by management or client needs.

Qualifications:
Bachelors degree in computer science, Information Technology, or a related field.
2+ years of experience in Tableau development, MySQL database management, or related fields.
Proven experience in SQL development, writing complex queries, and optimizing database performance.
Expertise in designing and developing interactive Tableau dashboards with a focus on data visualization best practices.
Experience with data transformation and data cleansing techniques to ensure accurate reporting.
Familiarity with AWS Tableau instance management, including storage management, user roles, and system performance monitoring.
Ability to troubleshoot and resolve issues related to database connectivity, system performance, and data discrepancies in Tableau.
Strong analytical skills with an ability to transform raw data into meaningful insights.
Experience with training and knowledge sharing in a technical environment.
Desired Skills:
Strong communication skills, with the ability to explain technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.
Ability to manage multiple tasks and prioritize effectively in a fast-paced environment.

• Should have strong acumen in Data Structures, Algorithms, problem-solving and Logical/Analytical skills.

jobs.Skills_Required: Node.Js, Python
jobs.Job_Description:
Proven experience as a Backend Developer.
Proficiency in Python and Node.js.
Strong understanding of RESTful API design and implementation.
Experience with database management systems
Experience with cloud services (e.g., AWS, Azure, Google Cloud).

Our established consulting firm requires talented software developers to create customised applications to automate our work processes.
We are seeking a Python / MySQL Developer with 3 - 5 years years of experience to join our team.

The ideal candidate will have deep knowledge and hands-on experience in Python, MySQL and associated platforms.

You will play a critical role in designing, developing, and implementing complex database solutions, while ensuring the performance and efficiency of database systems.

We need someone who can work independently in a fast-paced environment and is excited about tackling new challenges

What you will do:
Design, develop, and maintain Python-based applications that interact with MySQL databases.
Write efficient and optimized SQL queries, stored procedures, and functions to retrieve, manipulate, and analyse data.
Create logical data models and translate into physical database structures that integrate with proposed database structures.
Design, develop, validate, and communicate Business Intelligence (BI) solutions like dashboards, reports, KPIs, instrumentation, and alert tools
Design and implement scalable solutions leveraging cloud technologies
Write clean, efficient, and reusable code following OOP principles and coding standards.
Implement authentication mechanisms, including OAuth2, JWT, or Laravel Passport.
Database tuning experience, database integration design and implementation, and management of database projects.
Perform data validation, cleansing, and transformation to ensure data integrity and accuracy.
Understanding of the threading limitations of Python, and multi-process architecture
Work with version control systems such as Git for code management and collaboration.
Conduct code reviews, testing, debugging, and troubleshooting to ensure the reliability and performance of applications.
Develop data visualization tools and reports to present insights and findings to stakeholders.
Translate technical database issues, requirements, limitations, and parameters for management and staff, and understand business work processes and business impact

What we are looking for:
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science
Hands-on experience in Python development and SQL database management.
Proficiency in writing complex SQL queries, including joins, subqueries, and aggregations.
Strong understanding of Python programming concepts, data structures, and algorithms.
Experience with Python frameworks such as Django, Flask etc .
Familiarity with database systems such as MySQL, or SQL Server.
Knowledge of data visualization tools and libraries
Excellent problem-solving, analytical, and communication skills.
Must be able to work independently with little to no daily supervision, is a team player, open to ideas and learning.
Work in a distributed team environment where team members are spread across numerous locations and often communicate virtually to support clients.
Strong command of PostgreSQL and Oracle SQL/PLSQL, including stored procedures, functions, triggers, and complex SQL statements.
Proficiency in Unix shell scripting is a plus.
Expertise in Core Python
Familiarity with event-driven programming in Python
Problem-Solving Skills: Excellent debugging and problem-analysis skills, able to resolve complex technical issues efficiently.
Performance Optimization: Hands-on experience in tuning SQL queries for performance Self-Motivation: Ability to work independently and deliver high-quality results within tight deadlines.
Solid database concepts and database design knowledge (ACID, abstraction levels, schemas and constraints, stored procedures, replication, etc.)
Strong troubleshooting skill in database performance analysis and improvements.
Good knowledge of storage, networking, and other systems directly impacting database performance.
Solid experience in the administration and performance tuning of database-related tools and environments.
Proven working experience in configuring and troubleshooting UNIX/Linux-based environments.
MySQL Query Expertise: Strong ability to write complex SQL queries, optimize query performance, and create stored procedures, triggers, and views to handle business logic and reporting requirements.
MySQL Administration: In-depth knowledge of MySQL database architecture, tools, and techniques.
Backup & Restore Techniques: Extensive experience with database backup and recovery strategies, including point-in-time recovery and high availability setups.
Database Performance Tuning: Knowledge of indexing, query optimization, and techniques for ensuring optimal database performance and resource management.
Replication & Clustering: Experience in configuring and managing MySQL replication (master-slave, master-master) and clustering solutions (such as MySQL NDB or Galera Cluster).
You must have very good oral and written communication skills and be fully fluent in English.
We will offer a very attractive salary to candidates who meet our requirements. Role & responsibilities

jobs.Job_Description:
Platform Operations Engineer - Office (Shift Time: 10pm - 7am IST)
Partner with the best
As a Platform Operations Engineer, ensure change safety, improve processes, and reduce incidents from network changes.
As a Platform Operations Engineer, you will be responsible for:
Monitoring, managing, and maintaining infrastructure with 3,55,000+ Linux servers, 12000+ Layer 3 and 20,000+ Layer 2 devices.
Responding to hardware/software/network/OS related alerts, in a timely fashion as per pre-defined SLAs.
Troubleshooting global ISP connectivity issues, focusing on packet loss, filtering, latency, and routing.
Analyzing network traffic patterns and performance metrics to detect anomalies in the network.
Resolving switch issues, including upgrades, STP, VLAN configuration, and faulty interfaces.
Troubleshooting various router problems, such as faulty ports, misconfigurations, Handling BGP peering issues and Routing policy changes
Troubleshooting network issues in akamai fabric clusters and backbone network.
Do what you love
To be successful in this role you will:
Possess a Bachelors degree from a recognized and reputed institution with an excellent academic record.
Have 6 months to 1 year of networking experience in a NOC or similar environment.
Have great analytical, problem-solving, and communication skills.
Have proficiency in technical analysis and troubleshooting.
Have a CCNA certification from Cisco (mandatory).
Have familiarity with Linux/Unix and SQL or a willingness to learn these skills.

jobs.Skills_Required: voice, Voice Gateways, Cisco IP Telephony, CUCM, Call Manager Express, Cisco VOIP, VOIP, Call Manager, Cisco Unified Communications, cisco
jobs.Job_Description:
Profile Background
The Enterprise Voice Engineer (Associate) will assist supporting mission critical voice infrastructure systems. Technologies utilized by the Enterprise Voice Engineer Associate include: Cisco Call Manager, Cisco Unity, Cisco Contact Center Express, Cisco CUBE, Cisco Emergency Responder and Call Accounting systems. The position also requires demonstrated competence in VOIP, Mobility, Wireless, Route/Switch technologies, network troubleshooting tools, and Active Directory.

What will you be responsible for?

- Voice Infrastructure Support
Assist in the deployment and basic support of voice infrastructure processes and reports.
Assist in the upgrade of voice routers, analog gateways and Cisco Unified Communication servers.
Investigate basic functionality issues related to voice application data, security and system configurations under supervision wherever necessary.
Work with technical application teams in the review, analysis and resolution to application related performance issues.

Voice Administration –
Participate in tasks associated with voice administration, such as the installation and configuration of voice infrastructure, the deployment of backup and recovery processes for voice network, and the implementation of maintenance processes ensuring stability and performance of systems.
Few of the tools associated network administration includes Cisco RTMT, SolarWinds, Wireshark etc.
-
Disaster Recovery - Assist the organization in the performing of scheduled Disaster Recovery tests for designated mission critical voice systems.
-
Monitoring and Optimization - Participate in the monitoring, optimization and diagnosis of currently deployed network systems. Provide the appropriate documentation to management, detailing the root cause analysis of outages, performance concerns, and propose resolution and optimization options.
-
Technical System Support – Collaborate with the Enterprise Voice Engineer Team Lead to implement, configure, and support the Enterprise Voice Infrastructure.

Change Control - Adhere and follow all change management policies to ensure that the work is documented and meets the organizational requirements.
- Incident and Request Management –As with the change management requirements, all incidents and requests should adhere to the organizational requirements including SLA and SLT requirements.
Who are we looking for?
- Minimum of 1-3 years in the support of an enterprise voice platform in a 24x7 environment.
- Skilled in Cisco platforms such as Cisco Call Manager, Cisco Unity, Cisco Contact Center Express, Cisco CUBE and Cisco Emergency Responder.
- This would also include VOIP, Mobility, Wireless, Call Accounting systems, Voice recording systems and Wallboard systems.
- Proven skills in configuration of voice architecture with cross-functional application, business, technical teams and third-party vendors.
- Collaborate with others to help a team or work group achieve its goals.
- Excellent verbal and written communications skills including active listening.

jobs.Skills_Required: Orchestration, Servicenow, Event Management, Discoverer
jobs.Job_Description:
The ServiceNow ITOM Developer is responsible for developing, configuring, and maintaining the ServiceNow IT Operations Management (ITOM) applications. This includes Discovery, Event Management, Service Mapping, and Agent Client Collector. The ITOM Developer will collaborate with the IT Service Management team and stakeholders to ensure accurate and up-to-date ITOM data, effectively integrated with other ServiceNow and external systems.
Responsibilities:
Develop, configure, and manage ITOM schedules, credentials, patterns, probes, sensors, MID servers, event sources, connectors, service maps, and agents.
Monitor and troubleshoot ITOM performance issues and errors.
Validate and reconcile ITOM data with the Configuration Management Database (CMDB) and other data sources.
Identify and resolve ITOM conflicts, duplicates, and orphaned records.
Implement and enforce ITOM best practices, standards, and policies.
Provide technical support and guidance to ITOM users and stakeholders.
Create and maintain ITOM documentation, reports, and dashboards.
Collaborate with other ServiceNow administrators and developers to integrate ITOM with other ServiceNow applications and modules such as ITSM, ITAM, Security Operations, etc.
Use APIs and Integration Hub to connect ITOM with external systems such as monitoring tools, cloud platforms, automation tools, etc.
Stay updated on the latest ServiceNow ITOM features, enhancements, and updates.

Qualifications:
Bachelors degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or a related field, or equivalent work experience.
At least 2 years of experience as a ServiceNow ITOM Developer or in a similar role.
ServiceNow Certified System Administrator (CSA) certification preferred.
Strong knowledge of ServiceNow ITOM architecture, components, and functionality.
Proficient in ServiceNow scripting languages such as JavaScript, PowerShell, and Shell.
Experience with ServiceNow CMDB, ITSM, ITAM, and other ServiceNow applications and modules.
Experience with IT infrastructure and asset discovery tools such as SCCM.
Experience with IT event management and service mapping tools such as SolarWinds.
Experience with ServiceNow Agent Client Collector and agent deployment and configuration.
Experience with APIs and Integration Hub for data exchange and automation.
Excellent troubleshooting, problem-solving, and analytical skills.
Strong communication and collaboration skills.

About us

Omnicoms branded networks and numerous specialty firms provide advertising, strategic media planning and buying, digital and interactive marketing, direct and promotional marketing, public relations, and other specialty communications services. Our agency brands are consistently recognized as being among the worlds creative best.
Annalect India plays a key role for our group companies and global agencies by providing stellar products and services in areas of Creative Services, Technology, Marketing Science (data & analytics), Market Research, Business Support Services, Media Services, Consulting & Advisory Services. jobs.Job_Description:
Job Overview:
We are seeking an energetic and self-driven Business Analyst with a passion for data products.
As a Lead Business Analyst in Data Governance Projects, you will work alongside statisticians and data governance experts of the organization to build data centric products and solutions for financial institutions focusing on global standards of data quality management. As a smart, passionate, detail-oriented team player with strong critical and analytical thinking abilities, this is an amazing opportunity to forge a new direction for a highly niche IT company that is deeply committed to strengthen the technology landscape of financial ecosystem of nation. The ideal candidate must have proven skills in requirement gathering and documentation, as well as a strong logical understanding of database architecture, database schema design, data audit processes and data quality measures.

Key Responsibilities:
Requirement Gathering & Management:
Collaborate with stakeholders to gather, document, and manage business requirements.
Create and manage a Requirement Traceability Matrix (RTM) to ensure comprehensive coverage of requirements throughout the project lifecycle.
Data Quality and Index creation:
Act as primary resource representing Data Governance team on assigned projects.
Work with business and technology partners in creation and implementation an enterprise-wide Data Quality (DQ) strategy.
Proven experience in managing and analyzing large datasets.
Strong understanding of data audit processes to lead and guide a team of business and data analysts.
Deep understanding of data quality parameters, methodologies to measure data quality and data quality scorecard.
Prior experience in index calculation methodologies.
Proven experience in collecting business insights from data, identifying key performance indicators and designing dashboards.
Implementation & Quality Assurance
Engage in all phases of the SDLC, including requirement analysis, design, testing, and deployment.
Collaborate with QA team to review test cases and scenarios, ensuring thorough validation of business requirements.
Support functional and smoke testing to ensure the stability and performance of product.
Assist in UAT sessions, coordinate with QA and technical team for rapid defect resolution.

Required Skills:
Strong skills in requirement gathering, data analysis, and data quality indicators.
Ability to analyse the overall direction of data quality across multiple data sources, domains, and products as well as the drivers of those data quality issues.
must be skilled at extracting meaningful trends and information from large datasets.
Experience with Agile methodologies
Proficient in using Visio for UML, Data Flow Diagrams and Process Flow Diagrams.
Experience with tools like JIRA, Confluence, or similar project management software.
Experience with data visualization tools (Tableau, Power BI etc.) and programming languages(R/Python) (Preferred)
Excellent verbal and written communication, problem-solving, and stakeholder management skills
Qualifications & Certifications:
Bachelors degree in computer science, Information Systems, Business Administration, or a related field.
Masters degree in computer science, Information Systems, Business Administration, or a related field.
Certification in BI tools and programming languages (R/Python)( Preferred)
A minimum of 3+ years in data products and solutions.
Certification in Business Analysis (CBAP, CCBA, PMI-PBA, Product owner). (Preferred)


Thanks & regards,
sakshi.kamble@cbtinfotech.com
9322332576

jobs.Job_Description:
About Us:
Levi & Korsinsky is committed to advocating for shareholders and consumers, seeking justice from major corporations and their executives. With decades of experience, our attorneys have established groundbreaking legal precedents in high-stakes securities and class action lawsuits nationwide.
Our rapidly expanding marketing division, part of an established international law firm with over 22 years of history. We are rapidly expanding in-house team in technology, AI, CRM development, customer service automation, digital marketing.
Key Responsibilities:
As a Data Analyst, you will focus on sales and customer analytics, helping to optimize our customers ecommerce operations and marketing efforts. You will work closely with cross-functional teams, utilizing your strong consultative skills, expertise in spreadsheet models, deck development, and technical skills, including SQL. Your ability to communicate effectively and translate complex data into actionable insights will be critical to your success in this role.
Key Responsibilities :
• Analyze ecommerce and marketing data to provide insights on sales performance, and market trends.
• Develop and maintain spreadsheet models to support marketing campaign analysis.
• Create and present compelling decks to communicate findings and recommendations.
• Utilize SQL to extract, manipulate, and analyze data from various databases.
• Collaborate with marketing & technology teams to understand needs and provide data-driven solutions.
• Monitor and report on key performance indicators (KPIs) to track the effectiveness of marketing campaigns and initiatives.
• Identify opportunities for process improvements and automation to enhance data analysis efficiency.
• Provide consultative support to team, helping them understand data insights and make informed decisions.
Qualifications :
• Bachelor's degree in Data Science, Statistics, Marketing, Business, or a related field.
• Proven experience as a Data Analyst, preferably in the ecommerce or marketing industry.
• Strong proficiency in spreadsheet software (e.g., Excel, Google Sheets) and experience with spreadsheet modeling.
• Proficiency in SQL for data extraction and analysis.
• Excellent communication skills, with the ability to present complex data insights clearly and concisely.
• Strong consultative skills, with the ability to work collaboratively with cross-functional teams.
• Experience with data visualization tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI) is a plus.
• Analytical mindset with strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
• Ability to manage multiple projects and prioritize tasks effectively.
Work Location: Pune.
Shift Timings: US Shift, 6:30 PM IST to 2:30 AM IST.
Work Setting: Work from Office 5 Days a week.
Why you should Join Us:
Competitive Compensation: We offer competitive salaries and benefits packages to attract and retain top talent.
Work-Life Balance: We understand the importance of work-life balance and offer flexible work arrangements to help employees manage their personal and professional lives.
Collaborative Environment: Levi & Korsinsky fosters a collaborative and inclusive work environment where employees are encouraged to share ideas and work together to achieve common goals.
Opportunities for Impact: Working at Levi & Korsinsky means being part of a team that is dedicated to making a difference. Our work has a direct impact on the lives of shareholders and consumers.

Role & Responsibilities:
Knowledge on Account, contact and billing, payments.
Understanding on Order actions for subscription management. Good Understanding to Product catalog and charge models.
Good to have hands on Bill Runs, Billing Document posting, cancel, apply payment and DM/CM along with regenerate and share billing documents.
Good hands on configure reports, Share, and extract data from data sources.
Ability to Run Workflows, test, and debug simple errors. Product catalog and Quoting templates.

jobs.Job_Description:
Who we are
At FedEx, moving the world doesnt only mean delivering for our customers around the globe. Moving the world is also about creating whats next. We are Team FedEx consists of 500,000+ people strong around the world. The work we all do comes down to one purpose: to provide our customers with outstanding experiences as we connect the world to whats next.

This isnt a place to get just a job, here you get a career for life. Its a place to enjoy constant change, growth, and progress in your career. Our willingness to innovate and transform is what keeps us at the forefront of our industry. With curiosity, inventiveness, and entrepreneurial spirit, we keep finding new and better ways to deliver results for our customers, for our people and for the planet.

Here you will be given the flexibility and the empowerment to reimagine the new, spread your wings and see your impact. By doing so, we are motivated to be better together. And together, we always manage to drive and deliver excellence.

Our Values
Our culture values empower us to deliver great results. With one FedEx culture, we:
Take care of each other | Commit to do good | Own outstanding | Drive business results | Create whats next

Awards
FedEx has consistently ranked among the top 20 in the most admired companies in the Worlds Most Admired Companies report, according to a survey published in FORTUNE magazine since 2001.
Ethisphere named FedEx as One of the 2023 Worlds Most Ethical Companies.


Position Overview:
At FedEx GDX, a data analyst is a pivotal member of the core analytics team or a Domain analytics team, specializing in extracting actionable insights from diverse datasets to inform strategic decision-making. Collaborating closely with analytics engineers, their primary responsibility is to answer complex business questions through in-depth analyses and the construction of informative dashboards. This involves synthesizing data from various sources, working in tandem with analytics engineers to ensure the efficient transformation and preparation of data for meaningful analysis.

What you'll be working on
Position Overview:
As a Data Analyst, you will collaborate closely with analytics engineers, answering complex business questions through in-depth analyses and constructing informative dashboards. Your responsibilities will include strategic decision support, advanced analysis techniques, dashboard development, data integration with data engineers, insights presentation, and active engagement in problem-solving and innovation

Collaborate with business stakeholders to understand strategic objectives and formulate data-driven solutions to address key business questions. • Apply advanced statistical methods to uncover patterns, trends, and opportunities within the data. • Design and develop interactive dashboards for visual representations of key performance indicators. • Collaborate closely with data engineers to integrate data from multiple sources, ensuring a comprehensive and cohesive dataset for analysis. • Take the lead in presenting meaningful insights to stakeholders in a clear and compelling manner. • Actively engage in problem-solving activities, leveraging innovative approaches to contribute to the development of creative data solutions

What we are looking for
Skills:
• Strong verbal and written communication skills.
• Ability to think critically and analytically to solve complex business problems.
• Meticulous attention to detail for accurate data analysis and reporting.
• Strong problem-solving skills to address challenges and find innovative solutions.
• Effective time management skills to handle multiple tasks and meet deadlines.
• Collaborative mindset to work effectively in cross-functional teams, including collaboration with data engineers.
• Understanding of business processes and objectives to align data analyses with organizational goals.

Qualifications:
• Bachelor's degree in a relevant field (e.g., Business, Data Science, Computer Science). Masters degree preferred.
• Relevant work experience as a Data Analyst. • Experience in a senior or lead data analyst role or similar positions.
• Proficiency in statistical analysis and data modeling.
• Strong proficiency in SQL for querying databases.
• Familiarity with scripting languages like Python or R for data manipulation and analysis.
• Expertise in using visualization tools such as Tableau, Power BI, or similar (Power BI strongly preferred).
Familiarity with Git and GitHub for collaboration.
• Familiarity with DBT is a plus.
• Knowledge of A/B testing principles to evaluate and optimize website/application changes

What you'll bring to the team
Collaboration, quality work, commercial acumen, leading on projects with minimum guidance, willingness to learn and grow.
Analytical Skills, Accuracy & Attention to Detail, Planning & Organizing Skills, Influencing & Persuasion Skills, Presentation Skills

What you can expect to get
Attractive remuneration package includes:
Attractive remuneration package includes:
Salary as per agreed compensation structure
Tuition Assistance
Great Working Environment

Spread your wings and take ownership of your career with opportunities to advance through internal promotions, job rotations, and cross-functional projects.
Complimentary 24/7 access to our learning platforms to support you in becoming who you want to be
Work-life balance programs including hybrid work arrangement. WFH (work from home) and office
Health & wellness, employee assistance, and rewards and recognition programs
Special employee discounts on shipping, travel, and much more

Equal opportunities commitment
Our greatest asset at FedEx is our people. We are committed to building a diverse, equitable and inclusive workforce, and offer equal opportunities, fairness and respect to all regardless of who you are. We encourage you to apply even if you feel your experience does not align with all the aspects in the job description as you could be exactly who we need for this or another opportunity.

We do not tolerate discrimination or harassment based on race, color, ethnicity, national origin, religion, sex, age, genetic information, citizenship, disability, marital status, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, veteran status or any other characteristic protected under national, state or local laws. We will reasonably accommodate team members and third parties with physical and mental disabilities.



Interested?
Everyone at FedEx has a part to play. Its about coming up with smart solutions, remaining resilient in the face of setbacks, and going above and beyond to get the job done. And whether youre a business leader or delivery driver, youll be empowered to take responsibility and overcome each challenge in your own way.

If this position and working environment sound like the right fit for you, then do no wait and please apply today.

jobs.Job_Description:
SAP ABAP Developer (5 to 7 years Experience)

Job Description:
We are looking for an experienced SAP ABAP Developer to join our team and help us deliver innovative solutions. You will be responsible for developing, enhancing, and maintaining SAP ABAP applications. You will also work closely with other team members to ensure the successful implementation of projects.

Key Responsibilities:
Develop, enhance, and maintain SAP ABAP applications
Work with functional consultants to understand business requirements
Analyze and troubleshoot technical issues
Write clean, efficient, and well-documented code
Follow best practices for SAP ABAP development
Participate in code reviews and provide feedback

Required Skills and Experience:

At least 5 years of hands-on experience with SAP ABAP development in SAP ECC and/or S/4 HANA
Minimum of 2 years S/4HANA Implementation.
Experience with SAP ABAP Technologies and WRICEF
Minimum of 2 years of ABAP experience OData Services, CDS views, Object Oriented Development (OO) experience and experience with RAP
Must have skills CDS, Odata, OOPS, ATC checks-(Upgrade),S4 HANA
Should be familiar with ADT (ABAP Dev Tools)
Good problem-solving and analytical skills
Ability to work independently and as part of a team
Excellent communication skills
Preferred Skills and Experience:
Experience with SAP S/4HANA
Experience with SAP Cloud Platform
Experience with SAP Integration Suite
Experience with SAP Fiori development
Location: Remote
Shift: 12 Noon to 9 PM / 2 PM to 11 PM
JD Analysis:
Key Experience and Skills for the SAP ABAP Developer Role
Core Requirements:
SAP ABAP Expertise: A solid foundation in SAP ABAP development, with at least 8 years of practical experience in ECC and/or S/4 HANA environments.
S/4HANA Implementation: Proven experience in at least two S/4HANA implementations, demonstrating a deep understanding of the platform and its nuances.
WRICEF Objects: Familiarity with WRICEF objects (Workflows, Reports, Interfaces, Conversions, Enhancements, Forms) is essential for effective ABAP development.
OData and CDS: Minimum 2 years of experience working with OData Services and CDS views, showcasing proficiency in modern ABAP development techniques.
Object-Oriented Development (OO): Strong OO ABAP skills are crucial for building maintainable and scalable solutions.
ATC Checks: Knowledge of ATC (ABAP Test Cockpit) checks is necessary for ensuring code quality and adherence to best practices, especially in the context of S/4 HANA upgrades.
Additional Skills:
ADT (ABAP Development Tools): Proficiency in using ADT for efficient ABAP development and collaboration.
Problem-Solving and Analytical Skills: The ability to diagnose and resolve complex technical issues.
Teamwork and Independence: The candidate should be comfortable working both independently and as part of a team.
Effective Communication: Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal, are essential for collaborating with stakeholders and team members.
In summary, the ideal candidate for this role will possess a strong foundation in traditional ABAP development, combined with a deep understanding of S/4 HANA and modern ABAP technologies such as OData and CDS. They should also have a strong problem-solving mindset and be able to work effectively in a collaborative environment
ABAP CDS (Core Data Services): Defines data models and services for accessing data from SAP HANA and other databases
OData Services: Provides RESTful APIs for accessing and manipulating data from SAP systems.
ABAP Fiori: Develops user-friendly mobile and desktop applications using the Fiori design language.
ABAP ALV (Adaptive Layout Viewer): Provides a flexible framework for creating lists and tables.
The primary development environment for ABAP, based on Eclipse
SAP ECC (Enterprise Central Component)

jobs.Job_Description:
Job_Description

Job Brief:
We are seeking a capable and responsible Security Manager to oversee and coordinate all security operations across our sites in Karnataka, Andhra Pradesh, Tamil Nadu, and Kerala. Your primary base will be our office in Jayanagar, Bengaluru, but you will manage security teams deployed at various farm locations. The role requires a proactive approach, leadership skills, and the ability to use modern security technology to ensure the safety of all employees, visitors, and property.

Key Responsibilities:
Develop and Enforce Security Policies: Create, implement, and enforce security policies, protocols, and procedures to ensure safety and security across all locations.
Budget Management: Monitor and control the budget for security operations, ensuring that all securityrelated expenses are managed efficiently.
Recruitment and Training: Recruit, train, and supervise security personnel to ensure they are wellprepared and capable of performing their duties effectively.
Coordinate with Other Departments: Work closely with other managers and departments to address and fulfill security needs, ensuring seamless operations.
Emergency Response Coordination: Lead and coordinate the security team during emergencies, ensuring a quick and efficient response to any incidents.
Incident Investigation: Investigate any security breaches or incidents, implement corrective measures, and report findings to the management.
Security Technology Management: Utilize and manage security technology, such as CCTV, alarms, and communication systems, to monitor and ensure the safety of all locations.
Compliance with Local Laws: Ensure all security operations comply with local laws and regulations, particularly those specific to Karnataka and the other states where operations are conducted.
Visitor and Access Management: Oversee the management of visitor access and ensure that all entry and exit points at various locations are secure.
Liaison with Law Enforcement: Establish and maintain good relations with local law enforcement agencies to ensure prompt assistance during emergencies.
Health and Safety: Ensure that all security operations are conducted in line with health and safety standards, minimizing risks to staff and visitors.

Requirements and Skills:
Experience: Proven experience as a Security Manager or in a similar role is essential.
Technology Proficiency: Strong understanding and experience in using security technology, such as CCTV systems, access control systems, and communication devices.
Leadership Skills: Excellent leadership abilities to manage and motivate a team effectively.
Emergency Response: Experience in emergency planning and the ability to remain calm and decisive under pressure.
Communication Skills: Strong communication skills, both written and verbal, to effectively interact with team members, management, and external agencies.
ProblemSolving: Strong analytical skills to identify and resolve securityrelated issues promptly.
Local Knowledge: Familiarity with the local geography, culture, and legal requirements of Karnataka and neighboring states is a plus.
Preferred Background: Candidates with previous experience in defense, army, territorial army, home guards, fire safety, or police services are preferred.
Age Requirement: Candidates should be between 35 to 60 years old.

This role is vital to maintaining a safe and secure environment across multiple locations. If you have the experience, skills, and commitment needed to manage security operations effectively, we encourage you to apply.

1. Instrumental in understanding the requirements and design of the product/ software
Develop software solutions by studying information needs, studying systems flow, data usage and work processes
Investigating problem areas followed by the software development life cycle
Facilitate root cause analysis of the system issues and problem statement
Identify ideas to improve system performance and impact availability
Analyze client requirements and convert requirements to feasible design
Collaborate with functional teams or systems analysts who carry out the detailed investigation into software requirements
Conferring with project managers to obtain information on software capabilities

Analyzing information to recommend and plan the installation of new systems or modifications of an existing system

About Us:

We are surrounded by the world's leading consumer companies led by technology - Amazon for retail, Airbnb for hospitality, Uber for mobility, Netflix and Spotify for entertainment, etc. Food & Beverage is the only consumer sector where large players are still traditional restaurant companies. At Rebel Foods, we are challenging this status quo as we are buildinGoodsgld's most valuable restaurant company on the internet, superfast.
The opportunity for us is immense due to the exponential growth in the food delivery business worldwide which has helped us build 'The World's Largest Internet Restaurant Company' in the
last few years. Rebel Foods' current presence in 10 countries (including India, Indonesia, UAE, UK, Malaysia, Singapore, Bangladesh) with close to 50 brands and 4500+ internet restaurants has been built on The Rebel Operating System.
While for us it is still Day 1, we know we are in the middle of a revolution towards creating never seen before customer-first experiences. We bring you a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to disrupt the 500-year-old industry with technology at its core.
We urge you to refer to the below to understand how we are changing the restaurant industry before applying at Rebel Foods.

jobs.Job_Description:
Sales Consultant with Interior Design Experience
Location: Hyderabad, India
Position Overview
CustomFurnish is looking for a talented and customer-focused Sales Consultant with Interior Design Expertise to join our team. This role combines sales acumen with design knowledge to provide clients with an exceptional furniture-buying experience. The ideal candidate will guide customers through the process of customizing furniture, ensuring their unique needs are met while showcasing expertise in interior design.
Key Responsibilities
Customer Engagement and Design Consultation
Approach potential customers and introduce CustomFurnishs unique offerings, emphasizing the value of customized furniture.
Conduct consultations to understand clients space, lifestyle, and design preferences, offering creative design insights to align with their vision.
Design Collaboration and Product Demonstration
Leverage interior design expertise to recommend furniture layouts, styles, and materials tailored to clients’ spaces.
Showcase CustomFurnish’s design portfolio, materials, finishes, and colors while highlighting the benefits of modular and custom furniture.
Use design software or tools to provide preliminary visualizations or concepts to clients.
Sales Process and Conversion
Present CustomFurnish solutions persuasively, addressing design and functionality questions to build confidence and close sales.
Explain the step-by-step process from design to delivery, ensuring transparency and trust in the client journey.
Order Coordination and Finalization
Collaborate with the design team to refine and finalize furniture designs based on client preferences.
Assist customers through design approval, order placement, and payment processing, ensuring a smooth transition.
Customer Relationship Management
Maintain regular follow-ups to ensure clients are updated throughout the design and delivery process.
Build lasting relationships with clients by offering exceptional customer service, encouraging referrals, and fostering repeat business.
Team Collaboration and Market Insights
Work closely with the design and production teams to ensure client requirements are clearly communicated and met.
Provide feedback from customer interactions to improve product offerings, marketing strategies, and overall customer satisfaction.
Qualifications and Skills
Experience: 1-3 years in a combined sales and interior design role or related fields within the furniture or interior design industry.
Design Knowledge: Strong understanding of interior design principles, modular furniture, space planning, and material selection.
Sales Expertise: Proven ability to close sales through a consultative approach, with a focus on meeting client needs and achieving targets.
Communication: Excellent interpersonal skills to engage clients, build rapport, and explain design concepts clearly.
Technical Skills: Familiarity with design software (e.g., AutoCAD, SketchUp, or similar) is a plus.
Customer-Centric: Passion for delivering personalized, high-quality experiences for every client.
Organization: Ability to manage multiple clients, follow-ups, and deadlines effectively.
