jobs.Job_Description:
Job_Title: Technical Document Writer.
Location: Bengaluru, Karnataka, India.
Company: Pump Academy Private Limited
Product: iPUMPNET
About iPUMPNET: iPUMPNET is an IIoT-enabled digital solution developed by Pump Academy Private Limited that enhances the efficiency, reliability, and performance of pumping systems. By integrating advanced technologies, iPUMPNET provides real-time monitoring, predictive maintenance, energy efficiency insights, and seamless system integration to help industries optimize operations and sustainability.
Job Summary: We are looking for a Technical Document Writer with a minimum of 2-6 years of experience to join our team in Bengaluru. The successful candidate will be responsible for creating and maintaining comprehensive documentation across various departments, including software, embedded engineering, cybersecurity, and compliance (ISO 27001 & ISO 9001). The role will involve preparing clear, concise, and well-structured documents while collaborating with technical teams to ensure content accuracy and consistency.

Role & responsibilities
Key Responsibilities:
Documentation Development:
Create, update, and maintain technical documentation for software products, embedded systems, and IT security solutions.
Develop user manuals, product specifications, installation guides, API documentation, troubleshooting guides, and system operation manuals.
Draft and revise documentation to comply with ISO 27001 and ISO 9001 standards, ensuring quality and accuracy in compliance-related documentation.
Collaboration with Teams:
Work closely with cross-functional teams such as software development, embedded engineering, IT, and product management to collect technical information and ensure documentation is aligned with product functionality and requirements.
Engage with subject matter experts (SMEs) to gather insights and clarify technical details for inclusion in documentation.
Quality Assurance:
Review and proofread documentation to ensure clarity, consistency, and accuracy.
Maintain version control of documents, ensuring they are up-to-date and relevant.
Compliance and Standards:
Ensure documentation adheres to industry standards and regulatory requirements, including ISO 27001 and ISO 9001.
Help maintain internal and external knowledge repositories, ensuring easy access to up-to-date documentation.
Process Improvement:
Continuously improve documentation processes and templates to ensure efficiency, readability, and usability.
Stay updated on industry trends and best practices for technical writing and documentation.
Visual Aids and Diagrams:
Create flowcharts, diagrams, and process maps to complement technical content, making complex concepts more accessible and visually engaging (Mandatory)
Document Lifecycle Management:
Understand and manage the entire document lifecycle, from creation to review, approval, and final publication. Ensure that all documentation is properly versioned and updated as needed.
Agile Methodology:
Familiarity with Agile development processes and the ability to work in an Agile environment, as IIoT products often follow iterative sprints and require frequent updates to documentation.

Preferred candidate profile
Qualifications:
Education:
Bachelor's degree in Technical Communication, Engineering, Computer Science, or a related field.
Experience:
2-6 years of experience in technical writing, preferably with IIoT devices or similar products.
Experience in writing documentation for software, embedded systems, cybersecurity, and compliance is essential.
Previous exposure to ISO 27001 and ISO 9001 documentation is highly beneficial.
Skills & Knowledge:
Familiarity with technical documentation tools such as MadCap Flare, Adobe FrameMaker, Confluence, Google Docs, or Microsoft SharePoint.
Strong proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, etc.).
Knowledge of version control systems like Git or SVN for managing documentation changes is a plus.
Understanding of embedded systems and basic IT infrastructure will be an advantage.
Familiarity with software testing documentation and quality assurance practices is essential.
Soft Skills:
Exceptional written and verbal communication skills.
Strong attention to detail and organizational skills.
Ability to work independently and handle multiple projects simultaneously.
Ability to understand complex technical concepts and translate them into clear, concise documentation for various audiences.
Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities.
Preferred Qualifications:
Experience in technical writing within the IIoT or industrial automation sectors.
Knowledge of regulatory standards related to cybersecurity and IT management, such as NIST or ISO 27001.
Familiarity with creating technical content for different delivery formats, such as online help, PDF, and HTML.
Experience in creating and integrating visual aids like flowcharts, diagrams, and process maps.

Note: Only candidates who meet the specified qualifications and experience will be considered. Immediate joiners are preferred.

Performs design reviews for drawing completeness as per GPD drafting practices, tolerances, and conformance to GPD conventions and procedures.
Apply design for manufacturing and assembly principles and ensure that designs meet the criteria of form, fit, and function for the desired application.
Completion of processing ECRs assigned to GPD-I in a timely manner.
Communicates project status in a timely manner.
Performs miscellaneous job-related duties as assigned.

* Problem Solving Attitude
* Good English Communication Skills (Verbal & Written Both)
* Team-Player , Self- Driven with strong integrity , Quick adaptability to new changes

As per UCC-India HR Policy

jobs.Job_Title: Mechanical Design Engineer-Electro optical gimbals-Paras Defence
jobs.Skills_Required: CATIA, Mechanical Design, Analysis, NX, 3D Modeling, Solid Works, Stability Studies
jobs.Job_Description:
Working days and timings: Monday to Saturday, 9.30am to 6.30pm Experience: 2 +yrs Qualification: B.Tech/BE/M.Tech/M.E. - Mechanical Engineering

Required skills:
- Design and development of gyro-stabilized Electro-Optical gimbals and stabilized heads
- Proficiency in 3D CAD modelling and drafting using software like SolidWorks, CATIA, or NX
- Designing mechanical structures for stabilization systems, selecting critical components like bearings, motors, and gears, and collaborating with control system engineers for optimized performance.
- Experience in mechanical analysis (static, dynamic, thermal, vibration) using tools like ANSYS or similar FEA software.
- Proficient in understanding and addressing environmental requirements for mechanical systems, including shock, vibration and temperature considerations.
- Knowledge of lightweight structures for airborne or vehicle-mounted systems

Job description:
• Design and develop gyro-stabilized platforms, Electro-Optical gimbals, and stabilized heads to meet performance and stability requirements.
• Perform mechanical analysis (stress, thermal, vibration) to ensure system robustness and reliability under operational conditions.
• Select and integrate appropriate mechanical components such as:
o Bearings (e.g., precision ball bearings, roller bearings)
o Motors (e.g., DC motors, stepper motors, brushless servo motors)
o Gears and gearboxes for smooth and accurate motion control
o Encoders and position sensors for feedback mechanisms
o Slip rings for continuous rotation applications
• Collaborate with control system engineers to optimize the mechanical design for stabilization performance.
• Design lightweight and rigid structures using materials such as aluminium alloys, stainless steel, and composites to meet weight and stiffness requirements.
• Conduct CAD modelling and detailed drafting using software like SolidWorks, CATIA, or NX.
• Perform tolerance analysis and ensure manufacturability of designs.
• Support prototyping, assembly, and testing of gimbals and stabilization systems.
• Troubleshoot mechanical issues during testing and provide design improvements.
• Document mechanical designs, analysis results, and test procedures as per company standards.

Engineering is responsible for the design and execution of projects Packed LPG Stations and allowing for the safe (compressors, pumps, vaporizers, truck stations, etc.), facility-related systems (control buildings, fire water, high expansion foam and emergency shut-down systems, etc.), and other miscellaneous work.

jobs.Job_Description:
We're a software consulting company specializing in web applications, and we're looking for a sharp QA Engineer to join our global team.

About Us:
We're a fully remote company that believes in getting things done without micromanagement. Our team spans multiple time zones, and we're big on clear communication and independence.

What You'll Do:
- Review and understand technical requirement documents (our bible for each project!)
- Put our web applications through their paces to ensure they match requirements
- Keep our developers on their toes by catching and tracking bugs
- Follow through to make sure those bugs are squashed
- Keep an eye on the overall user experience - if something feels off, we want to know!

Who We're Looking For:
- 3+ years of hands-on QA experience
- A self-starter who can manage their own time and workload
- Detail-oriented but also sees the big picture
- You can be anywhere in India

Note: This is a manual testing role - no automation required!

Why Join Us?
We're looking for someone on the long-term, someone that can evolve into a bigger role within the company. If you're someone who takes pride in their work, enjoys independence, and wants to be part of a team that trusts you to get the job done right, we should definitely chat.

We need someone that has a keen eye for the details and has a lot of patience. Show us that you read the entire post and you automatically get shortlisted for an interview.

Tell us about your experience and how much salary you expect.

jobs.Job_Description:
Leapwork has created the worlds most accessible automation platform. Through a visual, no-code approach, Leapwork makes it easy for business and IT users to automate repetitive processes, so enterprises can adopt and scale automation faster.
Leapwork is used by more than 400 global enterprises across all industries, from banks and insurance companies to life science, government, and aerospace.
We are headquartered in Copenhagen, Denmark, and has local offices across Europe, the US and Asia.

Who are we looking for?
We are looking for a high-energy professional individual contributor, who loves to engage with clients to drive innovation in their organization. Being customer-oriented in this role means understanding the clients requirements by asking relevant questions, listening to them, spending time with them in their working environment, and with members of their team. It is often required for you to integrate yourself within their internal team so you should be flexible in your approach.
The role requires that you are analytical, can attune to a clients needs, can quickly understand their business processes, and translate them into an automation context.

Experience & Qualification:
4 -9 years of total experience in QA (Quality Assurance) of Web/Desktop/Mobile/App/etc
3 -7 years in any one of the automation tools - Selenium Web Driver / VSTS / UFT /Tosca / Any RPA tool
Good working knowledge of at least one programming knowledge - C#/Java/Python and/or OOP’s
Experience in creating Automation Frameworks, test automation strategy, automation effort estimations, and test automation prioritization.
Experienced with agile, DevOps processes, source control, database, and CI/CD implementation.
Having knowledge of tools such as Jira, Jenkins, Team City, Azure, etc. is a plus.
Excellent analytical, communicational, interpersonal & presentation skills.
Ability to perform as an individual contributor who can handle client’s needs on his/her own
Self-motivated, driven, result oriented, critical thinker and problem solver
Enjoy working in a fast-paced, global environment
Should have bachelor’s degree in Engineering or equivalent
Should be comfortable with short term national and international travel

As an Automation Consultant, you will :
Develop a deep understanding of the LEAPWORK Platform and its functionalities
Develop workflows and custom solutions to address specific customer needs, Identify client needs, and showcase the best solutions
Perform test automation analysis, design leapwork framework for client’s product, create and execute tests on leapwork tool, monitor & report results of the assigned projects
Engage with clients in both technical pre-and post-sales activities to ensure LEAPWORK adoption.
Reviewing customer's automated test scripts, providing guidance to customers in implementing best practices, and fixing design/script issues
Provide support to internal teams, customers, and partners’ Implementation teams throughout their project implementation phase
Document solutions and maintain best practices
Learn and utilize new exciting technologies and how they integrate with LEAPWORK and help gather project requirements for integration with partner products

Why Leapwork?
We are on an exciting journey of global growth and this is your chance to get onboard. By joining our team, you’ll become part of a fast-paced international environment where you can grow, challenge yourself, and do what inspires you. We work hard but have fun while doing it – and we believe that collaboration, social activities and celebration are keys to success.

If interested, please shar your cv at hr-in@leapwork.com

jobs.Job_Description:
Engineering Experience (EXP) comprises leaders, product managers, software and DevOps engineers, and business analysts, all aligned on delivering broad value across numerous enablement spaces, from public cloud technologies to developer portals and observability tools. EXP partners closely with its stakeholders within Cimpress Technology and beyond to enable hyper-localized and business-wide outcomes that enhance the engineering experience and journey of our companies' products, services, and customers.
 The Yeti team within EXP supports the Cimpress Technology development community by offering guidance and tools to minimize the time spent on repetitive operational tasks, allowing more focus on providing value to end-customers. At the heart of our development philosophy lies a strong emphasis on data, automation, iterative development, and best practices. As a Site Reliability Engineer (PR1), you'll be part of a skilled engineering group responsible for upholding quality DevOps, observability, and reliability concepts throughout the organization.
 What You Will Do:
Engage with customers to understand their challenges and help provide basic solutions to meet their observability needs using SaaS products and open-source tools under the guidance of senior team members. (GitLab, New Relic, PagerDuty, and more)
Support SaaS products in a production environment by performing routine maintenance tasks and addressing common issues following documented and well-defined procedures.
Communicate and collaborate effectively in an asynchronous work environment, contributing to clear documentation and iterative development.
Consume small-scale, manageable, tasks and contribute to the development of proof of concepts.
Learn and apply foundational DevOps principles, including the "3 Ways of DevOps," under mentorship.
Contribute to the creation and maintenance of documentation for observability and reliability best practices.
Participate in code reviews with a focus on learning and developing high-quality code practices.
Assist in developing and maintaining internal automation tools by handling straightforward tasks and building familiarity with clean code and MVP principles.
Your Qualifications:
Strong oral and written communication skills, with fluency in English.
Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or Software Engineering, or equivalent work experience in a related field.
1 - 2 years of demonstrated experience working on a team in a similar role.
Experience with at least one scripting language, such as Python or Javascript, for automating tasks.
Genuine passion for DevOps, continuous learning, and experimentation methodologies.
Self-driven attitude with the initiative to pursue solutions and seek learning opportunities.
Basic understanding of Git Operations and/or source code management (SCM) solutions.
Knowledge of continuous integration and continuous deployment. (GitLab CI, Jenkins)
Some exposure to the three pillars of Software Observability including logging, metrics, and traces.
A Passing Familiarity with AWS technologies such as EC2, IAM, or operating Lambda functions.
Comfort with collaboration, open communication, and reaching across functional borders.

jobs.Job_Description:
Job Brief
We have an urgent requirement for a Project Coordinator ready to join immediately.
JOB DESCRIPTION:
Effective Project Coordinator is a crucial factor in successful project management. It is much easier to coordinate a project when you have a team that can meet its demands (both in terms of skills and availability).
KEY RESPONSIBILITIES
Resource planning and allocation. Assigning people to projects based on their skills, previous experience, availability, or project budget.
Capacity planning. Project Coordinator needs to make sure that their organization’s resources have enough capacity to deliver upcoming projects.
Supporting project managers in ongoing resource management efforts. A project manager is often the first person to spot problems: employee overutilization, uneven workload, or overtime. A Project Coordinator can step in and help PMs by reallocating resources, adjusting goals or requirements, or assigning new people to the team.
KEY SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE REQUIRED FOR THIS ROLE –
Managing Resource Allocations for Internal, External Projects and as well as learning allocations.
Providing Project Management team with Ongoing Resource Management and related Support.
Responsible for ensuring team member utilization.
Work with Management to review metrics like Billable Resource Utilization
Providing Time Entries, Schedule Board, and other necessary access to new Team Members for Dynamics 365.
Checking for Time Entries mismatches from Resource and comparing it with allocations every Friday.
Coordinating with Project Manager for approving the Time Entries every Friday.
Managing hours utilized by the External Resources.
Handling queries from Resources related to Time Entry, Allocations and Project Hours on tasks, etc.
Managing and planning license requirements for the customers.
Managing and planning license budget and quotation as per the requirements.
Manage and Planning License migration and changes as per the requirements.
Managing Microsoft and other license new changes or updates.
Managing All the licensing price and cost details with SKU and offers.
Responsible for the customer license additional requirement about upgrade and downgrade etc.
Managing the license renewal for the customers.
Basic Knowledge of making project plans in MPP
Qualification:
- Minimum Bachelor’s Degree from reputed university
- Bachelor’s Degree in engineering, master’s in business administration or CA will be preferred.
Additional Soft Skills & Requirements
Must have positive attitude and be approachable.
Should have a learning mindset, willingness to evolve and go the extra-mile.
Creative with new ideas, ways and initiatives and ability to execute the plan.
Willingness to work on flexible shifts as per the projects assigned. (USA/Canada/Middle East/India/Australia)

jobs.Job_Description:
Job_Description:

We are looking for a skilled and experienced DevOps Expert with 3-6 year experience a strong background in AWS and microservices architecture. As a key member of our engineering team, you will work closely with developers, architects, and operations teams to design, implement, and manage the infrastructure, CI/CD pipelines, and automation systems that support our cloud-based applications. Your expertise will be instrumental in optimizing the performance, scalability, and reliability of our microservices platform deployed on AWS

Role & responsibilities

AWS Infrastructure Management: - Design, implement, and maintain scalable and cost-effective cloud infrastructure using AWS services such as EC2, S3, RDS, Lambda, CloudFormation, ECS, EKS, and more. - Automate infrastructure provisioning and configuration using Infrastructure as Code (IaC) tools such as Terraform, AWS CloudFormation, or Ansible.

Microservices Deployment: - Deploy and manage microservices-based applications in a containerized environment (using Docker and Kubernetes) on AWS using ECS/EKS. - Design and manage CI/CD pipelines for building, testing, and deploying microservices applications using tools like Jenkins, GitLab CI, or AWS CodePipeline.

Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment (CI/CD): - Develop and maintain CI/CD pipelines to automate code integration, testing, and deployment processes, ensuring faster release cycles. - Collaborate with development teams to implement automated testing and quality assurance processes.

Monitoring and Performance Optimization: - Set up monitoring, logging, and alerting solutions using AWS CloudWatch, Prometheus, Grafana, and ELK Stack (Elasticsearch, Logstash, Kibana). - Analyze application and infrastructure performance to proactively address issues and improve reliability, scalability, and security

Security and Compliance: - Implement best practices for security and compliance within the AWS cloud environment, including network security, data encryption, identity, and access management (IAM). - Collaborate with security teams to manage vulnerabilities, apply patches, and ensure infrastructure is secure.

Experience: -

Proven experience in DevOps or Cloud Engineering roles with expertise in AWS and Microservices. - Strong hands-on experience with containerization technologies (Docker) and orchestration tools (Kubernetes, ECS, EKS). - Experience with Infrastructure as Code (IaC) tools such as Terraform, AWS CloudFormation, or Ansible. - In-depth knowledge of CI/CD practices and tools such as Jenkins, GitLab CI, AWS CodePipeline, or similar.

Technical Skills: -

Solid understanding of AWS services such as EC2, S3, Lambda, CloudFormation, VPC, RDS, DynamoDB, etc. - Expertise in microservices design, deployment, and management within cloud environments. - Strong knowledge of version control tools like Git and collaboration tools like Jira, Confluence. - Familiarity with configuration management tools such as Chef, Puppet, or SaltStack. - Knowledge of monitoring and logging tools like Prometheus, Grafana, ELK Stack, and AWS CloudWatch. - Proficiency in scripting languages such as Python, Shell, or Bash.



Preferred candidate profile

Preferred Qualifications: -

AWS Certifications (e.g., AWS Certified Solutions Architect Associate, AWS Certified DevOps Engineer Professional). - Experience with serverless architecture (AWS Lambda, API Gateway). - Familiarity with Kafka, RabbitMQ, or other messaging systems used in microservices architectures. - Experience with database technologies (SQL, NoSQL, and caching mechanisms such as Redis or Memcached). - Knowledge of Agile/Scrum methodologies.

Perks and benefits

Competitive salary and benefits package. - Opportunities for professional growth and certification. - Flexible work hours and remote working options. - Collaborative and innovative work environment.

jobs.Skills_Required: Content Creation, Sales, Tutoring, IELTS, Business Development, Teaching
jobs.Job_Description:
Job_Description- We are a growing education company dedicated to helping students achieve their desired scores on the Pearson Test of English (PTE). Our team is passionate about delivering exceptional tutoring services while constantly developing new content to support our students' learning journeys. We're seeking a dynamic and highly skilled individual to join our team as a PTE Tutor who can also create engaging educational content and take on sales executive responsibilities. Position Overview: As a PTE Tutor & Content Creator, you will be responsible for tutoring students to help them achieve their desired PTE scores, particularly aiming for a score of 79 or higher. Additionally, you will be involved in content creation and sales activities to support our company's growth. This hybrid role will require you to balance teaching, content development, and sales, contributing to both student success and company revenue. Key Responsibilities: PTE Tutoring: Provide one-on-one or group tutoring sessions to students preparing for the PTE exam. Tailor lesson plans and teaching methods to meet the individual needs of students. Monitor student progress and provide constructive feedback to help improve performance. Content Creation: Develop high-quality PTE study materials, including practice tests, study guides, and video tutorials. Ensure content aligns with the latest PTE exam patterns and is up-to-date with changes in test formats. Collaborate with the team to enhance existing learning resources and ensure a diverse range of content. Sales Executive Responsibilities: Promote and sell tutoring packages and services to prospective clients. Maintain client relationships and offer consultations to help students choose the right PTE preparation package. Meet sales targets and contribute to business growth by identifying new opportunities and clients. Administrative & Reporting Duties: Maintain accurate records of student progress, sales activities, and content development. Assist in marketing efforts, including social media and email campaigns, to attract new students. Qualifications & Requirements: PTE Score: Minimum of 79 in PTE with a strong understanding of the test format and strategies. Proven experience in tutoring, preferably in PTE preparation. Strong written and verbal communication skills. Ability to create engaging and high-quality educational content. Experience in sales, with the ability to meet targets and close deals. Self-motivated, proactive, and able to work independently and as part of a team. Strong organizational and time-management skills. Benefits: Competitive salary with performance-based bonuses. Paid leaves and holidays. Opportunities for career growth and development. Flexible work arrangements (remote options available). A dynamic and supportive team environment. If you are passionate about education, content creation, and sales, and you have a proven track record of success in PTE preparation, we would love to hear from you!


Preferred candidate profile Must have 79 in PTE. We will highly prioritize you if you will create good content for our company, additionally if you have digital marketing and sales experience You will be on top of the list.


Perks and benefits Performance bonus, 1.5 time overtime and annual leave.

jobs.Job_Description:
Position Overview

We are looking for a highly skilled Multimedia Editor & Graphic Design Specialist to manage the overall graphic and media requirements of our e-commerce store and social media channels. This person will be responsible for product image editing, social media content creation, video reels production, and website graphics. The ideal candidate must possess exceptional creativity and technical skills to ensure that all brand visuals are professional, consistent, and aligned with our marketing objectives.

You will work with cross-functional teams, including Digital Marketing, Development, and Content teams, to ensure cohesive branding across platforms. This is a hands-on role where quick turnaround and quality output are equally critical.

Key Responsibilities

1. Product Image Editing & Optimization

Retouch, enhance, and edit product images using Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator to ensure a premium visual presentation for our e-commerce store.

Prepare optimized images for web and mobile platforms to improve loading speed and SEO performance.

2. Social Media Visual Content Creation

Design engaging graphics and visual content for Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, and other platforms to increase engagement and conversions.

Develop ads, banners, and promotional visuals for campaigns and events to boost online visibility.

Manage and maintain brand consistency across all social media platforms.

3. Video Editing & Reels Production

Create high-quality, short-form videos and reels for Instagram and TikTok using Adobe Premiere Pro and After Effects to highlight products and promotions.

Develop product explainer videos, behind-the-scenes content, and visually compelling video ads.

Add motion graphics and animated effects to reels for maximum engagement.

4. Website & Email Graphics

Design and update graphics for our website and email campaigns, ensuring alignment with brand identity.

Create visuals for product pages, banners, and collection pages, ensuring each design resonates with the corresponding product category.

5. Cross-functional Collaboration & Project Management

Collaborate with the Digital Marketing Executive, Content Writer, and Developers to align visuals with marketing strategies and technical requirements.

Coordinate with the team to ensure all design tasks are completed on time and meet brand guidelines.

Provide feedback and fresh design ideas to improve visual consistency across all materials.

6. Brand Identity Management

Ensure that all visual assets maintain a consistent brand identity and align with the companys growth goals and vision.

Manage and organize digital assets for easy access and reusability across projects.

Key Skills & Qualifications

Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite- Advanced skills in Photoshop, Illustrator, Premiere Pro, and After Effects.

Product Image Editing- Expertise in image retouching, color correction, and background removal.

Video Editing & Motion Graphics- Ability to create engaging reels with motion graphics and other special effects.

Social Media Content Creation- Experience designing creative posts, reels, and ads for platforms like Instagram, Facebook, and TikTok.

Web and Email Graphics- Knowledge of website graphics, banners, and email campaign visuals.

Preferred Qualifications

Experience working with Shopify or WooCommerce platforms.

Familiarity with SEO principles for visual content optimization (image compression, video SEO tags).

Strong understanding of UI/UX design principles to improve user engagement.

Time management and project coordination skills to meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment.

Personal Attributes

Creative Visionary: Ability to think outside the box and create visuals that resonate with our brand and audience.

Detail-Oriented- Meticulous attention to detail in all visual work, ensuring the highest quality standards.

Strong Collaborator- Comfortable working in a team environment and communicating effectively with cross-functional teams.

Quick Turnaround- Ability to work efficiently under tight deadlines without compromising quality.

Problem Solver- Proactively identify issues and offer innovative design solutions.

Why Join Us?

Opportunity to manage the entire visual identity of a fast-growing e-commerce company.

Work remotely with a dynamic, collaborative team, following a set work schedule.

Gain experience working with global markets and expand your portfolio with high-impact projects.

Make a direct impact on the growth and success of the brand through your creativity and expertise.

Experience: 2+ years
Salary : INR 6,00,000-9,00,000 / year
Preferred Notice Period: Within 30 Days
Shift: 10:00AM to 7:00PM IST
Opportunity Type: Remote
Placement Type: Permanent

(*Note: This is a requirement for one of Uplers' Partners)

What do you need for this opportunity
Must have skills required :
UI/UX, API Testing, Automated Testing, Functional Tests, Manual Testing, Playwright, POSTMAN
Good to have skills :
car rental operations, coding terminology, MongoDB

Our Hiring Partner is Looking for:
Quality Assurance Engineer who is passionate about their work, eager to learn and grow, and who is committed to delivering exceptional results. If you are a team player, with a positive attitude and a desire to make a difference, then we want to hear from you.

Role Overview Description
We are looking for a talented individual who has the ability to improve the product experience for a user through functional & usability testing. This would include, Preparing & Executing Test Cases: Develop and implement test cases for newly developed functionalities. Identifying & Documenting Bugs: Detect, document, and track bugs to ensure swift resolution.
Building a Zero-Error Framework: Establish frameworks and practices aimed at achieving zero-error products.
Creating User Documentation: Innovatively create user manuals and help documentation.

Responsibilities:
Thorough Testing: Design and execute comprehensive test cases covering both positive and negative scenarios.
Attention to Detail: Maintain a keen eye for detail and accuracy in identifying and documenting bugs.
Agile Collaboration: Work effectively within a small, agile team environment.
Innovative Documentation: Develop creative and user-friendly documentation to support product use.

Requirements:
2 Years of experience in manual and automated testing of enterprise-grade web/mobile applications.
Knowledge of testing tools like Playwright
Experience with API testing using tools like Postman
Experience in creating & executing functional tests, usability tests and integration tests.
Creating detailed bug reports, to foster smooth resolution of bugs.
Knowledge and demonstrable understanding of user interaction and interface flow UI/UX within a desktop & mobile context.
You love new technologies and approaches and want to use the best tool available. We want people who can help us continually evolve our stack.
Excellent communication skills (spoken and written).
Strong sense of ownership, urgency, and drive.
Have the ability to work independently.

Good to have:
Familiarity with MongoDB
Considerable understanding with coding and technology terminology
Knowledge & experience in the operations of the car rental industry

Interview Process:
2 Rounds of tech interview (testing related)
L1 : one with a veteran tester
L2 : with a tech person for general tech fit evaluation
L3: with one of the co-founders

How to apply for this opportunity
Register or login on our portal
Click 'Apply,' upload your resume and fill in the required details.
Post this click Apply Now' to submit your application.
Get matched and crack a quick interview with our hiring partner.
Land your global dream job and get your exciting career started!

About Our Hiring Partner:
Indecab is an ecosystem for automation of car-rental operations. We enable car-rental companies & corporates to manage and automate the flow of bookings, duty slips and invoices between them. Using state of the art software and workflow processes that provide superior operations management while increasing transparency and control.

About Uplers:
Our goal is to make hiring reliable, simple, and fast. Our role will be to help all our talents find and apply for relevant opportunities and progress in their career. We will support any grievances or challenges you may face during the engagement. You will also be assigned to a dedicated Talent Success Coach during the engagement.

(Note: There are many more opportunities apart from this on the portal. Depending on the assessments you clear, you can apply for them as well).

So, if you are ready for a new challenge, a great work environment, and an opportunity to take your career to the next level, don't hesitate to apply today. We are waiting for you!

Job_Description : Project Manager
Job Title: Project Manager
Company: Healsway Systems Solution Limited
Website: www.healsway.in
Location: Remote (Indian and UK Mix Timeline)
Travel Requirement: Must be willing to travel to London, the United States, and Saharanpur manufacturing unit as needed.
Company Overview:
Healsway Systems Solution Limited is a global leader in luxury furniture and handicrafts. Headquartered in Banbury, UK, with a manufacturing unit in Saharanpur, India, the company specializes in affordable, antique-carved luxury furniture that blends traditional craftsmanship with modern technology.
Role Summary:
The Project Manager will oversee the complete lifecycle of diverse projects across manufacturing, IT, and IoT domains, ensuring timely and successful delivery while managing scope, budget, and stakeholder expectations.
Key Responsibilities:
Develop detailed project plans, timelines, and resource requirements.
Manage the execution of projects to ensure on-time and within-budget delivery.
Collaborate with design, manufacturing, IT, and IoT teams for seamless project execution.
Identify and mitigate risks, ensuring project continuity.
Communicate progress, risks, and outcomes with stakeholders effectively.
Leverage advanced tools for project tracking and reporting.
Ensure compliance with company policies and regulatory requirements.
Maintain comprehensive project documentation.
Be available for international and domestic travel to address project requirements.
Required Skills and Qualifications:
Experience: 1-3 years of project management experience in manufacturing, IT, or IoT projects.
Education: Bachelors degree in Business Administration, Engineering, IT, or a related field. PMP or PRINCE2 certification is preferred.
Technical Expertise:
Familiarity with lean manufacturing, Six Sigma, MES, PLM, CAD/CAM, and Industry 4.0 technologies.
Proficiency in IT infrastructure, Agile methodologies, IoT platforms, and cybersecurity standards.
Knowledge of smart factory concepts and connected device management.
Soft Skills:
Leadership and team management abilities.
Strong problem-solving and organizational skills.
Effective communication and stakeholder engagement skills.
Adaptability to work across Indian and UK time zones.
Salary:
Competitive, with a substantial hike on the current salary as per industry standards.
Why Join Us?
Be part of a global team at the forefront of the luxury furniture and handicrafts market.
Gain exposure to innovative projects and advanced technologies.
Enjoy professional growth opportunities in a dynamic and inclusive work environment.
Equal Opportunity Employer:
Healsway Systems Solution Limited celebrates diversity and inclusion, offering equal employment opportunities to all qualified candidates.

Position Overview:

We are seeking a skilled Data Analyst to join one of our big client, specializing in
comprehensive data exploration, transaction analysis, and insights generation within the
company shares ecosystem.

Role Summary

Position: Data Analyst
Experience Required: 2-3 Years
Location: Rohini-Delhi, Gurugram

About Client

At UnlistedSharesIndia, we are revolutionizing the unlisted shares marketplace through
meticulous data analysis, strategic insights, and innovative transaction management.

Our Culture

We value analytical precision, continuous learning, and a proactive approach to
understanding complex financial landscapes. Our ideal candidate is a detail-oriented
professional who can transform raw data into actionable business intelligence.

Key Responsibilities:

Data Discovery and Extraction:
- Identify and source critical data sets related to unlisted shares from diverse financial
platforms, databases, and market repositories.
- Develop robust data retrieval and verification mechanisms to ensure accuracy and
comprehensiveness.

Transaction Analysis:
- Execute and monitor share transfer transactions across NSDL and CDSL platforms.
- Create comprehensive transaction logs and performance tracking systems.

Insights Generation:
- Develop advanced analytical models to identify market trends, valuation patterns, and
investment opportunities in the unlisted shares domain.

strategic recommendations.

Qualifications:

* Advanced proficiency in data analysis tools (Python, R, SQL).
* Strong Excel and visualization skills (Tableau, PowerBI).
* Deep understanding of Indian financial markets and regulatory frameworks.

Exceptional written and verbal communication skills

jobs.Job_Description:
Roles and Responsibilities

He/she is expected to understand and interpret various medical records. He should be able to review medical charts including consultation, follow-up notes, operative reports, laboratory reports, progress notes, history and physical examination notes, medication reconciliation records, medication administration records, radiology report, EMG/Nerve conduction study, Doppler studies, rhythm strip records, myocardial perfusion study, and anesthesia records, ambulance records, ED triage records, emergency department records, and discharge summaries, physiotherapy records, occupational therapy records, chiropractic therapy records, acupuncture therapy and psychotherapy records. He should be able to accurately interpret psychology records, independent examinations, agreed examinations, qualified medical examinations, peer reviews and pre-authorization records. The summarizer is expected to summarize medico-legal documents like first report of injury, worker's comp claim form, depositions, recorded statements, stipulations, Compromise and Release Records etc., application for adjudication of claims, various other claim forms.

The summarizer is expected to be well versed with medical terminology and physiology. He should be able to verify coding & labeling of medical pages, reviewing and classifying various medical documents and pages, medical aspect of follow-up request.
The medical summarizer is expected to do clinical analysis of medical records to assess the causation of the event, compensability of the event, treatment appropriateness, disability evaluations, limitations and restrictions, apportionment.

Desired Candidate Profile
Identification, understanding and analysis of clinical data, history of injury or illness, treatment modalities, medications and other clinical facts from the various medical records such as radiology reports, discharge summary (s), triage record, follow-up visits, pathology reports etc.

Examine, assess and documentation of the medical records chronologically.

Authoring medical chronologies which provide a concise reference to all pertinent medical information. Identifying missing medical records for reconciliation and retrieval requests.

Interpreting and summarizing handwritten notes.

Skills and Education:

Education: The candidate should be at least a graduate in life science (pharmacology, microbiology, nursing, physical/occupational therapy)

Skills: The candidate should be well versed with MS Office applications. Typing skills are mandatory with at least 40 WPM. He/she should have excellent spoken and written English language skills.

Details

Qualification - any graduate or Post graduate only from science background
Shift timings - 12pm to 9pm
Working days - Mon to Sat (6 days)
Type - Full time
Work mode - Work from home
Candidates should join immediately
Freshers and experienced in only Medical Record Summarizer both can apply
Salary - Freshers - 13k to15k CTC, Experienced in Medical Record Summarizer - based on the previous salary
Experience in any other background will not be considered as experienced, will consider them as fresher.
Candidates who are planning for further studies are not eligible

Please note : Candidates who are pursuing their studies, any internship or any other courses are not eligible and should have Work from home setup like (Laptop, Wifi, power backup, good electricity)


Laptop, wifi and power backup are mandatory




Thanks & Regards,
Manuganti Preethi
Medidocx

jobs.Skills_Required: Excel, Financial Modelling, Company Valuation, Financial Analysis, Financial Statement Analysis, Financial Planning, Equity Research
jobs.Job_Description:
What we are and what we do:-
Gallagher & Mohan is a distinguished firm dedicated to providing unparalleled financial analysis, marketing expertise, and accounting support within the dynamic realm of real estate. We cater to a diverse clientele comprising private equity investors, developers, fund managers, and brokers, among others. Renowned for our commitment to excellence, effective communication, and unwavering work ethic, we seamlessly integrate into our clients' operations to deliver exceptional value. Our portfolio encompasses a spectrum of transactions, spanning from multifamily apartment complexes to office towers in the United States and Europe, with transactional values ranging from $10 million USD to upwards of $200 million USD. 

Financial Analyst (DCF Modeling Expert)

Role Overview:
As a Financial Analyst at Gallagher & Mohan, your primary focus will be on leveraging Discounted Cash Flow (DCF) modeling to deliver sophisticated financial analysis and insights. You will be responsible for creating and managing complex financial models, optimizing asset valuations, and providing actionable recommendations based on detailed DCF analyses.

Role & responsibilities
DCF Modeling: Construct and refine Discounted Cash Flow (DCF) models to evaluate investment opportunities, asset performance, and future cash flows. Provide in-depth analysis and interpretation of model outputs.
Model Optimization: Optimize and update Argus models to reflect changing market conditions, investment strategies, and financial structures. Ensure models are aligned with current financial practices and industry standards.
Market Analysis: Conduct detailed market research and analysis to support Argus , Multi family assets and DCF modeling, including assessing property comparables and evaluating market trends.
Reporting & Insights: Prepare and present detailed financial reports and insights based on Argus and DCF analyses. Communicate findings and strategic recommendations to senior management and clients.
Collaboration: Work closely with internal teams during acquisitions, dispositions, and development projects, providing specialized Argus and DCF analysis to support strategic decision-making.
Performance Evaluation: Assess and report on the performance of investments using key performance indicators (KPIs) such as IRR and Cash-on-Cash returns, integrating these metrics into Argus and DCF models.

Requirements Skills, Knowledge, and Abilities:
Educational Background: Bachelors degree in Real Estate, Business, Economics, Finance, or a related field.
Argus Expertise: Extensive experience with Argus Enterprise software, including developing and managing detailed financial models for real estate assets.
DCF Proficiency: Strong proficiency in Discounted Cash Flow (DCF) modeling, with the ability to create and analyze complex financial models and scenarios.
Experience: 1-4 years of experience in financial modeling with a focus on Argus and DCF methodologies and Multi family assets . Background in equity research, investment banking, or real estate finance is advantageous.
Analytical Skills: Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills, with a focus on deriving actionable insights from Argus and DCF analyses.
Communication: Strong written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to present complex financial concepts and findings effectively to diverse stakeholders.
Organization: Excellent organizational skills, with the ability to manage multiple tasks and priorities in a fast-paced environment.
Team Collaboration: Proven ability to work effectively with cross-functional teams and contribute to a collaborative team environment.

Preferred candidate profile
Software Proficiency: Advanced skills in Microsoft Office Suite, especially Excel, for financial modeling and analysis.
Advanced Degree: Masters degree in finance, Business, Real Estate, or Economics is preferred.
Certifications: Candidates who have completed or are working towards CFA, CA, or FRM certifications will be considered favorably.
Additional Software Knowledge: Familiarity with other real estate software/programs, such as Yardi Voyager and Google Earth, will be a plus.

Job Details:
Title: Financial Analyst
Department: Financial Analysis
Employment Type: Full-Time, Permanent
Location: Remote (New Delhi)
Shift Timings: EST/PST (US Time Zone)

jobs.Job_Description:
About the company
Treebo Hospitality Ventures is Indias most loved brand and one of the largest chains in the budget segment of hospitality. With a network of 850+ hotels across 120+ cities, Treebo offers travellers the unprecedented value proposition of high-quality stays at affordable prices wherever they go. We are proud of putting dignity back into budget travel where earlier the traveller was forced to contend with poor quality and hygiene. 
Treebo Hospitality Ventures masterfully combines engineering prowess with deep hospitality expertise. jobs.Job_Description:
Driving Innovation: Join Us as a Quality Associate (Voice) at CARS24!

What drives us?
Imagine: a single tap on your phone unlocks a world that transforms your entire car ownership journey, covering every milestone - from finding your perfect match to keeping it running smoothly, to selling it later. That's the future we're building at CARS24. Our mission is to ensure car ownership is stress-free. We want our customers to focus on the open road, not roadside worries. We're building a one-stop shop - a Super App for all their car needs, powered by technology, data science, and deep customer insights. We are already one of the largest Autotech companies in the world, but we are not stopping here. We aim to grow 10x in the next five years.

What will you drive?
Call Monitoring and Evaluation:
Listen to and evaluate calls made by Retail Associates (RAs) to ensure adherence to CARS24's quality standards, policies, and procedures.
Assess the accuracy and relevance of the information provided by RAs during the calls.
Ensure compliance with company guidelines, including legal and ethical standards.
Feedback and Reporting:
Provide detailed and constructive feedback to RAs based on call evaluations.
Identify areas for improvement and recommend training or corrective actions.
Prepare and present reports on call quality, highlighting trends, areas for improvement, and best practices.
Training and Development:

Participate in calibration sessions with other Quality Auditors and team leads to ensure consistency in call grading.
Continuous Improvement:

Stay updated with the latest industry trends and best practices in quality assurance and customer service.

Who are we looking for?

Odia, Hindi

Excellent listening and analytical skills.

Personal Attributes:
High level of integrity and professionalism.

Work from Home

A dynamic and supportive work environment.

jobs.Job_Description:
Department: G&A Operations
Employment Type: Full Time
Location: India
Reporting To: Shibanarayan Behera

Description
At Vitech, we believe in the power of technology to simplify complex business processes. Our mission is to bring better software solutions to market, addressing the intricacies of the insurance and retirement industries. We combine deep domain expertise with the latest technological advancements to deliver innovative, user-centric solutions that future-proof and empower our clients to thrive in an ever-changing landscape. With over 1,600 talented professionals on our team, our innovative solutions are recognized by industry leaders like Gartner, Celent, Aite-Novarica, and ISG.

We offer a competitive compensation package along with comprehensive benefits that support your health, well-being, and financial security.

Security G&A (Governance and Administration) Manager

Job Description

Who We Are Looking For: We are seeking a Security Governance and Administration (G&A) Manager to lead the development and execution of our security governance framework. If you have a deep understanding of security risks, policies, and compliance standards, along with expertise in Identity and Access Management (IAM), this role is for you. You will oversee security processes and ensure that our security policies are effectively communicated and implemented across the organization.

Why This Role Matters: As the Security G&A Manager, you will play a pivotal role in protecting our organization’s critical assets. You will ensure that our security governance framework not only meets regulatory requirements but also aligns with our broader business goals. Your work will directly impact the organization’s security posture, making sure we are compliant, risk-aware, and always prepared for the evolving security landscape.

What you will do:
Create and implement a security governance framework that aligns with both business goals and industry regulations.
Manage IdentityNow and Delinea Secret Server PAM solutions to secure privileged access across the organization.
Develop and maintain security policies, standards, and procedures, ensuring they are understood and applied company-wide.
Conduct regular risk assessments and implement mitigation strategies to protect against security threats.
Ensure compliance with relevant security standards and regulations such as ISO 27001, HIPAA, and GDPR.
Oversee security audits, assess the effectiveness of security controls, and identify areas for improvement.
Manage third-party vendor security and continually seek opportunities to enhance the company’s security posture.
Who You Are:
A professional with a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Security, or a related field.
A certified expert, preferably with CISSP or CISM.
You have at least 10 years of experience in information security management or a similar field.
Experienced in working with operating systems such as Windows, UNIX, Linux, and databases.
Knowledgeable in IAM tools, particularly SailPoint and Delinea PAM.
You have strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to work both independently and as part of a team.
Proficient in various scripting and programming languages (e.g., Java, Perl, Python, PowerShell), which is a plus.

What We're Looking For:
Expertise in conducting risk assessments and managing security risks.
A proven track record of developing and implementing security policies and frameworks.
Strong experience in incident response and managing security incidents.
Thorough knowledge of security auditing, compliance, and maintaining security standards.
Experience in managing relationships with third-party vendors and ensuring their security measures meet organizational standards.
The ability to educate and raise security awareness across the organization.
A technical understanding of security technologies, tools, and best practices.

Why You’ll Want to Join:
This is an opportunity to drive meaningful change in a company that values security and innovation. You will have the chance to shape our security governance, manage cutting-edge IAM solutions like IdentityNow and Delinea, and ensure privileged access is securely controlled. Your efforts will make a lasting impact as you continuously enhance our security environment and partner with cross-functional teams to mitigate risks and manage third-party vendors.

At Vitech, you’ll be part of a forward-thinking team that values collaboration, innovation, and continuous improvement. We provide a supportive and inclusive environment where you can grow as a leader while helping shape the future of our organization.

We are looking for a Lead/Senior Automation Engineer to join our team. The ideal candidate will have experience in designing and implementing automation frameworks and test suites for web applications with minimal inputs. This role will be responsible for leading a team of automation engineers and ensuring that automation project is delivered on time and to the highest quality.

Roles and responsibilities:
Formulate and review software testing strategies to ensure effective and comprehensive testing of the school ERP system.

Compile and publish accurate and timely information to support decision making, prioritization, and status assessment, providing stakeholders with the necessary data to make informed decisions about the software's readiness for release.
Use risk-driven techniques to develop, maintain, and execute test suites for various platforms, focusing testing efforts on high-risk areas and ensuring adequate coverage to mitigate potential risks.

jobs.Job_Description:
Contribute to our event-driven Microservice Architecture (currently 200+ services owned by 40+ teams). You will define and maintain the services your team owns (you design it, you build it, you run it, you scale it globally)
Use Java 17 , Spring Boot and JOOQ to build your services.
Expose and consume RESTful APIs . We value good API design and we treat our APIs as Products (in the world of Open Banking often times they are gonna be public!)
Use SNS + SQS and Kafka to send events
Utilise PostgreSQL via Aurora as your primary datastore (we are heavy AWS users)
Deploy your services to Production as often as you need to (this usually means multiple times per day!). This is enabled by our CI/CD pipelines powered by GitHub with GitHub actions , and solid JUnit/Pact testing (new joiners are encouraged to have something deployed to production in their first 2 weeks)
Experience modern GitOps using ArgoCD . Our Cloud team uses Docker, Terraform, EKS/Kubernetes to run the platform.
Have DataDog as your best friend to monitor your services and investigate issues
Collaborate closely with Product Owners to understand our Users needs, Business opportunities and Regulatory requirements and translate them into well-engineered solutions
WHAT WE ARE LOOKING FOR:
Have some experience building server-side applications and detailed knowledge of the relevant programming languages for your stack. You don t need to know Java, but bear in mind that most of our services are written in Java, so you need to be willing to learn it when you have to change something there!
Have a sound knowledge of a backend framework (e.g. Spring/Spring Boot) that you ve used to write microservices that expose and consume RESTful APIs
Have experience engineering scalable and reliable solutions in a cloud-native environment (the most important thing for us is understanding the fundamentals of CI/CD, practical Agile so to speak)
Demonstrate a mindset of delivering secure, well-tested and well-documented software that integrates with various third party providers and partners (we do that a lot in the fintech industry)
OUR TECH STACK:
Java 17 , Spring Boot and JOOQ to build the RESTful APIs of our microservices
Event-driven architecture with messages over SNS+SQS and Kafka to make them reliable
Primary datastores are MySQL and PostgreSQL via RDS or Aurora (we are heavy AWS users)
Docker, Terraform, EKS/Kubernetes used by the Cloud team to run the platform
DataDog, ElasticSearch/Fluentd/Kibana and Rollbar to keep it running
GitHub with GitHub actions for Sonarcloud, Snyk and solid JUnit/Pact testing to power the CI/CD pipeline

This role is responsible for producing KPI tracking reports and extracting key data into suitable format to enable the Poland business unit to manage performance. jobs.Job_Description:
Job_Description:

We are looking for a highly skilled and motivated Business Analyst with experience in the Telecom domain and expertise in PEGA and Azure to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will work closely with business stakeholders and development teams to gather and analyze requirements, ensuring that business solutions align with customer needs and project objectives. You will play a pivotal role in bridging the gap between business and IT, driving the development and optimization of telecom solutions.

Key Responsibilities:

Requirements Gathering & Analysis: Collaborate with business stakeholders, subject matter experts (SMEs), and technical teams to gather, document, and analyze business requirements and processes.
Elicit, document, and communicate functional and non-functional requirements related to telecom solutions, focusing on PEGA and Azure platforms.
Conduct workshops, interviews, and surveys to identify business needs and translate them into actionable requirements.
Solution Design & Process Optimization: Assist in designing telecom solutions based on business needs, ensuring alignment with PEGA and Azure capabilities.
Analyze existing business processes and recommend process improvements and automation strategies within the telecom domain.
Develop use cases, user stories, and business process models to ensure effective communication with stakeholders and the development team.
PEGA & Azure Expertise: Provide expertise in PEGA platform for business process management (BPM) and customer relationship management (CRM).
Assist in configuring PEGA applications and workflows based on business requirements.
Support integration efforts with Azure cloud services, ensuring smooth data flows, applications, and system integrations.
Work with technical teams to ensure the solution meets scalability, security, and performance requirements in a cloud environment
Stakeholder Management & Reporting: Act as a liaison between business users, technical teams, and third-party vendors.
Provide regular updates to stakeholders on project progress, risks, and issues. Maintain clear and concise documentation of business and functional requirements, process flows, and technical specifications.
Training & Support: Assist in the development of training materials for end-users and support teams. Provide ongoing support for telecom solutions post-implementation, addressing user inquiries and troubleshooting issues.

Key Skills & Qualifications:

Educational Background: Bachelors degree in Business Administration, Information Technology, or related field. Advanced certifications in Business Analysis or Telecom solutions are a plus.
Experience: 3+ years of experience as a Business Analyst in the Telecom industry, working on projects related to BSS/OSS, CRM, or network systems.
Hands-on experience with PEGA BPM or CRM tools for process automation and workflow design.
Familiarity with Azure cloud services, including integrations, data management, and cloud-based architectures.
Skills: Strong proficiency in business analysis techniques such as requirements elicitation, use case development, process mapping, and gap analysis.
Familiarity with Agile, Scrum, or other project management methodologies. Knowledge of telecom billing systems, customer service platforms, and network management solutions. Excellent problem-solving, communication, and presentation skills.
Ability to translate complex business needs into technical specifications.
Certifications: PEGA Business Analyst (PBA) or similar certifications are a plus. Azure certifications are a bonus.

jobs.Job_Description:
Role & responsibilities
As a Mechanical Draftsman specializing in static equipment, Mechanical equipment, pressure vessels and storage tanks, you will play a crucial role in the development and creation of accurate and detailed shop drawings. Your primary responsibility will be to transform conceptual designs and engineering specifications into comprehensive and precise 2D and 3D drawings, ensuring compliance with industry standards, codes, and project requirements.

Key Responsibilities:
Collaborate with the engineering and design teams to understand project requirements, specifications, and design criteria for pressure vessels and storage tanks.
Prepare detailed shop drawings, assembly drawings, and fabrication drawings for both new and existing products, adhering to drafting standards and best practices.
Utilize CAD software (such as AutoCAD, SolidWorks, or similar tools) to create accurate 2D and 3D models of pressure vessels and storage tanks.
Perform necessary calculations and dimensioning to ensure the structural integrity and functionality of the products.
Verify and review drawings for accuracy, completeness, and adherence to project standards before final submission.
Coordinate with manufacturing personnel to address any technical issues during fabrication and assembly processes.
Maintain proper documentation and records related to drafting work, revisions, and changes made during the design and manufacturing stages.
Stay updated with industry trends, codes, and standards related to pressure vessels and storage tanks to ensure compliance and best practices in drafting.

Preferred candidate profile
Minimum 8 years of proven experience as a Mechanical Draftsman with a focus on Static equipment, pressure vessels and storage tanks.
Proficiency in using industry-standard CAD software (e.g., AutoCAD, Inventor, SolidWorks) to develop detailed 2D and 3D drawings.
Familiarity with relevant codes and standards related to pressure vessels and storage tanks, such as ASME BPVC, API 650, API 620, etc.
Strong understanding of engineering principles, materials, and fabrication processes related to pressure vessels and storage tanks.
Excellent attention to detail and the ability to produce accurate and error-free drawings.
Effective communication skills to collaborate with cross-functional teams and convey technical information clearly.
Bachelor's degree or equivalent in Mechanical Engineering, Drafting, or a related field is preferred but not mandatory.
Proactive problem-solving skills and the ability to work independently as well as part of a team.

Sales Executive Job Description
Job title: Sales Executive Corporate Accounts
Seniority: Mid-level
Location: Prasasan nagar, Jubilee hills, Hyderabad 33.
Hours: Full-time, Monday to Saturday, 10:00 AM 7:00 PM

About Airavat Homecare Pvt.Ltd
Airavat Homecare Pvt.Ltd is an innovative and customer-focused organization, specializing in housekeeping - cleaning chemicals distribution . We pride ourselves on delivering market-leading solutions that empower our clients to achieve success. Our team is driven by passion, creativity, and a commitment to excellence, making Airavat Homecare Pvt.Ltd a standout employer in our field.
As part of our sales team, you will join a dynamic and collaborative environment where your contributions directly impact our companys growth and client satisfaction. At Airavat Homecare Pvt.Ltd, we foster a culture of inclusion, professional development, and success, offering our team members opportunities to grow and thrive.

Job Responsibilities
As a Sales Executive, youll drive revenue growth by building relationships, managing accounts, and closing deals. Key responsibilities include:

Identifying new sales opportunities through lead generation, cold calling, and networking.
Conducting product or service presentations tailored to the needs of clients and prospective customers.
Negotiating contracts and agreements, ensuring mutual satisfaction and alignment with company goals.
Overseeing a portfolio of existing accounts, strengthening client relationships, and identifying up selling opportunities.
Collaborating with internal teams, to ensure a seamless client experience.
Staying informed about industry trends, competitors, and emerging market opportunities to maintain a competitive edge.
Representing the company at industry events, conferences, and trade shows to enhance brand visibility and generate leads.

Required Skills, Experience, and Qualifications
Must-have:

Preferably a bachelors degree in business, marketing, or a related field.
Any degree / degree not required
2+ years of proven success in B2B sales, with a track record of meeting or exceeding sales targets.
Persuasive presentation skills, with experience delivering tailored pitches to executives or decision-makers.
Exceptional communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills.
Strong time management and organizational skills to handle multiple clients and deadlines effectively.

Nice-to-have:
Industry-specific experience.
Advanced knowledge of sales techniques, such as consultative selling or value-based selling.

Success Criteria
To excel in this role, we expect you to:
Increase client portfolio by 25% within the first year of employment.
Maintain a customer satisfaction score of 95% or higher in post-sale surveys.
Consistently exceed monthly and quarterly sales goals while maintaining high client satisfaction scores.
Build long-term relationships with clients, demonstrated by repeat business and referrals.
Deliver accurate sales forecasts, identifying potential opportunities for business growth.

Compensation
Base salary: 3L per annum, depending on experience, with the potential for performance-based bonuses.

Application Process
To apply, please submit your resume and a cover letter detailing your qualifications and interest in the sales executive role to operations@homecareshoppe.com. Qualified candidates will be contacted as soon as possible for an initial interview, followed by additional rounds as necessary.
Were excited to find a skilled sales executive to join our growing team and contribute to Airavat Homecare Pvt.Ltd’s success. For inquiries regarding this position or the application process,

Pavan
6302770421

operations@homecareshoppe.com

jobs.Job_Description:
Job Brief:
We are looking for an experienced Full Stack Developer with a strong background in building scalable, maintainable, and modular web applications. The ideal candidate will have extensive experience working with Laravel, managing APIs, and implementing best practices in back-end development. You should be adept at solving complex problems and working collaboratively in an Agile environment to deliver high-quality solutions.

Job Responsibilities:

Application Architecture: Design and develop scalable and maintainable applications following Laravels MVC architecture.
API Development & Integration: Build, test, and integrate RESTful APIs, ensuring seamless communication between front-end and back-end systems.
Database Design: Design and optimize databases using MySQL, ensuring data integrity and scalability for large-scale systems.
Authentication and Authorization: Implement role-based access control (RBAC)
Performance Optimization: Identify bottlenecks and improve application performance by optimizing queries, caching, and database indexing.
Task Scheduling and Queues: Configure Laravel queues and task scheduling to handle background jobs and periodic processes efficiently.
Version Control: Use GitHub or other version control systems to manage codebases, review pull requests, and collaborate effectively.
Agile Workflow: Participate in sprint planning, daily stand-ups, and retrospectives in an Agile/Scrum environment.

Required Skills and Qualifications:

Laravel Expertise: Strong hands-on experience with Laravel, including advanced features like Eloquent ORM, middleware, and service providers.
Database Management: Proficient in designing and managing databases using MySQL. Experience with migrations, seeders, and database optimization techniques.
RESTful APIs: Extensive experience in developing and integrating RESTful APIs.
Authentication Systems: Knowledge of implementing secure authentication systems with JWT.
Caching and Queues: Experience with caching mechanisms (Redis) and Laravel queue drivers for handling background jobs.
Version Control: Proficient in Git and experience with platforms like GitHub.
Security Best Practices: Strong understanding of web security principles, including protection against SQL injection, XSS, and CSRF.
Problem-Solving Skills: Ability to debug complex issues and implement robust solutions effectively.
Collaboration Skills: Excellent communication and teamwork skills to work in a collaborative environment.

Qualifications:

Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related technical field.
Minimum of 3+ years of hands-on experience in back-end development, specifically with Laravel.
Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail, with a focus on delivering high-quality solutions.
Proven experience working in Agile teams and adhering to best practices in back-end development.

jobs.Job_Description:
Position: Tech Lead .Net Full Stack + Azure Integration Developer
Location: Work From Office, Hyderabad

Hiring a Tech Lead .Net Full Stack + Azure Integration Developer having 5+ years of hands-on experience


We are actively searching for a highly skilled and seasoned Tech Lead with a specialized focus on .Net Full Stack and Azure Integration development, boasting an impressive 5+ years of hands-on experience in these domains. The ideal candidate we are seeking will not only bring extensive technical proficiency to the role but will also possess a demonstrable track record of
consistently delivering successful and innovative solutions. This individual will have proven expertise in architecting and implementing robust .Net Full Stack applications, as well as a comprehensive understanding of Azure Integration principles.

Responsibilities:
• Excellent hands-on working experience in C#, .NET Core 6 and above, Web API, MVC, SQL, and Entity Framework.
• Strong expertise in Azure Function App, Service Bus, Event Hubs, Azure Integration Services, Azure Storage, Logic Apps
• Strong understanding of Design Patterns, OOPs concepts, and Design Principles.
• Strong experience in writing Unit and Integration Tests.
• Working experience in Microservices, Containerization (Docker) and Kubernetes, Azure Storage, Cosmos DB, Web App will be a plus.
• Good working experience in Angular, React, Razor, and Frontend technologies like HTML, CSS, Java Script.
• Experience in CI/CD, and version control (Git/SVN/DevOps).
• Strong experience in driving client/team discussion.
• Strong experience in transforming business tasks into technical requirements and effort estimations.
• Expertise in data structures, distributed computing, manipulating, and integrating complex high-volume data from variety of internal and external sources in application.
• Excellent communication and presentation skills.
• Good analytical skills

Requirements:
• Experience with any No SQL database.
• Knowledge in SSIS will be a plus.
• Work with modern framework and design patterns.
• Experience supporting US clients/working with US Teams is a huge plus.
• Should be willing to travel abroad based on customer requirements.
• Troubleshooting and performance optimization of application and database.
• Knowledge in WinDbg, PerfMon and SQL Profiler is required.
• Participate in architectural and design discussion.
• Ability to mentor junior members in team.

Additional Information:
• Competitive salary and Sales KPI-related bonuses.
• Comprehensive health and accident insurance plans.
• Professional development opportunities.
• Flexible work arrangements.
• 5-day work week.
• Fun and inclusive company culture.

Position: Java Developer
Experience : 9- 12 years
Location : Hyderabad
NP : immediate to 30 days.
Mandatory Skill: React must with Java
Work Mode: Work from Office (All 5 days in a week) ODC
Shift timings: 1:00 pm to 10:00 pm


Briefly summarize the general duties/responsibilities:

In the role of technical architect, you will be responsible for developing innovative software solutions that empower our customers. Your expertise will guide the testing and configuration management processes, as well as the management of source code and change processes. You will be entrusted with the support and maintenance of various systems, ensuring their optimal performance and reliability.
Your responsibilities extend to developing software solutions through comprehensive requirements analysis and collaboration with stakeholders and IT Management. You will delve into systems flow, data usage, and work processes, employing software development fundamentals to design, debug, test, and deploy effective software solutions. Whether it involves leveraging out-of-the-box components or engaging in custom development, your role is to ensure that business processes, procedures, and systems are thoroughly reviewed, analyzed, and evaluated, leading to recommendations for improvements and changes.

Your involvement in unit testing, feasibility assessments, and systems documentation will be crucial. Additionally, you will execute and manage change and release processes, document and demonstrate solutions with clear and well-commented code and build proof of concept examples or graphical simulation software.

As a team player, you will participate in product design reviews, offering creative and practical ideas and solutions. Collaborating with customer service, product managers, developers, and IT, you will strive to enhance the user experience and achieve product goals. Your role involves researching, considering, and applying user insights, feedback, measurements, and usability findings to inform design and revisions. You will also be responsible for maintaining product test software and demos for training purposes, and other duties as assigned, ensuring a comprehensive approach to software engineering within the financial sector.

Briefly summarize the minimum required years of experience and education:
Bachelors degree in computer science, Engineering, or a related field.
5+ years proven experience in software development.
5+ years of relevant experience in React JS, Java, spring boot, microservices, docker, SQL, GIT.
Expertise in database technologies, version control systems, and DevOps tools.
Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
A combination of education and experience may meet qualifications. Financial or Banking
services experience a plus.
Experience with cloud computing platforms and microservices architecture.

Extensive knowledge of:
Application development using various technologies, languages, databases, integrations,
frameworks, and systems.
Software development lifecycles
SQL and database systems
Java programming and application servers (e.g., WebSphere, Tomcat Java)
Data modeling concepts and integrated application development methodology
Software design, integration, and high-performance software development
Strong skills in:
Debugging, problem-solving, and testing
Analysis, judgment, and project management
Interpersonal communication, both verbal and written, with technical and non-technical staff
Ability to:
Analyze business requirements and map them to various programs.
Work effectively in a team environment.
Adapt to changing technology and priorities.
Work independently, manage multiple concurrent projects, and prioritize effectively.
Interpret, validate, and map business requirements to appropriate solutions.
