jobs.Skills_Required: Machine Learning, Algorithm Development, Pattern Recognition, Artificial Intelligence, Sensors, Python, Signal Processing
jobs.Job_Description:
Job_Description
We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated Sensor Fusion Expert to join our team and contribute to a cutting-edge project focused on integrating and processing data from multiple sensors using Python. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in sensor fusion algorithms, data processing, and Python programming, with the ability to solve complex challenges in real-time systems.

Key Responsibilities:
Develop, implement, and optimize sensor fusion algorithms for integrating data from multiple sensors (e.g., IMUs, LiDAR, cameras, GPS).
Design and maintain pipelines for processing and synchronizing sensor data in real-time.
Implement probabilistic and deterministic approaches for sensor fusion (e.g., Kalman Filters, Particle Filters, Bayesian methods).
Write efficient, maintainable, and scalable Python code for data acquisition, processing, and fusion.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand project requirements and deliver innovative solutions.
Test, validate, and troubleshoot sensor fusion systems to ensure accuracy and reliability.
Stay updated with the latest advancements in sensor fusion technologies and apply best practices.


Required Skills and Qualifications:
Education: Bachelor's/Master's degree in Computer Science, Robotics, Electrical Engineering, or a related field.
Programming Skills: Proficient in Python, including libraries such as NumPy, SciPy, Pandas, Matplotlib, and PyTorch/TensorFlow (preferred).
Sensor Fusion Expertise: Solid understanding of sensor fusion techniques and algorithms (e.g., Kalman Filters, Extended Kalman Filters, Unscented Kalman Filters, Particle Filters).
Mathematical Skills: Strong grasp of linear algebra, probability, statistics, and signal processing.
Data Handling: Experience with processing large datasets from sensors like LiDAR, IMUs, and GPS.
Real-Time Systems: Familiarity with real-time data synchronization and processing challenges.
Tools and Frameworks: Experience with ROS, OpenCV, or similar frameworks is a plus.
Problem Solving: Ability to identify, analyze, and solve complex technical challenges effectively.
Collaboration: Strong teamwork and communication skills to work in a dynamic environment.


Preferred Qualifications:
Prior experience with autonomous systems, robotics, or navigation.
Knowledge of hardware integration and interfacing with sensors.
Experience with cloud platforms or edge computing for sensor data processing.

Overview:
We are seeking a proficient SQL Developer to design, develop, and optimize database systems. The ideal candidate should have expertise in SQL, T-SQL, and PL/SQL, with experience in database design, query optimization, and creating efficient stored procedures. Familiarity with MySQL, SQL Server, and PostgreSQL is essential.

Key Responsibilities
Design and develop robust databases using MySQL, SQL Server, and PostgreSQL.
Write and optimize complex SQL, T-SQL, and PL/SQL queries to improve database performance.
Create, manage, and optimize stored procedures, functions, and triggers.
Design efficient data models and schemas to support application requirements.
Analyze and troubleshoot database performance issues, ensuring scalability and efficiency.
Develop and maintain ETL pipelines and data integration solutions.
Collaborate with developers to optimize database interactions and queries.
Ensure data security and integrity through proper database design and maintenance practices.

Required Skills
Strong proficiency in SQL, T-SQL, and PL/SQL.
Experience with MySQL, SQL Server, and PostgreSQL databases.
Expertise in database design, data modeling, and schema creation.
Ability to optimize queries for performance and troubleshoot database issues.
Proficiency in creating stored procedures, triggers, and functions.
Familiarity with ETL processes and data integration tools.
Knowledge of database security best practices.

Required Experience
Minimum of 3-8 years experience as an SQL Developer or similar role.
Proven experience in database development and optimization across MySQL, SQL Server, and PostgreSQL.
Strong background in query optimization, database design, and data modeling.
Hands-on experience with writing and optimizing stored procedures and triggers.

jobs.Job_Description:
This exciting role of an Analyst - AdOps requires you to creatively manage digital media campaigns for our global brands. Your expertise of ad tech and knowledge of the Digital Market Cycle would make you a great fit for this position. This is a great opportunity to work closely with the Top Global brands and own large and reputed accounts

About Annalect India
We are an integral part of Annalect Global and Omnicom Group, the second largest advertising agency holding company in the world in terms of revenue and is the leading global marketing communications company. Our portfolio includes: three global advertising agency networks: BBDO, DDB and TBWA; three of the worlds premium media services: OMD, PHD and Hearts & Science.
Annalect India plays a key role for our group companies and global agencies by providing stellar products and services in areas of Creative Services, Technology, Marketing Science (data & analytics) and Media Services. We are growing rapidly and looking for talented professionals like you to be part of this journey.
Let us build this, together!

Responsibilities
This is an exciting role and would entail you to
Setup and execute digital media campaigns using ad servers like Google Campaign Manager, Sizmek, Adform and Flashtalking etc.
Quality review of creative to ensuring technical Specs are met and ads appear properly in the desired formats
Trafficking sheet review, upload and assign creative to appropriate ads as per the trafficking sheet
Execute ongoing campaign optimizations and adjustments
Analyse and understand the campaign brief thoroughly before executing any requests within defined SOPs and procedures
Troubleshoot campaign delivery and tracking issues across platforms/Ad techs and proactively suggesting the appropriate solutions
Effectively communicate the technical information with wider team
Support team lead with day-to-day technical solutions to maintain a smooth operation and meet the respective stakeholder’s requirement.

Qualifications
This may be the right role for you if you have.
2 to 5 years of experience in handling digital media campaigns and technical support  
Good understanding of ad techs like Google Campaign Manager, Ad Manager and Business Manager
Good Knowledge of digital marketing life cycle
Familiarity with JavaScript, Iframe & HTML tags and troubleshooting the technical issues
Understanding of various third-party, fourth party and ad verification tags specifications, DoubleClick, AppNexus, DMPs and IAS etc.
Good analytical skills and logical reasoning in managing daily deliverables
Strong written and verbal communication.

jobs.Job_Title: Walk-in Drive For Qualified Chartered Accountants

jobs.Job_Description:
Walk-in drive for freshly qualified Chartered Accountants from January 13, 2025, to January 31, 2025, between 10 AM to 4 PM (Monday to Friday) at the Pune & Hyderabad office.
JOB DESCRIPTION:
Your job responsibilities will include,
Execution of statutory audit assignments independently
Handling of team
Training and research
Being a SPOC for the client
Good technical knowledge needed for execution of assignment
Learn and use of firm methodology
Communicate with clients and their overseas counterparts wherever required
Co-ordination with SKP cross service teams (IDT, Tax, C Law, TP, etc.) for assignments
Ownership of clients like CSS, billing, recovery, etc.
Working knowledge about internal audits
Flexible to work on non standard assurance engagements
Travel across all locations

Core Competencies:
Service Orientation Should be aware of both - the internal as well as external customers and their needs; and is committed to meeting the customers evolving, long-term needs – the focus is on SERVICE
Result Orientation – Should be able to direct efforts towards developing and implementing realistic action plans to meet business objectives; with a sense of urgency – the focus is on achieving RESULTS
Initiative – One must not only understand and accept the responsibilities towards his/her job; but also proactively works towards identifying challenges and its resolution – the focus is on seeking SOLUTIONS
Professionalism – Should have in-depth knowledge of all functions and displays not only required skill-set, but also ethics and integrity while conducting the job – the focus is on PROFESSIONALISM
Cooperation – One must ensure completion of all tasks at hand and simultaneously extends support to team members and displays joint ownership towards achieving business objectives – the focus is on TEAMWORK
Communication/Feedback – Should believe in providing feedback to other associates and receiving feedbacks to enhance performance, thereby meeting business objectives – the focus is on OPEN COMMUNICATION

DESIRED CANDIDATE PROFILE:
Chartered Accountant with 0-1 years’ post qualification experience
Expert knowledge of business processes, accounting, reporting and audit methodology
Expert knowledge and application of accounting standards and SA’s under Indian GAAP
Awareness of reporting under IFRS and other GAAPs as may be required for the group reporting for various entities.
Awareness of direct and indirect taxes and corporate laws
Excellent team management and client handling experience
Strong analytical skills
Self starter with a strong work ethic
Exposure to ERP environment (Tally, SAP, JDE, etc.)
Strong communication, with good command on English language

Hiring Process:
Your interaction with us will include, but not be limited to,
Technical / HR Interviews
Technical / Behavioral Assessments

Finally, our people are our most valuable asset; if you agree with us on this, we would love to meet you!

Description
We are excited to announce an opening for the position of Business Analyst Freshers in the rapidly growing Information Technology and Services sector. As a Business Analyst, you will play a crucial role in bridging the gap between our technology solutions and the business needs of our clients. This position is ideal for recent graduates who are eager to learn and build a career in business analysis. You will have the opportunity to work alongside experienced professionals in a dynamic and collaborative environment. Your primary responsibilities will include gathering and analyzing business requirements, developing process documentation, and assisting in the implementation of technology solutions that maximize efficiency and drive business growth. Our team is committed to providing comprehensive training and mentorship to help you develop the skills necessary to succeed in this role. This is a fantastic opportunity for individuals who are passionate about technology and want to make a meaningful impact within an organization. If you are a proactive problem-solver with strong analytical skills and a desire to contribute to exciting projects, we encourage you to apply and join our innovative team.
Responsibilities
Gather and document business requirements from stakeholders
Analyze data and processes to identify areas for improvement
Assist in the development of functional and technical specifications
Support project management teams in the execution of projects
Develop process maps and workflows to illustrate current and future states
Facilitate meetings and workshops with stakeholders to elicit feedback
Conduct market research to support business strategies and decision-making
Requirements
Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Information Technology, or a related field
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
Excellent verbal and written communication skills
Basic understanding of data analysis and reporting tools
Familiarity with business process modeling techniques
Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment
Enthusiastic attitude with a willingness to learn and adapt

jobs.Job_Description:
Job Role: Investment Banking Intern

About the Role:
As an Investment Banking Intern, you will gain hands-on experience in key areas such as investor reporting, investor engagement, fundraising, and stakeholder communications. This role provides a platform to develop your analytical skills and industry knowledge while working alongside experienced professionals.

Responsibilities:
Fundraising & M&A
Assist the team during fundraising by supporting the preparation of placement memorandums, investor pitch presentations, and due diligence questionnaires.

Investor Engagement
Record all investor engagement activities for reference and ensure action items are promptly followed up until closure.
Support the team in delivering investor-related tasks within set timelines.
Assist with relationship building and networking with potential investors.

Stakeholder Communications
Aid the leadership team in ensuring timely and error-free communication with external stakeholders, including media.
Help draft press releases, journalist Q&As, factsheets, and other organizational communications.

Investment Banking Support
Collaborate with the Investment Banking Head on executing private equity (PE) deals.
Conduct research and analysis on industries, competitors, and macroeconomic factors.
Assist in building business models, preparing pitch books, designing financial models, and structuring deals.
Support deal origination, management, and closure processes, including due diligence and negotiation.
Analyse core financial data to create financial models for valuations (e.g., property, business) and forecast trends.
Conduct market research on stocks, commodities, and other investment opportunities.
Assist in drafting valuation reports, transaction documents (e.g., term sheets, share subscription agreements), and business plans.
Support debt and equity fundraising activities by identifying potential investors and clients.

Process Improvement
Contribute to creating reports, tools, and Excel dashboards to improve processes.

Basic Qualifications:
Graduation in progress or completed (Qualified CA or MBA in Finance preferred).
Proficient in Microsoft Word, Excel, and PowerPoint.
Strong analytical and data-gathering skills.

Personality Traits and Interpersonal Skills:
Passion for learning and growth with the ability to streamline processes.
Self-starter with strong problem-solving skills.
Good business acumen and comfort with ambiguity.
Strong written and oral communication skills.
Ability to interact comfortably with executive-level management.

jobs.Skills_Required: Marketing, digital marketing, Marketing Strategy, product marketing, Marketing Planning, brand management
jobs.Job_Description:
Position Overview:
The Chief Marketing Officer (CMO) is a senior executive responsible for developing and executing comprehensive marketing strategies to drive brand growth, patient engagement, and market expansion. The CMO ensures the alignment of marketing initiatives with the organizations mission and goals, leveraging data-driven insights to optimize marketing performance and improve patient outreach.
Key Responsibilities:
1. Marketing Strategy and Planning:
o Develop and implement a strategic marketing plan that supports the organization's business objectives.
o Identify market opportunities and threats through comprehensive market analysis and research.
o Define brand positioning, messaging, and value proposition for the organization's services and products.
2. Brand Management:
o Oversee the development and maintenance of the organization's brand identity.
o Ensure consistent brand messaging across all marketing channels and materials.
o Lead initiatives to enhance brand awareness and reputation.
3. Digital Marketing and Patient Engagement:
o Develop and execute digital marketing strategies, including SEO, SEM, social media, email marketing, and content marketing.
o Enhance patient engagement through personalized and targeted communication.
o Implement and manage patient relationship management (PRM) systems.
4. Product Marketing:
o Lead the marketing efforts for new product launches and service offerings.
o Collaborate with product development teams to ensure market needs are met.
o Develop marketing materials and sales tools to support product adoption.
5. Market Research and Analytics:
o Conduct market research to understand patient needs, preferences, and behaviours.
o Analyze marketing performance data to measure the effectiveness of campaigns and strategies.
o Utilize insights to make data-driven decisions and optimize marketing efforts.
6. Team Leadership and Development:
o Build and lead a high-performing marketing team.
o Foster a culture of creativity, innovation, and continuous improvement.
o Provide mentorship and professional development opportunities for team members.
7. Stakeholder Collaboration:
o Collaborate with clinical, operational, and executive teams to align marketing efforts with organizational goals.
o Work with external partners, agencies, and vendors to execute marketing initiatives.
o Serve as the primary spokesperson for marketing-related activities.
8. Budget Management:
o Develop and manage the marketing budget.
o Ensure cost-effective allocation of resources to maximize ROI.
o Monitor financial performance and adjust strategies as needed.
9. Regulatory Compliance:
o Ensure all marketing activities comply with healthcare regulations and ethical standards.
o Stay informed about industry trends, legal requirements, and best practices.
Qualifications:
Education: Bachelors degree in Marketing, Business Administration, or a related field; MBA or advanced degree preferred.
Experience: Minimum of 10 years of marketing experience with at least 5 years in a senior leadership role, preferably in the healthcare or medical industry.
Skills:
o Strong strategic planning and analytical skills.
o Excellent communication, presentation, and interpersonal abilities.
o Proficiency in digital marketing tools and platforms.
o In-depth knowledge of healthcare marketing regulations and practices.
o Proven track record of driving marketing performance and achieving business objectives.
Work Environment:
Office-based with occasional travel to conferences, meetings, and healthcare facilities.
Requires participation in executive meetings and collaboration with cross-functional teams.
Reporting:
Reports to the Chief Executive Officer (CEO) or equivalent top executive.
Supervises the marketing team, including managers and specialists.

challenges.

gaps in existing tools like Mendix.

from pre-activation through onboarding.

tasks.

into the tech stack.

intervention.

functional gaps.

systems.

teams.

Documentation and training expertise to ensure smooth knowledge transfer and

Dear Candidates,

Greetings from Pi Square Technologies!!!

We have an excellent Opportunity for:

Job Title: Spark & Scala Engineer
Experience: 3+years
Location: Remote

Job Description:
Seeking a highly skilled Spark & Scala Engineer to join our team. The ideal candidate will be passionate about developing high-performance data processing engines and applying advanced algorithms to solve complex problems. Expertise in Spark, Scala, object-oriented programming (OOP), and advanced algorithms such as search trees, clustering algorithms (K-means), and graph algorithms is essential. This role focuses on designing scalable systems and applying state-of-the-art techniques for data-driven problem-solving.
Key Responsibilities:
Engine Development:
Design and implement efficient, scalable engines for data processing using Apache Spark and Scala.
Build robust and reusable systems based on advanced OOP principles (encapsulation, inheritance, polymorphism, and abstraction).
Algorithm Design & Implementation:
Implement complex search trees (e.g., binary search trees, AVL trees, red-black trees) for optimized data querying and management.
Develop clustering algorithms such as K-means, DBSCAN, and hierarchical clustering to group and analyze large datasets.
Apply graph algorithms (e.g., Dijkstra's, Bellman-Ford, PageRank) for network and relationship-based data analysis.
Leverage sorting and searching algorithms (e.g., quicksort, mergesort, binary search) to optimize data workflows.
Implement dynamic programming algorithms for solving optimization problems like knapsack, shortest paths, and matrix chain multiplication.
Big Data Processing:
Process and analyze massive datasets using Spark SQL, DataFrames, and RDDs.
Optimize Spark jobs for real-time and batch processing to improve performance and scalability.
Machine Learning & Data Analytics:
Use clustering techniques like K-means and GMM (Gaussian Mixture Models) for unsupervised learning.
Design algorithms to detect patterns, trends, and anomalies in large-scale datasets.
Optimization & Scalability:
Build scalable and modular solutions for processing structured, semi-structured, and unstructured data.
Optimize system performance and ensure high availability in distributed computing environments.
Collaboration:
Work with cross-functional teams, including data scientists and engineers, to design end-to-end solutions.
Contribute to architectural decisions and define best practices for algorithm implementation and system design.
Required Skills:
Programming: Strong proficiency in Scala, with expertise in both functional and object-oriented programming.
Big Data: Hands-on experience with Apache Spark, including Spark SQL, DataFrames, RDDs, and distributed data processing.
Algorithms:
Search Trees: Binary search trees, AVL trees, red-black trees.
Clustering: K-means, DBSCAN, hierarchical clustering.
Graph Algorithms: Dijkstra's, Bellman-Ford, Kruskal's, Prim's, PageRank.
Optimization: Dynamic programming, greedy algorithms, branch-and-bound.
Sorting & Searching: QuickSort, MergeSort, binary search.
Data Structures: Proficiency in advanced data structures like heaps, hash tables, and trees.
Problem Solving: Strong ability to write efficient, optimized, and clean code to solve computational challenges.

If you are interested to learn and grow with us. Kindly share your updated resume at ayasha.k@pisquaretech.com or can reach me out on 7067854900

Key skills:

Fluent English is essential (speaking, reading & writing)
Specialist knowledge of Amazon Vendor Central platform
High level experience of disputing short claims.
High level experience of disputing operational chargebacks.

High level experience of negotiating with Amazon Case Support

Roles & responsibilities:

The role will be 100% based navigating the Amazon Vendor Central platform. (Please do not apply if you have never used Vendor Central or if you only have experience with Seller Central.)
Your duties will involve managing Vendor support case loads, enhancing Amazon detail pages, guiding products through compliance checks & listing new products through both formats of manual upload and bulk sheet upload.

A key role will be performing weekly dispute processing of shortage claims and also overseeing the dispute processing of operational chargebacks. In your role managing this area you will report these to the brand manager. Key skills involving data analysis and reporting are essential to stay on top of this area.

During promotional periods, you will need to assist the brand manager with promotion submissions & after the events perform the record keeping of the CoOp deductions on a brand level. All submitted onto our Dropbox account.

An important element of the role will be checking our product catalogues in UK and EU to monitor the Buy Box status, photography and written content including titles for any issues. This role will involve communicating directly with our Supply Chain Manager for stock control, PPC manager for advertising & reporting & our brand manager for supplier relations.

We have good systems in place within the company so this role will be manageable & enjoyable!

jobs.Job_Description:
Key Responsibilities:
• Content Strategy & Creation: Develop and execute compelling, platform-specific content strategies to attract and engage target audiences.
• Group Engagement: Actively participate in relevant social media groups, forums, and discussions to establish a strong brand presence and build meaningful connections.
• Social Listening: Monitor brand mentions, industry trends, and customer sentiment to proactively address issues and identify opportunities for engagement.
• Trend Analysis: Stay updated with social media trends, hashtags, and viral topics, leveraging them to boost visibility.
• Audience Interaction: Respond promptly to comments, messages, and mentions to foster trust and loyalty among followers.
• Campaign Management: Design and execute paid and organic campaigns to promote services and generate leads across platforms.
• A/B Testing: Experiment with different content types, posting times, and ad formats to identify the most effective strategies.
• Analytics & Reporting: Track key performance metrics, analyze campaign results, and generate insights to refine strategies and achieve better ROI.
• Competitor Analysis: Monitor competitors social media activities to identify opportunities for differentiation and improvement.
• Revenue Focus: Strategically create and promote offers, deals, and content that directly contribute to revenue growth.
• Collaboration: Work closely with the content, design, and sales teams to ensure consistent brand messaging and alignment with business objectives.
• Influencer Outreach: Identify and collaborate with influencers relevant to our industry to expand reach and credibility.
• Platform Optimization: Regularly update profiles, ensure accurate information, and optimize each platform for maximum visibility.
• Community Building: Foster and grow online communities around topics related to our industry and services.
• Social Media Advertising: Plan, execute, and manage social media advertising campaigns to achieve specific business goals such as lead generation and sales.
• Web Traffic Management: Drive traffic to our website through effective social media strategies and track conversions using analytics tools.
• Hashtag Strategy: Develop effective hashtag strategies to increase post visibility and discoverability.
• Content Collaboration: Partner with bloggers, writers, and influencers to produce co-branded or sponsored content.
• Event Promotion: Use social media to promote webinars, live streams, and other events to engage audiences and boost participation.
• Repurposing Content: Transform blog posts, videos, and other content into platform-specific formats to maximize reach and engagement.
• Crisis Management: Handle negative feedback or social media crises with professionalism and efficiency to protect the brand’s reputation.

Requirements:
• Experience: Minimum 2 years of experience in social media marketing, community engagement, or a related field.
• Proven expertise in managing and growing social media accounts on platforms like Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Instagram, and YouTube.
• Exceptional communication and interpersonal skills.
• Creative thinking to produce engaging content and innovative campaigns.
• Strong analytical mindset to interpret data and refine strategies.
• Knowledge of social media advertising tools, including Facebook Ads Manager and LinkedIn Campaign Manager.
• Mindset: Self-driven, proactive, and highly adaptable to dynamic digital trends.

Why Join Press Monitor?
• Flexible Work Environment: Work remotely from any location, enjoying the flexibility of a modern workplace.
• Revenue-Driven Incentives: Attractive compensation with additional performance-based incentives tied to engagement and revenue growth.
• Skill Development: Opportunity to work with a seasoned team and gain valuable insights into social media marketing.
• Creative Freedom: Flexibility to experiment and bring innovative ideas to life.
• Global Exposure: Engage with diverse audiences across international markets.

How to Apply:
If you’re ready to elevate our brand’s social media presence and drive meaningful results, send your detailed CV to hr@pressmonitor.com.
Include:
• Your social media handles (if applicable) to showcase your expertise.
• Your availability, current and expected compensation, and a summary of your key strengths.

Take your career to new heights with Press Monitor and play a pivotal role in shaping our digital success story!

jobs.Job_Description:
About ETS:
ETS is a global education and talent solutions organization enabling lifelong learners worldwide to be future-ready. For more than 75 years, we've been advancing the science of measurement to build benchmarks for fair and valid skill assessment across cultures and borders. Our worldwide impact extends through our renowned assessments including TOEFL, TOEIC, GRE and Praxis tests, serving millions of learners in more than 200 countries and territories. Through strategic acquisitions, we've expanded our global capabilities: PSI strengthens our workforce assessment solutions, while Edusoft, Kira Talent, Pipplet, Vericant, and Wheebox enhance our educational technology and assessment platforms across critical markets worldwide.
Through ETS Research Institute and ETS Solutions, we're partnering with educational institutions, governments, and organizations globally to promote skill proficiency, empower upward mobility, and unlock opportunities for everyone, everywhere. With offices and partners across Asia, Europe, the Middle East, Africa, and the Americas, we deliver nearly 50 million tests annually. Join us in our journey of measuring progress to power human progress worldwide.

About Us
ETS is a global education and talent solutions organization, enabling lifelong learners to be future ready. We advance the science of measurement to build the benchmarks for fair and valid skill assessment. We are committed to powering human progress by promoting skill proficiency, empowering upward mobility, and unlocking more opportunities for everyone, everywhere. For more than 70 years, we have developed products and services based on rigorous research and our belief in the power of learning.
PSI Services powers world leading tests. Delivered with trusted science and the very best test taker experience. PSI supports test-takers on their journey to pursuing dreams and gaining certifications that are important to them. They believe that their dreams are worth working for; that their dreams are worth the effort. And we believe that too. This is our core purpose, to empower people to achieve their dreams. We do this by being the best provider of workforce solutions, which foster both technology and science to deliver the best solutions for our test takers.
We are searching for top talent to join our PSI team and help grow our products and services. We have a creative, supportive, and inclusive culture where we empower people in their careers to be their authentic self and make the most of their great talent.
At PSI, we are committed to helping people meet their potential and we believe that promoting diversity, equity and inclusion is critical to our success. Thats why youll find these ideals are intrinsic to our company culture and applied throughout the employee lifecycle. Learn more about what we do at: https://www.psiexams.com/ (ETS owned company - https://www.ets.org/)
About the role
Responsible for ensuring that products and services meet the established standards set by the company. Duties include maintaining strong overall quality control of products made by the company adhering to reliability, performance, and customer expectation.
This role is a key position within the growing ETS team. As we operate 24/7, team members will be required to work on a rotational shift. ETS will provide one-way cab service during off-hours only.
Will be responsible in transactional quality audits
Create quality measurements to track improvement in products
Execute quality improvement testing and activities
Develop quality assurance standards and company processes
Adhere to industry quality and safety standards
Ensure products meet customer expectations and demand
Create reports documenting errors and issues for fixing
Work closely with the development team to improve existing products
Maintain standards for reliability and performance of production
Adhere to ethical standards and comply with the laws and regulations applicable to your job function.

Keyword: Quality Associate
Required Experience:
Working knowledge of products and services
In-depth understanding of industry standards and company policies
Good customer focus
Sharp attention to detail
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
Meticulous and diligent attributes
Great team player with the ability to work with minimal supervision
Able to sit, stand and walk around for long hours at a time
Willing to work ON SITE
Meet B2 level English language proficiency or equivalent internationally recognized qualification.
Education & Experience:
Graduation (Bachelor in Any stream)
Minimum 1-3 years of experience.
#LI-SS1
#ONSITE

From: ETS GCC

Job_Title: ReactJS Developer
Location: Remote
Type: Internship (6 months, Unpaid, Full-time opportunity based on performance)

We are looking for a passionate and driven ReactJS Developer Intern to join our team. This role offers a valuable opportunity to gain hands-on experience in building scalable, user-friendly web applications using cutting-edge frontend technologies.

Key Responsibilities
Develop, maintain, and optimize frontend applications using ReactJS.
Collaborate with the design and backend teams to create seamless user experiences.
Implement responsive web designs using HTML, CSS, and modern frameworks.
Integrate backend APIs into the frontend application for dynamic functionality.
Debug and troubleshoot frontend issues to ensure smooth performance.

What We re Looking For:

Technical Skills:
Proficiency in ReactJS and its core principles.
Familiarity with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Basic knowledge of integrating REST APIs with frontend applications.

Personal Attributes:
Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
Eagerness to learn and adapt to new tools and technologies.
Ability to work independently in a remote environment.

What You ll Gain:
Practical experience building real-world web applications with ReactJS.
Mentorship from experienced developers.
Exposure to the full software development lifecycle.
Opportunity for a full-time role based on performance.

Duration: 6 months (Unpaid)
If you are ready to kickstart your career in frontend development and gain hands-on experience in a collaborative environment, we d love to hear from you!

jobs.Job_Description:
Hi Aspirants,

Experience range - 4 to 9 years only

work location - PAN INDIA

JD -

A Salesforce Functional Tester plays a crucial role in ensuring the quality and functionality of Salesforce applications. Here are some key responsibilities typically included in a job description for this role:
Design and Execute Test Plans: Develop and implement test plans for Salesforce applications to ensure they meet the required standards and functionalities1.
Identify and Document Defects: Identify, document, and track defects and inconsistencies in the system1.
Collaborate with Development Teams: Work closely with development teams to understand features and functionalities, and ensure any issues are resolved before the system goes live2.
Perform Regression Testing: Conduct regression testing to ensure new changes do not adversely affect existing functionality1.
Automate Test Scripts: Use testing frameworks and tools to automate test scripts, enhancing efficiency and coverage1.
Functional Testing: Conduct functional testing to verify that the Salesforce application performs as expected3.
Unit and Process Testing: Perform unit testing and process testing to ensure individual components and overall processes function correctly3.
Load and Security Testing: Execute load testing to assess performance under stress and security testing to identify vulnerabilities.

jobs.Job_Description:
Job_Description: Site Engineer

Role & Responsibilities:
- Visit shortlisted POD properties with the Business Development (BD) team for site measurements and validation of all technical requirements. 
- Fill out the site validation checklist for new PODs and share it with the draftsman. 
- Collaborate with draftsmen on floor plans and detailed drawings, providing necessary site inputs. 
- Brief vendors on Good for Construction (GFC) drawings in coordination with the project manager and assist in their execution. 
- Regularly monitor outsourced contractors to ensure work quality and quantity meet site requirements. 
- Inspect materials used on-site to ensure they match the specifications approved in the Bill of Quantities (BOQ). 
- Ensure construction progresses according to the PERT chart for timely project completion. 
- Communicate any site condition-based changes to the project manager, update drawings accordingly, and implement corrections. 
- Validate completed work scopes with accurate measurements. 
- Assist the project manager in site measurements for preparing final invoices. 

Preferred Candidate Profile: 
- Graduation in B.Tech with 2-5 years of experience in retail management or a related field. 
- Strong problem-solving and data-driven decision-making skills. 
- Adaptability to dynamic and fast-paced situations. 
- Experience in the retail, FMCG, or quick commerce industry is highly preferred. 
- Proficient in AutoCAD, project management tools, and MS Office. 

Perks and Benefits: 
- Monthly incentives. 
- Medical benefits. 

How to Apply:
Interested candidates can share their CV at sandhya.tiwari1_ch@external.swiggy.in

jobs.Skills_Required: Sketchup, AutoCAD, Interior Designing, Interior Architecture, Modular Kitchen, AutoCAD 2D, VRAY, 3Ds Max
jobs.Job_Description:
FineMake Designs Pvt. Ltd. is seeking a talented and creative Interior Designer to join our team. As an Interior Designer, you will be responsible for understanding customer requirements, conceptualizing and sketching design plans, and ensuring smooth project completion by coordinating with internal departments. The ideal candidate will possess excellent communication and presentation skills, along with proficiency in Google Sketchup for designing customized products such as wardrobes, modular kitchens, TV units, etc. Practical knowledge of addressing design and technical queries, along with an understanding of cost considerations, is crucial for success in this role. Additionally, familiarity with software such as AutoCAD and Enscape is highly desirable.

Responsibilities:

1. Understand customer requirements thoroughly and provide innovative design solutions and specifications.
2. Conceptualize and sketch design plans using Google Sketchup, ensuring alignment with project requirements and cost considerations.
3. Coordinate effectively with internal departments to ensure seamless project execution and timely completion.
4. Provide expertise in designing customized products such as wardrobes, modular kitchens, TV units, etc.
5. Address design and technical queries efficiently, providing creative solutions to challenges as they arise.
6. Present design concepts and proposals to clients in a clear and compelling manner.
7. Demonstrate practical understanding of issues commonly encountered at residential sites to anticipate and plan design solutions accordingly.
8. Collaborate with team members to brainstorm ideas and contribute to the overall creative process.
9. Stay updated on industry trends, materials, and technologies to continually enhance design capabilities.

Key Skill Requirements:

1. Excellent communication and presentation skills, with the ability to effectively convey design concepts to clients and internal stakeholders.
2. Proficiency in Google Sketchup for designing customized products and creating detailed design plans.
3. Familiarity with software such as AutoCAD and Enscape for creating precise technical drawings and realistic visualizations.
4. Strong understanding of cost considerations and the ability to design within budget constraints.
5. Expertise in designing wardrobes, modular kitchens, TV units, and other customized interior products.
6. Practical knowledge of issues commonly encountered at residential sites and the ability to proactively address them in design planning.
7. Candidates from premium architecture and interior design colleges (e.g., IIT, NIT) preferred.

Interested candidates should submit their portfolios to saida@finemake.in. Please ensure that your portfolio showcases relevant design projects and demonstrates your proficiency in Google Sketchup, AutoCAD, Enscape, and other key skills outlined in the job description.

Preferred Educational Qualification-B.Arch

Note: Only candidates with portfolios will be considered for this position.

jobs.Job_Description:
Job_Title: Site Engineer
Location: Odespa, Hyderabad
Job Type: Full-Time
Experience: 3+ years in site engineering, preferably in spa, hospitality, or luxury real estate projects
Job Overview
We are looking for a skilled and proactive Site Engineer to oversee and manage on-site activities for the construction of a world-class spa at Odespa, Hyderabad. The Site Engineer will play a key role in ensuring the project is executed efficiently, maintaining high-quality standards, and managing labor to ensure productivity and safety. This role involves close collaboration with the Project Executive, Project Manager, and contractors.
Key Responsibilities
On-Site Supervision
Supervise daily construction activities to ensure compliance with project plans, specifications, and safety standards.
Coordinate and monitor the work of subcontractors, vendors, and labor teams.
Ensure materials and equipment are used efficiently and effectively on-site.
Labor Management
Manage and allocate tasks to labor teams, ensuring optimal productivity.
Address labor issues, resolve conflicts, and ensure workforce compliance with safety and quality standards.
Maintain accurate records of labor attendance, work hours, and task completion.
Quality Assurance & Compliance
Conduct regular inspections to ensure construction quality aligns with design and specifications.
Ensure compliance with local building codes, environmental standards, and safety regulations.
Identify and rectify any defects or inconsistencies in construction work.
Progress Tracking & Reporting
Maintain detailed site records, including daily progress reports, material usage, and work schedules.
Communicate project updates, challenges, and recommendations to the Project Manager and Project Executive.
Assist in preparing documentation for inspections, approvals, and handover processes.
Material & Resource Management
Oversee the delivery, storage, and usage of construction materials on-site.
Ensure proper inventory management and avoid wastage.
Coordinate with suppliers and vendors for timely delivery of required materials.
Health & Safety
Enforce site safety standards and conduct regular safety briefings for the workforce.
Identify potential safety risks and implement corrective actions.
Ensure the availability of necessary safety equipment on-site.
Qualifications
Bachelors degree or diploma in Civil Engineering or a related field.
Proven experience in site engineering, with a focus on high-end construction projects.
Strong knowledge of construction processes, materials, and safety standards.
Proficiency in using site management tools and software.
Excellent problem-solving and decision-making skills.
Ability to manage teams and work under tight deadlines.
Preferred Skills
Experience in labor management and conflict resolution.
Familiarity with luxury construction elements and interior fit-outs.
Knowledge of AutoCAD and project scheduling tools.
Understanding of sustainable building practices.

jobs.Job_Description:
About Carrier

LRR Technologies is currently hiring talented people to work with Carrier Corporation. Carrier Corporation (NYSE: CARR) is a global provider of innovative heating, ventilating, and air conditioning (HVAC), refrigeration, fire, security, and building automation technologies boasting annual sales of over $20 billion, with 58,000 employees spread across 160+ countries. For its R&D center in Hyderabad, Carrier is looking for a talented Sr. Backend Engineer (Dot Net Developer).

As were expanding our team located in Hyderabad India, were looking for a talented, highly motivated, and results-driven engineer with expertise in 1D mathematical Thermal modeling. The main responsibility of the ideal candidate will be 1D mathematical model development, software implementation, and testing of standalone models and systems.

Roles and Responsibilities

Development of a 1D mathematical model of the different heat exchangers, expense devices, compressors, and other auxiliary components.
Testing and documentation of the developed model.
Integrate the 1D mathematical model with our propriety software and integrate the model with the system.
To solve different Business units queries.

EDUCATION / CERTIFICATIONS:

Candidates must possess a Master/ Bachler Degree in Mechanical Engineering. A Masters degree in the Thermal domain will be an add-on advantage.

Desired Candidate Profile

At least 3 years experience in 1D mathematical modeling in the Thermal domain.
Strong knowledge of HVAC/R components, and strong thermal background.
Knowledge of programming languages like Fortran, C#, and Modelica.
Knowledge of VB6 and Python will add an advantage.
Strong technical writing abilities to provide high-quality documentation and standard work.


In addition, the ideal candidate should:

Be able to work as a part of a multidisciplinary team and in a global environment (our engineers.
are located in the US, Italy, France, Germany, China, and India. We collaborate with research institutions worldwide.
Observe discipline with the development and adoption of standard development processes.
Have a solid track record of working under pressure and focusing on results.
Solid technical writing, presentation, and communication skills.

Perks and Benefits
The position will pay quite well - Rs.12-20 lakh per annum is the band, and the final amount may be even higher depending on your experience and expertise.

If made an offer, you will need to join in 4 weeks.

This is the opportunity of a lifetime for people looking to specialize in highly coveted niche futuristic skills, and to work in a top multinational company with excellent employee-first initiatives. We look forward to your application.

Manager  – Financial Business Analytics & Reporting

 About Role
We have an exciting role that provides functional support for the Cognos Analytics platform with respect to reporting and analytics. The candidate must be system savvy along with excellent communication skills and finance knowledge. The candidate should maintain and improves the corporate reporting platform, provides support for the global user base, and provides project management and governance for ongoing operations.

We are an integral part of Annalect Global and Omnicom Group, the second-largest advertising agency holding company in the world in terms of revenue and is the leading global marketing communications company. Our portfolio includes three global advertising agency networks: BBDO, DDB and TBWA; three of the world’s premium media services: OMD, PHD and Hearts & Science.
 Annalect India plays a key role for our group companies and global agencies by providing stellar products and services in areas of Creative Services, Technology, Marketing Science (data & analytics), Business Support Services Market Research and Media Services. We are growing rapidly and looking for talented professionals like you to be part of this journey.

Leverage project management skills to drive reporting and analytics solutions
Liaise with and influence key stakeholders and business partners
Collaborate with business partners in the development of reports, analytics, and dashboards

 You will be working closely with

About Bizionic Technologies:

Bizionic Technologies is a dynamic organization specializing in digital transformation projects. We are committed to building innovative platforms and delivering exceptional client experiences. As we grow, we seek a creative and results-driven Social Media Executive to manage and expand our online presence across all platforms.

Content Strategy & Creation:

Create, curate, and schedule engaging content (posts, reels, graphics, etc.) for all social platforms, including LinkedIn, Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, and emerging channels.

Manage and grow the companys online communities by engaging with followers, responding to comments, and addressing inquiries in a timely manner.

Track and optimize performance metrics (CTR, reach, engagement rate, etc.).

Creative mindset with the ability to generate unique and compelling content.

Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
Ability to multitask, prioritize, and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment.

Growth in followers and engagement across platforms.

Success of social media campaigns (measured by leads, conversions, and reach).
Responsiveness and community sentiment.

 If you are passionate about social media and excited by the idea of shaping the digital presence of a pioneering Web3 company, send your resume and portfolio to hcm@bizionictech.com.

jobs.Job_Description:
Introduction
We seek a dynamic and highly-skilled SEO Lead to join our team at NxtWave
As an SEO Lead, you will be responsible for developing and implementing effective search engine optimisation strategies to drive organic traffic and improve our online presence. This includes managing on-page SEO and off-page SEO activities, optimising keywords and phrases, link building and analysing web analytics data.

We would like to hear from you if you have a knack for the search engine landscape to unlock online marketing potential.

You will work with talented professionals, leverage cutting-edge SEO tools and contribute to our company's growth and success.

Objectives of this role
Developing and executing comprehensive search engine optimisation strategies to achieve business objectives.
Monitoring and analysing website performance using SEO tools and analytics platforms, providing regular reports and recommendations for optimisation.
Collaborate with content creators and digital marketing teams to develop and optimise high-quality, keyword-rich content for improved organic visibility.
Executing link-building activities to ensure quality links from reputable sources.
Working closely with cross-functional teams, such as content, design and product, to ensure optimal content performance.
Collaborating with marketing teams to integrate SEO with other digital marketing initiatives for cohesive campaigns.

Your tasks
Conduct keyword research and SEO analysis to identify relevant target areas and content clusters.
Take complete ownership of clusters/categories assigned
Develop and execute effective on-page and off-page SEO strategies to improve website visibility and SERP rankings.
Optimise website content, meta tags, headers and URLs to ensure alignment with target keywords and enhance search engine crawl ability.
Identify technical SEO issues and collaborate with the web development team to implement solutions for improved website performance and user experience.
Conduct in-depth SEO audits, competitive analysis, and benchmarking to identify opportunities for improvement and stay ahead of competitors in search rankings.
Track and analyse website traffic, user behaviour and conversion rates to assess the effectiveness of SEO strategies and make data-driven recommendations.
Stay abreast of emerging SEO trends and technologies, exploring innovative approaches to enhance our SEO efforts further.

Required skills and qualifications
A bachelor's degree in marketing, digital marketing or a related field.
4+ years of experience as an SEO Lead or a similar SEO-focused role.
In-depth knowledge of SEO best practices, search engine algorithms and digital marketing trends, with a strong understanding of the Indian search landscape.
Proficiency in SEO and analytics tools like Google Search Console, SEMrush, Google Keyword Planner, and Google Analytics.
Knowledge of A/B testing, local SEO and SEO reporting tools.
Experience with content management systems (CMS) and website optimisation platforms, like WordPress, web Flow OR similar CMS tool
Experience with SEO for local businesses and Google My Business optimisation.
Strong analytical skills and the ability to interpret data and make data-driven decisions.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.
Worked in high-growth environments and generated at least 1M SEO traffic to websites
Knowledge of technical SEO (Crawl Analysis, Log file analysis, etc.,) including speed optimisation for web and mobile.

Why this job matters
In this job, youll be responsible for the test automation approach and methodology for quality assurance of BT/EE platform solutions. Youll provide technical leadership and strategic direction to automation or qa engineers, resolving the test project issues, and ensuring effective test process improvement feedback. Youll be critical in ensuring that test architecture and test plans are up to date relative to changes in the Digital landscape. Youll confidently lead and share knowledge with a team of engineers. Youll be involved in planning and monitoring the execution of automation tests in CI/CD environment.Excellent communication skills are required as you will be liaising with wider engineering team including operations and product teams. You will also be responsible for implementing latest technology, in line with our continuous integration and delivery goals. The QA Engineering Specialist independently executes a range of critical testing activities for a portfolio of products and services, driving best practice standards for test quality, resource planning and issue resolution, in alignment to business strategy and requirements.

What youll be doing
• Define the test automation driven QA approach and methodology for BT/EE platform solutions
• Be Agile, Test Driven and a highly technical tester.
• Steering the direction of the automation test framework
• You will work directly with Technical Architects and define automation approach, write test plans but can still deliver hands on technically. Whether that be API testing or building test frameworks from scratch.
• Analyse competitive products and technologies with appropriate suggestions to influence product / technology direction.
• Collaborate with test and development engineers on application & testing architecture, to ensure that the approaches and technologies applied to the current implementation are sound and fit for purpose.
• Coordinating the tasks within sprints and looking at ways to automate manual activities within software delivery process.
• Design / architect and implement regular robust full build / deploy / test automation process across our digital platforms along with sub system integrations
• Coordinating test automation activities within projects, including planning and delivering the test phases on time and within budget while meeting all quality objectives.
• Understanding of programming principles and best practice (e.g. DRY, SOLID for creating re-usable code, best practice etc)
• Own the end-to-end code quality and code performance KPIs

• Expertise in testing methodologies, test techniques and agile QA practices

Job Description: Analyst - Excel Modeling and Demand Forecasting (Life Sciences)
Position Title: Analyst Excel Modeling and Demand Forecasting
****Location: Bangalore or Gurugram for in-person one-month training. After training is complete, the resource can work remotely.
Employment Type: Full-Time

Job Overview:
We are seeking a detail-oriented and analytical professional to join our team as an Analyst specializing in Excel modeling with experience or interest in demand forecasting. The ideal candidate will have strong expertise in Excel-based data analysis, modeling, and visualization, with the ability to support life sciences projects. Knowledge of demand forecasting methods and applications in pharmaceutical, biotechnology, or healthcare sectors is a plus.
Key Responsibilities:
Excel Modeling & Data Analysis
Build, optimize, and maintain advanced Excel models for demand forecasting, financial analysis, and decision support.
Perform data cleaning, integration, and analysis using Excel and other tools to support business needs.
Use advanced Excel functions (e.g., Power Query, VBA, pivot tables) to streamline workflows and improve efficiency.
Demand Forecasting (Good to Have)

Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal.

Comfortable managing multiple tasks and meeting deadlines.

jobs.Skills_Required: Data Visualization, Machine Learning, Statistics, SQL
jobs.Job_Description:
Role: Data Scientist
Experience: 13 Years
Domain: IT/Analytics
Job Summary

We are seeking a skilled and motivated Data Scientist with 1–3 years of experience to join our IT/Analytics team. The role involves analyzing and interpreting complex data to derive actionable insights, developing predictive models, and driving data-driven decision-making. The ideal candidate will have expertise in Python, R, SQL, and Machine Learning, along with a strong foundation in Statistics and Data Visualization. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to solve business challenges and contribute to the organization’s growth through innovative data solutions.
Key Responsibilities:
Data Analysis & Interpretation:
Analyze and interpret complex datasets to extract meaningful insights.
Identify trends, patterns, and anomalies to support decision-making.
Model Development:
Build, deploy, and optimize predictive models using machine learning algorithms.
Validate and refine models to ensure accuracy and reliability in solving business problems.
Data Management:
Extract, clean, and preprocess data from various sources (databases, APIs, etc.).
Write efficient SQL queries for data manipulation and analysis.
Collaboration:
Work closely with cross-functional teams to understand business objectives and data requirements.
Present data insights and visualizations to technical and non-technical stakeholders.
Data Visualization:
Develop interactive dashboards and reports using tools like Tableau, Power BI, or Python libraries.
Statistical Analysis:
Apply statistical methods to evaluate data and validate business hypotheses.
Key Skills:
Proficiency in Python and R for data analysis and model development.
Strong SQL skills for querying and managing large datasets.
Knowledge of Machine Learning algorithms and frameworks (e.g., Scikit-learn, TensorFlow, PyTorch).
Expertise in Data Visualization tools (e.g., Matplotlib, Seaborn, Tableau, Power BI).
Solid foundation in Statistics and Probability for data-driven decision-making.
Familiarity with big data tools (e.g., Spark, Hadoop) is a plus.
Qualifications:
Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, or a related field.
1–3 years of experience in a Data Scientist role or similar analytical position.

jobs.Job_Description:
Role Overview:
We are seeking a skilled and experienced Data Scientist with a minimum of 3 years of experience, including strong exposure to DevOps tools, AI/ML, and MLOps frameworks. The ideal candidate will work closely with data engineers, machine learning engineers, and product teams to develop, deploy, and maintain machine learning models while ensuring seamless integration with CI/CD pipelines.
Key Responsibilities:
Design, build, and optimize machine learning models for large-scale datasets.
Collaborate with data engineers to preprocess, clean, and organize data for machine learning pipelines.
Implement and automate the deployment of machine learning models into production using MLOps practices.
Utilize DevOps tools to integrate ML models into continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines.
Conduct exploratory data analysis, feature engineering, and algorithm selection.
Develop and maintain model monitoring and retraining pipelines to ensure optimal model performance over time.
Provide data-driven insights and recommendations to product and business teams.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams including software developers, data engineers, and DevOps engineers.
Required Qualifications:
Experience: 3+ years in Data Science, with exposure to AI/ML model development and deployment.
Education: Bachelor's or Masters degree in Data Science, Computer Science, Mathematics, Statistics, or a related field.
Technical Skills:
Proficiency in Python and libraries like Pandas, Scikit-learn, TensorFlow, PyTorch, etc.
Strong understanding of machine learning algorithms (supervised/unsupervised learning, reinforcement learning).
Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure) and containerization technologies (Docker, Kubernetes).
Familiarity with DevOps tools such as Jenkins, Git, GitLab CI, or similar for CI/CD integration.
Experience with MLOps tools such as MLflow, Kubeflow, or similar for model management and deployment.
Experience working with big data frameworks (Hadoop, Spark) is a plus.
Knowledge of REST APIs and microservices architecture is a bonus.
Soft Skills:
Strong problem-solving abilities and analytical thinking.
Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and manage multiple projects.
Nice to Have:
Knowledge of NLP, Computer Vision, or deep learning techniques.
Experience with version control for models and data pipelines.
Prior experience in A/B testing and experiment tracking.

Position Overview

We are seeking a proactive and skilled Digital Marketing Specialist to join our team at Pathak Brothers Innovations LLC. This role combines expertise in SEO, email marketing, and social media management, with additional responsibilities in content creation, analytics, and collaboration. The ideal candidate will play a vital role in driving organic growth, improving brand visibility, and enhancing customer engagement.

Key Responsibilities

Search Engine Optimization (SEO)

Conduct comprehensive keyword research and competitor analysis to identify growth opportunities.

Optimize website content, meta tags, headers, and URLs for improved search rankings.

Manage technical SEO, including site speed, mobile-friendliness, and crawl issues.

Develop and implement a content strategy with SEO-friendly blog posts, product pages, and FAQs.

Build and manage a high-quality backlink strategy through outreach and partnerships.

Monitor and analyze website performance using Google Analytics, Search Console, and SEO tools like SEMrush or Ahrefs.

Email Marketing

Design and execute engaging email campaigns to drive traffic and conversions.

Segment email lists based on customer behavior for targeted campaigns.

Use tools like Mailchimp, Klaviyo, or Microsoft 365 for automation and tracking.

Create visually appealing and optimized email templates for promotions and seasonal campaigns.

Develop a marketing calendar to align email campaigns with product launches and trends.

Social Media Management

Plan and execute organic social media strategies for platforms like Facebook, Instagram, and TikTok.

Create and post consistent, engaging, and visually appealing content.

Monitor performance metrics and engage with followers to build a loyal community.

Use trending hashtags, reels, and creative formats to increase reach and engagement.

Collaborate with influencers and manage user-generated content campaigns.

Content Creation & Blog Management

Write or oversee the creation of SEO-optimized blogs, product descriptions, and ad copies.

Collaborate with the multimedia team to create infographics, videos, and GIFs.

Maintain a content calendar for blogs, emails, and social media posts.

Analytics and Reporting

Track and analyze key metrics for SEO, social media, and email campaigns.

Generate and present monthly performance reports with actionable insights.

Monitor trends in organic vs. paid traffic and recommend adjustments.

Affiliate Marketing & Influencer Outreach

Set up and manage affiliate programs to expand brand reach.

Build relationships with micro-influencers and manage collaborations.

Track ROI and optimize campaigns for influencer partnerships.

Basic Graphic Design & Content Updates

Create simple graphics using tools like Canva or Adobe Spark.

Update website content, banners, and landing pages for seasonal promotions.

Collaborate with the Shopify developer to improve landing page conversions.

Online Reputation Management (ORM)

Monitor and respond to customer reviews on Google, Trustpilot, and other platforms.

Encourage positive reviews from satisfied customers and address negative feedback constructively.

Collaboration with Teams

Work with the Shopify developer to implement SEO recommendations and optimize pages.

Guide the content writer on keyword usage and trending topics.

Coordinate with the multimedia editor for ad creatives and promotional videos.

Skills and Qualifications

Proven experience in SEO, email marketing, and social media management (2-3 years).

Knowledge of tools like Google Analytics, SEMrush, Ahrefs, Mailchimp, and Canva.

Familiarity with Shopify or similar e-commerce platforms.

Basic knowledge of HTML and CSS is a plus.

Excellent communication and collaboration skills.

Strong analytical skills and ability to interpret data to improve performance.

Ability to multitask and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment.

Why Join Us?

Work with a growing e-commerce company with global reach.

Remote work environment.

Opportunities for growth and performance-based bonuses.

Collaborative and innovative team culture.

Work Schedule

Full-time, Remote.

Based on EST (New York time).

Compensation

Competitive salary with growth opportunities and monthly bonuses.

Description
At Vitech, we believe in the power of technology to simplify complex business processes. Our mission is to bring better software solutions to market, addressing the intricacies of the insurance and retirement industries. We combine deep domain expertise with the latest technological advancements to deliver innovative, user-centric solutions that future-proof and empower our clients to thrive in an ever-changing landscape. With over 1,600 talented professionals on our team, our innovative solutions are recognized by industry leaders like Gartner, Celent, Aite-Novarica, and ISG.

We offer a competitive compensation package along with comprehensive benefits that support your health, well-being, and financial security.

Associate Consultant, Solution Delivery
Hybrid - Hyderabad Office


What you will do:
As an Associate Consultant within our Solution Delivery team, you will play a vital role in implementing Vitech’s innovative solutions for our clients. Your contributions will directly impact project success by ensuring client requirements are accurately understood and delivered. This is an opportunity to learn, grow, and collaborate in a dynamic environment.

Collaborate and Support:

Customer-focused approach with a keen attention to detail.

Implementation Manager(Remote)

What do you need for this opportunity

Our Hiring Partner is Looking for:
Implementation Manager(Remote) who is passionate about their work, eager to learn and grow, and who is committed to delivering exceptional results. If you are a team player, with a positive attitude and a desire to make a difference, then we want to hear from you.

Role Overview Description
LemonEdge is a scaling FinTech company, with a vision to revolutionizing the private markets industry through redefining the benchmark for back-office accounting technology. LemonEdge launched in March 2020 and seen continued growth; today, with over 60 employees working remotely across six continents. Our seed investors include Blackstone Strategic Innovations, Sidekick Partners and several industry experts, giving us unparalleled advisory and strategic support.
Our fund and portfolio accounting solution is proven across the most complex and largest clients globally in the private capital markets. Located over North America, the Channel Islands, UK and Europe with combined assets of $1.4 Trillion.

The depth and caliber of our teams experience speaks to the excitement we are creating in the industry and ability to attract the very best talent. LemonEdge gives you empowerment to get the job done in a very fast paced environment.

Who are we looking for
Our people are hands-on, entrepreneurial thinkers and doers. As a member of a scaling start-up, you will be well supported by the open, approachable senior team and given the freedom to deliver against our overall business goals. Our home-working policy provides you with the flexibility and autonomy to meet your and your team's goals on your terms.

Your ability to work within a cross-functional team, engage with clients and build strong relationships while being remote are traits which come naturally to you. You are a self-started who can quickly ascertain insights from client conversations, translate those into tangible action items, and be able to close the deal.

About The Role
We are growing our Implementation Team to meet the needs of our rapidly expanding client base and set the foundation for our team to continue growing over the coming years. We have the technology, funding, experience, and capability to scale our business quickly.

We are seeking an experienced software implementor who can work within a small, focused client success team to deliver against our client and partner projects. The successful candidate will have demonstrable experience in a fast-paced and high complexity environment where they have played an active role in delivering financial software solutions through the full software implementation lifecycle. Additionally, the successful candidate will be confident and comfortable in front of clients and will have extensive experience in a client-facing role.

The Role
Work within the Implementation Team to configure and deliver the LemonEdge platform solution to clients and partners.
Collaborate with the Operations Director and other members of the team to ensure projects are understood, scoped, delivered, and have on-going maintenance/support requirements met.
Ensure implementation best practices are met on all engagements.
Ensure clients are trained and supported on an ongoing basis.
Assist in the production of supporting materials for clients and partners, around implementation, configuration, training, and project milestones (project plans, training documentation, etc.).
Interact with clients, partners, and professional services on a daily basis.

About You
Excited by entrepreneurship and becoming a critical member of a disruptive technology company.
2+ years working experience with Advance Excel and VBA, Macros.
You have an intermediate knowledge on working with SQL Server
Experience in working on ETL(Extract,Transform,Load) projects preferred but not essential.
Experience working with Private Equity or fund accounting market preferred but not essential.
Experience working with DevExpress or other reporting tools preferred
You are analytical and have a strong ability to integrate detailed information
You have experience managing multiple projects, setting priorities and meeting deadlines.
A team player who is eager to help where possible.
A passion for technology and finance

What can we offer you
As a member of a small Implementation Team, you will have an active role in delivering enterprise-scale software solutions for some of the world's most elite firms.
Help shape the culture and dynamic of a fast-paced, disruptive technology company.
With access to an incredibly experienced leadership team and a world-class product at your disposal, we offer the tools you need to make your mark.
Autonomy through remote working, with limited travel to clients as required.
A strong in-year and long-term remuneration package.

Engagement Type:
Job Type: Full-time Permanent with LemonEdge
Payroll and Compliance to be managed by: Playroll India Pvt Ltd
Location: Remote.

How to apply for this opportunity?
Register or login on our portal
Click 'Apply,' upload your resume and fill in the required details.
Click 'Start Screening,' and clear the mandatory 30-minute video screening
Get matched and crack a quick interview with our hiring partner.
Land your global dream job and get your exciting career started!

About Our Hiring Partner:
The company is a scaling FinTech company, with a vision to revolutionising the private markets industry through redefining the benchmark for back-office accounting technology. The company launched in March 2020 and has seen continued growth; today, with over 60 employees working remotely across six continents. Our seed investors include Blackstone Strategic Innovations, Sidekick Partners, and several industry experts, giving us unparalleled advisory and strategic support.

About Uplers:
Our goal is to make hiring reliable, simple, and fast. Our role will be to help all our talents find and apply for relevant opportunities and progress in their career. We will support any grievances or challenges you may face during the engagement. You will also be assigned to a dedicated Talent Success Coach during the engagement.

(Note: There are many more opportunities apart from this on the portal. Depending on the assessments you clear, you can apply for them as well).

So, if you are ready for a new challenge, a great work environment, and an opportunity to take your career to the next level, don't hesitate to apply today. We are waiting for you!

jobs.Job_Description:
Subject Matter Expert Cyber Security

Job Description
Position Overview:
The Subject Matter Expert (SME) plays a crucial role within our team, responsible for delivering high-quality educational content and support to students. The SME will utilize their in-depth subject knowledge and experience to perform core activities such as grading, live chat support, on-demand video support and quality assurance, ensuring that all content meets established standards. Additionally, the SME will provide on-demand video support, engage in community support initiatives, and conduct Q&A sessions to foster student understanding and engagement. This role demands proactive learning, the ability to handle complex tasks, and the capacity to offer constructive feedback and process improvements. The SME will also collaborate with mentors to identify and address weak areas within the team, contributing to the overall success and effectiveness of our educational programs.

Eligibility:
Work experience of 3 years in the relevant industry is recommended, with a portfolio to prove skill sets. Experience in EdTech will be an added advantage.
Strong communication skills are essential for delivering live lessons to students in the US.
Proficiency in facilitating sessions via Zoom or other online platforms is required.
Diversified and in-depth subject knowledge with the required degree. 
Good grasp of subject-specific software/tools.
Primary Responsibilities:
Perform all core activities (Grading, Livechat, QA, Live Lessons & Video Weekly Tutoring) within the given guidelines and achieve a QA score of 80% and above.
Deliver quality (QA score will validate) content regarding Grading and Livechat.
Review the expert’s (Mentor Sessions) content as per the latest guidelines and processes.
Proactively learn new activities/software/core subjects and be a part of projects as and when required.
Work on difficult tasks across all activities and deliver content without compromising quality.
Provide suggestions/changes to activity guidelines or process documents.
Review the content from external sources of all difficulty levels and send detailed feedback.
Identify weak areas (Subject/Process) of the MNEs in the team and update them to the Lead. 
Handle queries from outside experts (MNEs).
Provide on-demand video support for students.
Participate in community support initiatives to assist students and resolve their queries.
Conduct Q&A sessions as needed to enhance student understanding and engagement.
Train MNEs and monitor their progress throughout their first 90 days (about 3 months) of onboarding. 
Support and guide MNEs in their day-to-day processes.
Curate new tools and technology for respective subjects.
Suggest additions/corrections to the current curriculum.
Suggest new courses to be added as per market demand.
Gauge incoming volume for chat and grading and suggest redistributing working shifts as needed. 
Prepare initial reports for SME grading contribution and Livechat effectiveness.

Secondary Responsibilities:
Analyze graded checkpoints and chats/video support and rate them as per defined standards.
Present findings and recommendations in a plan that drives future process improvements.

Education -
M.Tech/ MSc/ B.Tech/BSc or any equivalent degree. (15 years full-time education)
Relevant Cyber Security certifications are desirable.
