jobs.Job_Title: Marketing Professionals For a B2B Digital Mktg Agency
jobs.Skills_Required: Copy Writing, Marketing Collaterals, Google AdWords, Email Marketing, Digital Marketing
jobs.Job_Description:
Do you love marketing?

Do you understand how important is marketing for sales?

Do you like to get your hands dirty to understand your product or service in detail, so you can market it effectively?

Do you think you can prove yourself in B2B marketing (and sometimes B2C) for our firm and later also for our clients, who are highly technical brands?

If yes, perhaps this role is what be "the role" that will enable "fast growth" for you, your clients and your firm...

Role & responsibilities
Since our own Digital Marketing team is busy driving digital marketing campaigns for our clients, we often find ourselves ignoring to market our own products and services to our prospects and customers!

We now plan to start with a 1-2 person team, who're expected to accelerate growth of our products & services and thereby motivate us to invest in growing the team under her/him.

Plus, be able to review and monitor campaigns being executed by our Digital Marketing team and create reports and dashboard for weekly reviews.

In the long run, this role provides opportunity to grow into the Chief Marketing Officer or our company, and even the CEO--if you are able to grow yourself into leading and managing a sales team too.

Preferred candidate profile

We are seeking candidates with only 1 to 3 years of experience in a similar role, but posessing good skill sets and behavioural traits.

if you have work experience or educational background related to B2B electronics industry, that would be a bonus.

SKILL SETS REQUIRED
Proficency in developing marketing collaterals such as brochures, flyers, and presentations to promote IT services and consulting solutions.
Ability to execute a marketing strategy by crafting copy, planning good designs and creatives with help of colleagues and executing them across different platforms
Strong understanding of copy writing principles and ability to create error-free compelling content for diverse audiences.
Ability to do FAB analysis (features --> advantages --> benefits --> benefits) analysis for any product or service including highly technical products and services such as whitepapers, events and webinars
Proficiency in using at-least one digital advertising platform efficiently and effectively i.e. Google, Facebook, LinkedIn, Insta or Youtube. (Ideally Google ad words platform).
Experience in handling B2B marketing and B2C campaigns too
Ability to understand technical/engineering concepts related to electronics and IT industry
Experience in executing, analysing and understanding reports of various platforms such as Google Analytics, SEMrush, GetResponse, etc.
Create engaging copy for various marketing materials including website content, blog posts, social media updates, and email campaigns.
BONUS: Manage Google AdWords campaigns to drive traffic to our website and generate leads.
BONUS: Ability to design visually appealing graphics using Canva or similar tools for digital marketing assets.

BEHAVIOURAL TRAITS EXPECTED
Love for the field of marketing, and how it can be a key enabler for sales

jobs.Job_Description:
Job Summary:
We are seeking a highly organized and detail-oriented individual to join our team as a Marketing Communication professional who would work under the guidance of the Manager in national and International Events, focusing on executing the subsequent responsibilities. The primary objective is to ensure the successful execution of FirstView top-notch events and conferences with a strong emphasis on quality.
Location: Remote work- kindly ensure you are fully available over phone and mail during working hours. Calls, messages, and mails must be responded to properly. Base location change must be informed through formal request.
Must have: Candidates must have their own laptop and mobile with sim. You may avail of the BYOD policy to buy a laptop.
Trainee Period : 1 year
Work Time: 9.30 am to 6.30 pm weekdays and two Saturdays 9.30 am to 2 pm
We are looking for a motivated Trainee in Content Marketing to join our dynamic marketing team. You will contribute to content creation, social media engagement, and content optimization efforts. This role offers an excellent opportunity for an entry-level candidate to learn digital marketing strategies, content development, and audience engagement in a collaborative environment.
Key Responsibilities:
Content Creation
Assist in developing engaging content for our website, blog, social media, and newsletters.Research industry trends and audience interests to support content ideas.Collaborate with the design team to create visuals and multimedia content.
Social Media Engagement
Support the execution of social media plans, including scheduling posts and monitoring engagement.Respond to comments and messages under guidance to build community engagement.Contribute ideas for social media campaigns and track performance.
Content Optimization and SEO
Learn and apply SEO principles to optimize website and blog content.Conduct keyword research to enhance content and SEO strategy.
Analytics and Reporting
Use analytics tools like Google Analytics to track content performance.Provide insights and recommendations based on data analysis.
Market Research
Research industry trends, competitor strategies, and audience preferences.Stay updated on the latest content marketing practices.
Team Collaboration
Work closely with the Content Marketing Manager, design team, and other departments.Participate in team meetings to share ideas and discuss campaign performance.
Qualifications:
Bachelors degree in Marketing, Communications, Journalism, or related field.
Strong writing and communication skills.
Basic knowledge of social media platforms (e.g., Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn).
Familiarity with SEO principles and keyword research (preferred).
Analytical mindset and eagerness to learn from performance data.
Previous internship or course work in marketing, social media, or content creation is a plus.
Standard benefits on employment confirmation:
Work from home with occasional meetings along with scope of global work exposure.
Tech driven, employee-friendly work culture.
Open-door, new-age, start-up culture.
App-based insurance benefits, accidental cover, maternity benefits, provident fund.
Two monthly Saturdays optional off.
BYOD policy to purchase assets with company support.
Leaves/breaks/Optional holidays.

jobs.Job_Title: HR Business Process Associate - Night Shift - Immediate Joiner
jobs.Skills_Required: Communication Skills, Business Process, Strong Communication Skills, Policies, hr, LCA, HR Processes, US Process, HR Functions, H1B, Immigration, HR Strategy, Management Skills, Interpersonal Skills
jobs.Job_Description:
NOTE: Please apply only if you are willing to work in the night shift.
Shift Hours - 8:30pm -- 4:30am IST

HRBPA Roles & Responsibilities:
Specialized in interpreting and applying HR laws, regulations, policies, program principles, and concepts to provide advice or technical services in one or more HR functional areas; conducting factfinding and recommending solutions to resolve well-precedented factual, procedural, and/or recurring HR issues.

The individual would be responsible to process US H1B Work Permit (CAP, Extension & Amendment) request from partners. The responsibilities around immigration will include (but not exhaustive):
Individual will have to coordinate, execute, and track onboarding process related activities and ensure a smooth transition of the new hire from TA to business,
Liaise between employees, payroll, legal, I-9, and other internal stakeholders to support employees and their immigration actions
Managing the H-1B Extension and amendment request received from employees
Receiving and validating documents submitted by the employees as per checklist
Assess eligibility for extension and amendment of work permit petition
Determine prevailing wage applicable to respective US states
Initiate Labor Condition Application (LCA) Filing
Prepare LCA Input, determine Standard Occupational Classification (SOC) code for filing the LCA with the Department of Labor (US - DoL) as per US Citizenship & Immigration Services (USCIS) rules and regulations.
Assist with PERM labor certification process; including posting physical/electronic notices, assisting with applicant review process and answering DOL sponsorship questionnaires for PERM labor certification filings
Participate with H-1B Cap submission, petition review, updating internal resources, answering questions via the ticketing system, and other ongoing internal processes/projects as needed
As needed, consult with and support employee relocation cases, providing the best possible customer support by managing the end to end process and experience of the relocating employee and stakeholders involved.

Required Technical and Professional Expertise
Candidates should possess a degree in MBA HR or BBA HR
Basic US Immigration knowledge (Hands on experience working with any Immigration tool would be an added advantage)
Good Communication Skills
Command over written & spoken English is a MUST
Basic excel knowledge, tech savvy and ability to learn new systems/ technologies right away
Ability to handle multiple projects and deadlines.
Knowledge HRMS or payroll software is a plus.

We're looking for Security Analyst with expertise in SIEM, EDR and NSM solutions.

Operational support using SIEM solutions (Splunk, Sentinel, CrowdStrike Falcon LogScale), EDR (CrowdStrike, Defender, Carbon Black) and NSM (Fidelis, ExtraHop) for multiple customers.
Specialized in second level incident validation and more detailed investigation
Performs incident coordination and communication with client to ensure effective containment, eradication, and recovery
SIEM support activities which includes adhoc reporting and basic troubleshooting
Advise customers on best practices and use cases on how to use this solution to achieve customer end state requirements.
Provide near real-time analysis, investigating, reporting, remediation, coordinating and tracking of security-related activities for customer

Skills and attributes for success

Customer Service oriented - Meets commitments to customers; Seeks feedback from customers to identify improvement opportunities.
Good knowledge of SIEM technologies such as Splunk, Azure Sentinel, CrowdStrike Falcon LogScale from a Security analysts point of view
Troubleshoot issues associated with SIEM solution.
Ability to work with minimal levels of supervision or oversight.
Exposure to IOT/OT monitoring (Claroty, Nozomi Networks etc.) is a plus
Good knowledge and experience in Security Monitoring
Good knowledge and experience in Cyber Incident Response
Knowledge in ELK Stack
Knowledge in Network monitoring technology platforms such as Fidelis XPS, ExtraHop
Knowledge in endpoint protection tools, techniques, and platforms such as Carbon Black, Tanium, CrowdStrike, Defender etc

To qualify for the role, you must have

B. Tech./ B.E. with sound technical skills
Ability to work in 24x7 shifts
Strong command on verbal and written English language.
Demonstrate both technical acumen and critical thinking abilities.
Strong interpersonal and presentation skills.
Minimum 3 years of Hands-on experience in SIEM/EDR/NSM solutions
Certification in any of the SIEM platforms
Knowledge of RegEx, Perl scripting and SQL query language.
Certification - CCSA, CEH, CISSP, GCIH, GIAC.

SAP BTP Full stack UI5 & RAP Developer

We are seeking a highly motivated Junior SAP BTP UI & Backend Developer to join our team. Job_Title: QA Tester

Job Description:
We are looking for a QA Tester to assess software quality through manual and automated testing. You will be responsible for finding and reporting bugs and glitches.
In this role, you should have a keen eye for detail and excellent communication skills. If you are competent in executing test cases and passionate about quality, wed love to meet you.
Ultimately, you will ensure that our products, applications, and systems work correctly.

Responsibilities:
Review and analyze system specifications.
Collaborate with QA Engineers to develop effective strategies and test plans.
Execute test cases (manual or automated) and analyze results.
Evaluate product code according to specifications.
Create logs to document testing phases and defects.
Report bugs and errors to development teams.
Help troubleshoot issues.
Work with cross-functional teams to ensure quality throughout the software development lifecycle.

Requirements:
Ability to document and troubleshoot errors.
Excellent communication skills.
Attention to detail.
Analytical mind and problem-solving aptitude.
Strong organizational skills.
Basic knowledge of SQL queries.
Working knowledge of test management software is a plus.
Familiarity with Agile frameworks and regression testing is a plus.
Knowledge of automation tools like Selenium or Appium will be a huge advantage.
Educational Qualification: BSc/BE/BTech in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.

jobs.Job_Description:
Job Summary:
We are seeking a skilled .NET Developer with expertise in Microsoft Azure and DevOps to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will design, develop, and maintain scalable, high-performance applications while integrating cloud and DevOps practices to ensure efficient deployment, monitoring, and continuous delivery.
Key Responsibilities:
Application Development:
Design, develop, and maintain web and desktop applications using .NET technologies (C#, ASP.NET, .NET Core).
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand business requirements and implement technical solutions.
Cloud Integration:
Design, deploy, and manage applications on Microsoft Azure, ensuring high availability and scalability.
Utilize Azure services such as Azure App Services, Azure Functions, Azure DevOps, Azure SQL Database, and Blob Storage.
DevOps Practices:
Implement CI/CD pipelines using Azure DevOps to streamline build, test, and deployment processes.
Automate infrastructure provisioning using Infrastructure as Code (IaC) tools such as ARM templates, Terraform, or Bicep.
Monitor application performance and infrastructure using Azure Monitor, Application Insights, and Log Analytics.
Collaboration & Documentation:
Work closely with QA, product managers, and other stakeholders to deliver high-quality solutions.
Document application designs, technical specifications, and processes.
Code Quality & Performance:
Perform code reviews to ensure adherence to coding stand ards and best practices.
Optimize application performance and troubleshoot issues effectively.
Required Qualifications:
Education: BaBachelor'schelors degree in computer science, Software Engineering, or a related field.
Experience:
3+ years of professional experience in .NET development.
2+ years of experience with Azure services and DevOp s practices.
Technical Skills:
Proficient in C#, .NET Framework, .NET Core, and ASP.NET MVC/Web API.
Hands-on experience with Azure resources like Azure App Services, Functions, Logic Apps, and Service Bus.
Expertise in CI/CD pipelines using Azure DevOps or similar tools.
Familiarity with containerization using Docker and orchestration using Kubernetes.
Strong knowledge of relational databases like SQL Server and cloud databases like Azure SQL.
Experience with version control systems such as Git.
Preferred Qualifications:
Microsoft Azure certifications (e.g., Azure Developer Associate, Azure Solutions Architect).
Knowledge of front-end frameworks like Angular, React, or Blazor.
Experience with microservices architecture and RESTful APIs.
Familiarity with Agile and Scrum methodologies.

jobs.Job_Description:
At innoscripta, we are revolutionizing the landscape of research and development with our advanced F&E software solutions. As a market leader in Germany, our software empowers companies to manage and scale complex innovation projects seamlessly. Our mission is to enable businesses to unlock their full potential through cutting-edge technology, and we are looking for a talented QA Engineer to help us continue delivering world-class solutions.
Who were looking for:
Individuals with excellent written and spoken English skills, adept at clear communication and documentation.
Candidates with a basic understanding of git and CI/CD processes and version control.
Experience in API testing and basic programming knowledge, preferably in SQL and Playwright.
An understanding of software architecture principles.
Familiarity with agile methodology in fast-paced development environments, emphasizing collaboration and adaptability.
Proactive problem solvers eager to stay updated on the latest testing methodologies, tools, and best practices.
What will you be doing?
Designing and creating test scenarios and test cases.
Conducting manual and regression testing.
Reporting bugs with detailed, clear, and reproducible steps.
Working with tools like Click Up, GitLab, Postman, and DevTools.
Collaborating with developers and product managers, providing feedback and insights from a testing perspective.
Contributing to the improvement of the CI/CD pipeline, ensuring tests are effectively integrated.
Compiling comprehensive test cases to ensure full coverage.
What awaits you at our company?
Unlimited Contract: Enjoy stability with the potential for rapid career advancement and leadership roles.
Competitive Salary: Receive an above-average salary that reflects your skills and contributions.
Paid Vacation: Benefit from paid vacation days right from your first year with us.
Dynamic Environment: Thrive in an international setting with flat hierarchies and swift decision-making processes.
Autonomy: Shape your role with significant autonomy and make a real impact.
Work-Life Balance: Savor after-work drinks and our delightful Tasty Thursday events.
Commuter Support: We cover your monthly travel expenses to make commuting easier.
Meal Tickets: Enjoy meal tickets as part of your perks.
Professional Development: Pursue your career goals with our individualized professional development opportunities.
Community: Engage in regular get-togethers and various celebratory events.
Flexible Work Options: After proving yourself, enjoy the option to work from home one day a week.
Why join innoscripta?If you have a keen eye for detail and a passion for enhancing software quality through thorough testing, we want to hear from you! Join us at innoscripta and be part of the leading force in F&E software development, where your contributions directly shape the future of innovation.
Apply Now and take the next step in your career at innoscripta!

jobs.Job_Description:
We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Automated Tester to join our Quality Assurance
(QA) team. The ideal candidate will have extensive experience in automated testing, workload
management, and implementing best practices. This role demands a Day 0 productive mindset,
where the candidate can immediately contribute to ensuring the quality, reliability, and
performance of our applications.

Responsibilities
Design, develop, and maintain automated test scripts and frameworks to validate application functionality, performance, and reliability.
Execute and analyze results from automated tests, reporting issues and working with developers to resolve them.
Implement and enforce QA best practices and methodologies across the team.
Manage workload and prioritize testing efforts to meet tight deadlines without compromising quality.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand application workflows and ensure comprehensive test coverage.
Develop and maintain regression test suites to ensure stability across application updates.
Establish and monitor key testing metrics to evaluate product quality and testing effectiveness.
Stay updated with the latest testing tools and technologies and recommend their adoption where appropriate.

Job Specific Skills

Technical Skills
Proficiency in automated testing tools such as Selenium, Cypress, Playwright, or similar frameworks.
Strong scripting skills in Python, JavaScript, or Java for developing test automation scripts.
Hands-on experience with API testing tools like Postman, SoapUI, or RestAssured.
Familiarity with performance testing tools like JMeter, LoadRunner, or Gatling.
Expertise in testing frameworks like TestNG, JUnit, or PyTest.
Experience with CI/CD tools such as Jenkins, GitLab CI/CD, or GitHub Actions for integrating automated tests.
Knowledge of version control systems, particularly Git.
Understanding of containerized environments and tools like Docker for test environment setup.
Strong ability to document testing processes, frameworks, and results using Markdown or Asciidoc.

Testing Practices
Comprehensive knowledge of QA methodologies, tools, and processes.
Experience with workload management and prioritization to meet aggressive testing timelines.
Strong understanding of agile development processes and sprint-based testing cycles.
Familiarity with security testing practices and tools.

Soft Skills
Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.
Strong communication skills for collaborating with cross-functional teams.
Proactive approach to identifying testing gaps and implementing solutions.
Ability to handle multiple tasks and meet tight deadlines in a fast-paced environment.

Qualifications
Bachelors degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
At least 3-5 years of experience in automated testing roles.

Preferred Skills
Experience with cloud-based testing environments and tools.
Familiarity with testing for mobile applications on Android and iOS platforms.
Exposure to compliance standards and testing requirements in the financial industry.
Certification in ISTQB or other recognized QA credentials.

Benefits
Competitive salary and comprehensive benefits package.
Opportunities for professional growth and advancement.
Flexible work hours and remote work options.
Dynamic and supportive work environment.
Employee wellness and engagement programs.

Marsh McLennan (NYSE: MMC) is the worlds leading professional services firm in the areas of risk, strategy and people. The Companys more than 85,000 colleagues advise clients in over 130 countries.  With annual revenue of $23 billion, Marsh McLennan helps clients navigate an increasingly dynamic and complex environment through four market-leading businesses. Marsh provides data-driven risk advisory services and insurance solutions to commercial and consumer clients. Guy Carpenter  develops advanced risk, reinsurance and capital strategies that help clients grow profitably and pursue emerging opportunities. Mercer  delivers advice and technology-driven solutions that help organizations redefine the world of work, reshape retirement and investment outcomes, and unlock health and well being for a changing workforce. Oliver Wyman serves as a critical strategic, economic and brand advisor to private sector and governmental clients. For more information, visit marshmclennan.com, or follow us on LinkedIn and X.

Marsh McLennan is committed to embracing a diverse, inclusive and flexible work environment. We aim to attract and retain the best people and embrace diversity of age, background, caste, disability, ethnic origin, family duties, gender orientation or expression, gender reassignment, marital status, nationality, parental status, personal or social status, political affiliation, race, religion and beliefs, sex/gender, sexual orientation or expression, skin color, or any other characteristic protected by applicable law.

Marsh McLennan is committed to hybrid work, which includes the flexibility of working remotely and the collaboration, connections and professional development benefits of working together in the office. All Marsh McLennan colleagues are expected to be in their local office or working onsite with clients at least three days per week. Office-based teams will identify at least one anchor day per week on which their full team will be together in person.

jobs.Job_Description:
About the Role:
We are seeking an experienced Senior Quality Assurance Engineer to join our growing tech team. With 4+ years of hands-on experience in QA, you will be responsible for leading testing efforts, ensuring the delivery of high-quality software, and enhancing the overall user experience. You will collaborate closely with developers, product managers, and other stakeholders to drive quality initiatives and implement best practices in software testing.

Key Responsibilities:
• Lead and execute comprehensive test strategies across manual and automated testing for web and mobile applications.
• Design and implement automated test scripts using industry-standard tools .
• Manage, prioritize, and execute functional, regression, integration, and performance tests to ensure that our products meet the highest quality standards.
• Review product specifications, user stories, and requirements to develop effective test cases and ensure alignment with business needs.
• Identify, document, and track defects using JIRA, TestRail, or similar bug tracking systems; ensure timely resolution.
• Conduct end-to-end testing across various platforms and environments (e.g., web, mobile, cross-browser).
• Analyze results, troubleshoot issues, and provide recommendations to developers and product teams on improvements.
• Contribute to the continuous improvement of testing processes, tools, and methodologies.
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams (DevOps, product, and engineering) to ensure timely releases and proper test coverage.
• Perform load testing using tools, performance testing to ensure scalability and responsiveness under various load conditions.
• Report test results, risks, and quality status to key stakeholders in regular meetings and via test reports.

Required Skills and Qualifications:
• Bachelor's degree in computer science, Engineering, or a related field, or equivalent experience.
• 2+ years of experience in software quality assurance with a focus on both manual and automated testing.
• Proficiency in programming languages such as Java, Python, JavaScript, or similar.
• Experience with test management tools like JIRA, TestRail, or similar.
• Solid understanding of Agile/Scrum methodologies and SDLC (Software Development Life Cycle).
• Hands-on experience with API testing.
• Deep knowledge of web technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, RESTful APIs) and mobile platforms (iOS/Android).
• Ability to write and maintain automated tests for both front-end and back-end systems.
• Strong analytical and problem-solving skills to identify issues and propose solutions.
• Excellent communication skills and the ability to collaborate with both technical and non-technical team

jobs.Job_Description:
If you are excited about building innovative products, coding, and designing are your strengths and want to be part of a growing team, read on.

Job Title: Software Engineer - Full Stack Web Development (PHP and MySQL)

Job Type: Full Time. Minimum 2 years of experience as a software engineer.

Salary commensurate with education and experience.

Location: Visakhapatnam, Andhra Pradesh; Hyderabad, Telangana, India only.

Hybrid work opportunity for applicants residing in Hyderabad, Telangana, or Vizag, Andhra Pradesh locations only.

Candidates are to apply with detailed resumes (include correct dates in DD/MM/YYYY format) only.

Learn more at www.hrgeckos.com

Desired Candidate Profile
As a Software Development Engineer at Geckos Business Solutions Pvt Ltd, you will have the opportunity to work in a fast-paced environment with an experienced team developing e-commerce and other web-based technology solutions. You will be responsible for defining, designing, and developing frontend, and backend data flows, and interactions across various components of technology solutions. In addition, you will participate in code reviews, and documentation, and be responsible for working closely with your team to deliver technology solutions at the highest quality and within committed timelines.

Required Experience, Skills, and Qualifications Minimum Qualifications:

1. Bachelor of Technology (B.Tech.) / Bachelor of Engineering (B.E.) / Master of Computer Applications (MCA) degree with a good academic record.
2. Minimum of 2 years of hands-on experience as a software engineer:
- working with both frontend and backend web development;
- developing responsive frontend UI using HTML5, CSS, Bootstrap, Ajax, Javascript, jQuery, JSON; and,
- designing, planning, and delivering software platforms on a schedule.
3. Hands-on experience with backend development, scripting, web server management, MySQL, SQL, RDBMS, and data modeling.
4. Must possess an understanding of security principles and how they apply to web-based technology solutions.
5. Must be knowledgeable of source code control Git/SVN, etc.

Preferred Qualifications:
1. Experience with PHP frameworks like Codeigniter, CakePHP, etc.
2. Hands-on experience with frameworks like wooCommerce, Magento, Drupal, Joomla.
3. Experience with Amazon Web Services (AWS) and mobile application development (iOS/Android) is a definite plus.
4. Experience with AI and ML.
5. Experience with payment integration and APIs.


TO ALL RECRUITMENT AGENCIES: Geckos Business Solutions (GBS) does not accept unsolicited agency resumes. Please do not forward resumes to our jobs portal, GBS employees, or any other company location. GBS is not responsible for any fees related to unsolicited resumes.

Perks and Benefits Benefits:
Paid sick-time
Paid time-off

Schedule:
Monday to Friday
Flexible Schedules. Core Business Hours are 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM IST

Supplemental Pay:
Performance bonus is based on performance KPIs and is only eligible after completing one year of employment.
Learning and Professional Development allowances are based on performance KPIs and are only eligible after completing one year of employment.

Job Summary
We are seeking a detail-oriented and proactive Business Analyst to join our team. The ideal candidate will act as a bridge between IT and business teams, optimizing processes and implementing technology solutions that align with organizational goals. You will leverage your expertise in business intelligence, process improvement, and data analysis to drive strategic initiatives and enhance decision-making.
Key Responsibilities
Collaborate with stakeholders to gather, analyze, and document business requirements.
Work closely with IT teams to develop and implement technology solutions tailored to business needs.
Perform data analysis to identify trends, provide insights, and support decision-making processes.
Develop business intelligence reports and dashboards to track KPIs and organizational performance.
Identify areas for process improvement and recommend strategies for optimization.
Facilitate effective communication between technical and non-technical teams.
Support the testing and deployment of new systems or enhancements to existing systems.
Prepare and present reports, proposals, and findings to management and other stakeholders.
Qualifications and Skills
Educational Background: Bachelors degree in Business Administration, Information Technology, or a related field.
Experience: 1-3 years of relevant experience in business analysis, IT strategy, or related fields.
Technical Skills:
Proficiency in business intelligence tools (e.g., Power BI, Tableau).
Knowledge of data analysis techniques and tools (e.g., Excel, SQL).
Understanding of process improvement methodologies (e.g., Lean, Six Sigma).
Soft Skills:
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
Excellent communication and interpersonal abilities.
Ability to work collaboratively with cross-functional teams.
Strong organizational and time-management skills.
Preferred Qualifications
Experience in bridging gaps between IT and business teams.
Familiarity with project management tools and methodologies.
Certifications such as CBAP, CCBA, or relevant BI certifications are a plus.

jobs.Skills_Required: SOX Compliance, SAP R3, ECC, SAP GRC
jobs.Job_Description:
Job Summary
We are seeking an experienced IT Internal Auditor to join our dynamic Internal Audit team. This role will primarily focus on evaluating and testing IT controls within our SAP R/3 ECC 6.0 environment to ensure compliance with the Sarbanes-Oxley Act (SOX). You will also assist in reviewing other IT-related financial reporting controls, conducting risk assessments, and supporting continuous improvement initiatives within our internal audit processes.
The ideal candidate will have a strong background in SAP auditing, ITGC testing, and SOX compliance, combined with the ability to collaborate across various business functions. A proactive approach to process improvements and experience in working with diverse IT systems (including Oracle, Active Directory, AWS, CyberArk, and Linux) will be highly valued.

Key Job Areas of Responsibilities
1. SOX Compliance Testing:
Conduct thorough testing of IT controls within the SAP environment to ensure SOX compliance.
Testing of IT controls over Oracle, Active Directory, AWS, CyberArk and Linux.
2. Quality Assurance:
Assist in quality assurance review over IT related financial reporting controls within the Sarbanes Oxley (SOX) compliance program.
Support the Internal Audit Manager on various departmental tasks, compliance investigations, continuous improvement initiatives and management reporting.
3. Risk Assessment & Audit Planning:
Prepare preliminary risk assessments, define audit scopes, conduct fieldwork identifying control weaknesses and non-compliance, discuss audit results with management, draft audit reports and perform the follow-up of Management corrective action plans on a regular basis.
Add value to auditees by sharing best practices and through constructive and solution-driven discussions.
Participate in developing the annual Risk Assessment and Audit Plan
4. Stakeholder Communication:
Regular communication and management of stakeholders including Senior Management and business process owners.
5. Process Improvements (Kaizen):
Support GEM implementation across Internal Audit by:
Having a focused process improvement mindset ( automation, standardization etc)
at least 1 Kaizen idea raised per month (and one implemented Kaizen every 2 months)
Improvements/ projects with bigger impact on the portfolio, activities and KPIs
6. Root Cause Analysis (RCCA):
RCCA (Root Cause Analysis) continuous focus
Education
B Tech/ MCA/ BSc /BCom/CISA/CIA
Experience Required
Must Have
5-7 years of experience in testing SOX controls in SAP R/3 ECC 6.0 environment.
Good to have
1-5 years of experience in programming in C++, Java, Python
Good knowledge of ITGC controls over Oracle, Active Directory, AWS, CyberArk and Linux

Key Skills and Knowledge
Fluent in English
Excellent knowledge of SAP R/3 ECC 6.0 environment.
Good knowledge of Sarbanes Oxley (SOX) IT general controls.
Ability to develop strong partnerships/working relationships with all functional areas.
Good Teamwork & Communication 

Why Join Us?
Growth and Development: We offer opportunities for professional development, including support for certifications and continuous learning.
Innovative Culture: Be part of a forward-thinking team focused on improving processes, driving automation, and optimizing audit practices.
Collaborative Environment: Work alongside a dynamic team of professionals who are dedicated to making an impact and adding value to the business.

jobs.Job_Description:
Job_Description
Maersk is going through times of unprecedented change. As we aspire to secure sustainable growth for our businesses, we need to rethink the way we engage with our customers and partners.
If you are interested in working in an entrepreneurial and ever-changing environment, developing new products that engage and provide an enhanced customer experience, you may be the right fit for us.
Joining Maersk will take you on an exciting journey of career advancement in a global organization. As an SAP Development Engineer working with the new-age SAP Platform, you will gain broad business knowledge of the companys activities globally as well as take part in the transformation of the transport and logistics industry.
You will work and communicate across geographical and cultural borders, which will enable you to build a strong professional network. We will provide you with opportunities that broaden your knowledge and strengthen your technical and professional foundation.
Roles and responsibilities
Develop, test, and deploy SAP ABAP solutions based on the solution architect's and lead engineer's design, while also supporting successful implementation and transition to the application support team.
Work as part of the SAP Technical Team and help the senior members understand business pain points, provide insight to enhance the development pipelines, and provide design solutions for integrating other non-SAP applications.
Be at the forefront of exploring new SAP technologies, be a quick learner willing to learn new technologies and methodologies and maintain current knowledge of industry trends and standards.
builds and maintains a solid understanding of the application areas and the business areas.
Collaborate and contribute with senior developers of the product team or development team(s) for targeted outcomes.
Support the product owner by ensuring code quality and following best practices.
Good communication skills are required, as the job requires a high degree of verbal and written communication.
Be highly motivated, hardworking, and possess good time management skills.
Exposure to delivering projects in an Agile framework
SAP certifications in their specialty area would be advantageous.
Knowledge, Skills, and Experience
410 years of core SAP ABAP development experience
A bachelor's or master's degree is required, or equivalent experience.
experienced in developing solutions in one of the modules: FICA, BRIM, MM, RAR, FI, SD (S/4 HANA and ECC)
13 full-lifecycle SAP implementation projects
Experience in designing and developing interfaces using ABAP proxies, OData, IDocs, BAPIs, and AIF
Experience with ALV Reports, Flexible Workflows, Adobe Forms, Smart Forms, ,
Experience in consuming or exposing web services (i.e., SOAP, REST)
Experience in classical and kernel BADI's, BTE's, substitution and validations, and other enhancement frameworks
Experience and knowledge in developing HANA-based artifacts like CDS views, table functions, and AMDP
Knowledge of the RESTful ABAP Programming (RAP) model
Experience with Upgrade projects, Support Pack applications, SPAU, SPDD, SPAU_ENH resolutions, and OSS note applications
It is a huge plus if you can develop, architect, and manage Fiori applications based on the ABAP stack and technologies like SAP UI5, HTML5, Fiori, ABAP, OData, and Java-script.
Experience developing and troubleshooting large-scale custom FIORI-based applications
Experience in conventional workflow and BRF+
It is good to have knowledge and experience in enterprise extensibility, like in-app extensibility and side-by-side extension.
It is good to have knowledge and experience in building scalable applications over SAP BTP using RAP or CAP.
Knowledge of or experience with e-documents

Company Information:
A pioneer of quality furniture in India, Urban Ladder was founded in 2012 with a simple mission - to make a million homes beautiful. Since 2020, we have been a part of Reliance Retail and today, we are a one stop shop for all furniture and dcor products in India with over 30,000 products from 150 brands delivering across 3000+ pin codes. With an omni-channel presence in all major cities in India, we make exceptional furniture more accessible to people and continue to thrive, helping people create inspiring homes.
We are there to help our customers discover the joy of creating and build spaces that mirror who they are.
The UL Workplace: Magical Careers begin with great work that doesn't come with boundaries. Our people prefer to blaze a trail, instead of keeping the lights on. Thats because whether its sourcing, engineering, design, marketing, customer service or any of our teams; our work is always new, challenging and up-to-the-minute.
About the role:
The ideal candidate will have excellent creative thinking skills and be able to create designs based on conversations with a client. The candidate should be confident in communicating regularly with the client in order to assess their needs and be able to adjust a given approach based on feedback. The candidate should maintain familiarity with the interior design landscape and trends in order to provide the best ideas for clients.
Responsibilities
Understand customer needs and develop complete design to suit their requirements.
Create aesthetically and functionally sound designs and floor plans for various projects.
Communicate effectively with client, vendors and team in order to address client needs and execution/production needs.
Prepare client presentations with necessary 2D and 3D outputs.
Work out costing and create quotes for clients.
Maintain industry knowledge & Gain knowledge on competitors and their offerings/processes in order to stay relevant.
Should be able to multitask, prioritize tasks and handle multiple clients at the same point.
Ability to Handle Customer objections .
Qualifications
Bachelor's degree in Interior Designing/ Architecture / Post Graduation in Interior Designing/ Business Owner / Freelancer having minimum 3 yrs experience and completed 20-30 projects in related field.
Proficient in Sketchup, AutoCAD, Enscape, Adobe suite(basic) and Microsoft Office suite.
Strong creative and communication skills.
Demonstrated ability to execute & previous track record.
Requirements
Ability to understand Customer mindset in terms of design requirements, budget and overall need.
Ability to gauge Customer, sharp and proactive in communication, stellar confidence, handling Customer objections, Customer Negotiation.
Min 2-3 years of proven experience in design sales and delivery.
Experience in Interior Designing Background is a must.
Knowledge of customer relationship management (CRM) practices.
Interior design experience as a designer is an add-on.
Problem-solving attitude.
Excellent communication skills.
Aptitude for fostering positive relationships.
Teamwork and leadership skills.
Customer-oriented mindset .
B-Arch/BSc-ID/Post Graduate is preferred

jobs.Job_Description:
Job_Description

Job Location: Kochi, India (WFH)
Shift: Day Job
Experience :0-1 year
Job Type: Full-time

Job Summary:
Teksalah is looking for an ambitious and intelligent individual to join our highly efficient Support team at Kochi office (WFH). As a Technical Support Engineer, you will be given the opportunity to get hands-on experience working with Latest technology in Teksalah. Come join a team where we have mentors (NOT managers) that provide their team with all the skills, tools and knowledge to cultivate a long and successful career.

Responsibilities:
Deliver remote technical support to Teksalah customers, ensuring a seamless and responsive support experience.
Take full ownership of reported customer issues, following through to resolution with diligence and professionalism.
Effectively diagnose, troubleshoot, and identify appropriate solutions to resolve technical challenges.
Provide prompt, clear, and accurate feedback to customers, ensuring their concerns are addressed efficiently.
Contribute to a robust knowledge base by documenting solutions in the form of tech notes and articles.
Recommend innovative and effective solutions, focusing on enhancing the functionality of applications and systems.
Demonstrate creativity and resourcefulness in offering solutions and workarounds tailored to customer needs.
Collaborate with the Network Team in the design, installation, upgrading, troubleshooting, and resolution of issues in customer environments.
Offer expert assistance with similar technologies for both new and existing customer deployments.
Coordinate support coverage for assigned cases, ensuring seamless handling during planned down time.

Required Personal Skills:
A self-motivated professional with the ability to manage multiple tasks effectively in a high-pressure, fast-paced, and rapidly growing environment.
Experience in providing remote technical support, coupled with excellent verbal, non-verbal, listening, and interpersonal communication skills to ensure outstanding customer interactions.
A demonstrated aptitude for quickly understanding customer environments and third-party products, enabling the extension of functionality to address new and evolving requirements.
Strong problem-solving and decision-making abilities, with a collaborative approach to identifying, defining, and resolving issues, including determining the most effective course of action.
Capable of executing network-related project tasks independently, with minimal supervision, while maintaining high standards of quality and efficiency.

Required Technical Skills:
Ability to quickly analyse and respond to customer security threats with precision and efficiency.
Strong foundational knowledge of TCP/IP, networking protocols, switches, and routers.
Knowledge in network security, including firewalls and associated security protocols.
Demonstrated capability to execute network-related project tasks independently with minimal supervision.
Hands-on experience and advanced knowledge of Cisco routing and switching technologies.
Practical experience or familiarity with Next-Generation Firewalls (NGFW).
Proficiency in configuring and establishing internet connectivity on firewalls.
Experience in configuring Unified Threat Management (UTM) profiles for internet firewall policies.
Knowledge in configuring VPNs between firewalls and routers for secure and seamless connectivity.
Certifications in CCNA R&S and CCNP are required to validate technical expertise.
A Bachelors degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related analytical, scientific, or technical discipline is preferred.

jobs.Job_Description:
Role Summary:
The SAFe agilist is responsible for Lean-Agile transformation. They implement the basics of the SAFe® framework at the primary stage of the product development journey. SAFe® Agilist applies Lean, Agile, and the Product Development flow principles to improve productivity, employee satisfaction, time to market, and quality. They make sure that the planning and execution through Agile Release Trains are appropriately done
Primary Skillset:
Scrum Agile Certified, Knowledge of SAFE
Agile project management experience. Jira Clarity
Secondary Skillset:
Retail Telecom Domain experience
Project Tracking and Reporting experience, Resources who are required to perform Project management roles come with considerably higher experience. Request you to consider L6 / L7 roles for all these positions.
Stakeholder Management:
Identify and prioritize stakeholders Understand stakeholder expectations Plan for who needs to know what and when Manage expectations through tailored communication and engagement strategies ensure there is minimal scope creep
Roles & Responsibilities
Serve as a Scrum Master for multiple teams across the program where required.
Experience in SAFe (Scaled Agile Framework) is required.
Assist in overall program/project planning and ensure cross-team dependencies are well-understood and modeled in project plans and timelines.
Identify, document, and publish risks and issues related to the overall program and to define resolution paths where required.
Resolve cross-team impediments and blocking issues.
Collect and consolidate cross-team status for delivery to stakeholders and executive management.
Schedule and conduct meetings and ceremonies in accordance with best practices for Agile/Scrum software development.
Responsible for building team collaboration, commitment towards achieving sprint objectives and viewing team needs above everything else.
Continuously work to improve team performance and productivity:
Encourage team accountability, self-organization, and empowerment.
Share common Agile practices.
Promote and support the development team’s automated processes.
Facilitate Retrospectives which generate new ideas for process improvement.
Maintain relevant metrics that guide the development team to more efficient processes in their work and in satisfying their Product Owner and stakeholders.
Maintain effective information radiators that aid transparency and encourage clear communication between the development team, the Product Owner, and stakeholders.
Active participant in the local scrum chapters to share and learn new agile concepts.
Knowledge of wireless telecom business practices, including accounting, finance, revenue assurance, taxation, billing, customer care, legal, device management and network operations.
Creates and identifies scope and stakeholders of a project right from its inception.
Creates and implements plans in accordance with SAFE/agile work methodology to help accomplish key tasks “On time and within Budget”
Identifies and communicates key slippages and acts with a sense of urgency to help eliminate any roadblocks to ensure successful completion of projects.
Performs Program Management/Scrum Master activities such as chartering, road mapping, user story grooming, iteration planning and retrospectives as well as implementation activities.
Develop tools and techniques for disturbing tasks according to the skills of every team member and also to evaluate the performance of all team members.
Carries excellent command over Verizon’s Network and Security system and the respective teams and assigns tasks accordingly to see completion of capabilities across the board.
Carries a clear understanding of software development and Enterprise Architecture lifecycle, and categorizes scrum tasks in accordance with requirements and governance models identified.
Evaluates, develops and implements systems solutions to effectively fulfill business requirements.
Invites leadership teams and leads discussion of key initiatives across Verizon Enterprise.
Communicates the status of projects to enterprise wide audience including key executive and stakeholders.
Creates and identifies a communication strategy depending on the nature of the project.
Identifies key tasks and publishes meeting minutes post calls along with clear communication strategy on a weekly and monthly basis for key initiatives.
Analyzing and proactively managing problems and making decisions that impact overall system(s) and program(s) while acting independently
Identifies and diffuses problems proactively with effective communication and team management / collaboration strategies.

Company Profile: TechBlocks is a Cloud & Digital Product Engineering Firm with offices in Toronto, New York, Houston, Ahmedabad India, and Pune India. Founded in 2007 in Toronto, our company has grown rapidly with 25 global clients, including those in Retail, Automotive, Financial, Logistics & Supply Chain, and more. We are known for leading and executing enterprise-wide digital transformation initiatives for Fortune 500 companies and global brands including Toyota, Bell Telecom, Bausch Health, Honda, Thomson Reuters Carswell, First American, Standard & Poor (S&P) and Colliers International. Our team of global experts approach our clients' unique needs from a different perspective we focus on the end-user first from business strategy, solution design, development, and DevOps. We are more than just a development firm we are the trusted business & strategic partner for Fortune 500 companies, start-ups, and SMEs globally. Our areas of expertise include Azure Cloud, Amazon AWS, e-Commerce, Modern Web (Angular, Node, React, .NET Core), Mobile & IoT, BI & Analytics, CRM (SalesForce & Dynamics CRM), and Robotic Process Automation. TechBlocks is a Microsoft Gold Partner with gold competencies in Cloud Productivity & Application Development, and other competencies in Application Integration and Collaboration & Content solutions.

Tech Blocks Website: https://tblocks.com/
Corporate Video: TechBlocks - YouTube
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/techblocks/about/

About Role
As a Scrum Master at TechBlocks, you will actively engage with our global delivery teams across Canada, US and India, leading cutting-edge digital projects encompassing Web, Mobile, and IoT technologies. This role suits you if you are passionate about innovation and thrive in a fast-paced, collaborative environment.
The Scrum Master position at TechBlocks works with stakeholders and team members across regions to facilitate the delivery of value using Agile practices. The Scrum Mater contributes significantly to their teams success by acting as a servant leader and coaching towards continuous improvement while executing on delivering business priorities.

Whats in it for you:
An opportunity to lead experienced development teams working on front-end and/or back-end functionality
An opportunity to build relationships and engage with stakeholders across the organization as you manage the delivery of critical features for the platform
An opportunity to lead global teams consisting of seasoned Software Developers and Quality Assurance Engineers
An opportunity to learn and grow your skillset as you drive Agile maturity and operational excellence within a dynamic global organization.

Responsibilities:
In this role, you will be working with a team or teams of enthusiastic members supporting our critical technology systems and guiding our business partners & end users with industry best practices, solution design, and creating long term value to our customers.
Educate Agile teams to maximize efficiencies and performance from agile best practices and values
Coach Agile scrum teams in self-organization and continuous improvement
Guide Agile teams to consistently delivery customer value
Work with stakeholders to understand the business requirements, customer workflow, and to help identify the skills and teams needed to deliver value
Manage risks, mitigate impediments, and negotiate dependencies within and across Scrum teams
Guide the team in release planning, defect management, root cause analysis and project timelines
Facilitate Scrum events such as Daily Stand-ups, Iteration Planning, Refinement sessions, Iteration Reviews, Retrospectives and Quarterly planning
Work with Product Owners to ensure features and user stories are clear, concise, prioritized, and understood by every member of the Agile team.
Establish and maintain open and clear lines of team communication to facilitate status transparency.

What Were Looking For:
Experience leading teams in delivery using Agile practices as a Scrum Master
Experience in business analysis including requirement gathering, defect troubleshooting, release planning and coordination
Excellent English communication and collaboration skills
Knowledge of the software development life cycle (SDLC)
Proven ability to identify and mitigate risks proactively
Team-first, empathetic, servant leader with a growth mindset.

Thank you,

jobs.Job_Description:
Proso is hiring for its US client; this will be a remote full-time opportunity.

POSITION NAME: Full Stack Developer

NO. OF OPENINGS: 02

ABOUT THE CLIENT:

Our client is a bootstrapped SaaS company that integrates with over 60+ marketing data sources, helping digital marketing agencies and in-house brands build reports and dashboards for their clients. They are verified partners of Google, Meta, Pinterest, Shopify, Semrush, and more, and are expanding their arsenal of marketing data sources for integration.
With their new and improved reporting capabilities, they offer robust data blending and a wide range of visualizations and customization on their reporting platform. They work closely with marketing agencies to help build in-house solutions, ranging from tracking dashboards and custom integrations to CRM and notifications through workflow software. They are profitable and growing, with over 1000+ digital marketing agencies using their platform.

DEPARTMENT BRIEF:

The engineering team works primarily with Ruby on Rails and React-Redux to develop software that caters to a wide range of customers. They also use several modules in Python and Java for other services as needed. The work pace involves completing the SDLC (design, development, and delivery) in less than two weeks. They have a robust deployment pipeline and release to production daily.
Developers are empowered to work closely with product and customer-facing teams to release features that best suit customer needs. The focus is on building and owning features end-to-end, which involves design, development, and constant enhancements of released features. Code reviews, unit tests, and performance monitoring are pivotal during development to ensure high-quality deliverables.
Aspiring candidates will get a chance to work on challenging problems, top-notch UX, and a wide range of third-party APIs for integration. With a good customer base willing to try out new features, it is essential that code is well written, follows the best practices in web development, and is deployed for scale. Developers will also work closely with customers for adoption and provide support as needed.

JOB RESPONSIBILITIES:

Build new features into the application and own their further development.
Maintain, enhance, and monitor the software, and be responsible for version upgrades.
Work closely with the product team to evaluate, build, and deploy features/enhancements as requested.
Build tools to streamline development processes.
Follow best practices in web development, including avoiding N+1 queries, efficient database design, unit tests, and performance tests.

JOB REQUIREMENTS:

B.E/B.Tech full-time fresh graduates from premier institutes or candidates with 2-3 years of web development experience.
Excellent knowledge of Ruby, Python, or any other programming language suitable for web development.
Working knowledge of HTML, JavaScript, and React.

Ability to communicate clearly and effectively with stakeholders (both internal and external).

jobs.Job_Description:
Qualification

BE/BTech Fire Tech and Safety
Advance Diploma in Fire and Safety

Role & responsibilities
We seek a highly proactive and dedicated safety officer to join our team at Polar Air Projects Private Limited.
As a safety officer, you will establish and maintain a culture of safety excellence and safeguard compliance with all relevant regulations and standards. This comprises implementing effective safety programs and protocols and ensuring the availability and usability of safety equipment. You will promptly respond to employee safety concerns, provide guidance and support in resolving issues and improve overall safety performance.
If you possess a thorough understanding of safety practices and safety management skills, we look forward to your application. We provide attractive remuneration packages alongside a supportive work environment and abundant opportunities for professional growth.
Objectives of this role
Developing and implementing safety policies, procedures, and guidelines in line with local laws and regulations.
Ensuring the highest safety compliance standards and a healthy work setting for staff, visitors and vendors.
Monitoring and staying updated on safety regulations, codes and standards applicable to the industry.
Supporting emergency preparedness and response efforts, including developing evacuation plans and procedures.
Investigating accidents, incidents and near-miss events to determine root causes and implementing corrective measures to prevent a recurrence.
Collaborating with cross-functional teams to promote safety initiatives and ensure the integration of safety practices into daily operations.
Establishing and maintaining effective communication channels with external organisations, such as government bodies, safety organisations and insurance companies.
Your tasks
Develop, implement and maintain strategies, plans and procedures to protect employees, property and facilities from workplace health and safety hazards.
Assess workplace hazards and risks and recommend appropriate measures to mitigate them.
Conduct regular inspections and audits to identify potential safety issues and ensure compliance with established safety protocols.
Investigate incidents and accidents, determine root causes and implement corrective actions to prevent recurrence.
Provide regular safety training sessions and organise impactful safety campaigns to promote awareness.
Maintain accurate records and documentation for safety inspections, incidents and training.
Monitor and evaluate the effectiveness of safety strategies, plans and procedures, and adjust as needed.
Provide guidance and support to management and employees on safety-related matters.
Stay updated about emerging safety trends, regulations and best practices to ensure continuous improvement.
Required skills and qualifications
Bachelors degree in safety, occupational health and safety, industrial hygiene or a related field.
3+ years of experience in a safety-related role, preferably in an Indian context.
Relevant certifications such as Certified Safety Professional (CSP), Certified Hazardous Materials Manager (CHMM) certification or Certified Fire Protection Specialist (CFPS).
Proficiency in safety auditing, inspection and identifying hazards.
Well-versed in creating emergency response plans tailored to various scenarios.
Familiar with compliance with OSHA standards and other relevant safety regulations.
In-depth knowledge of safety regulations, standards and best practices.
Expertise in using and maintaining safety equipment like fire extinguishers, eye protection and hazardous material protection.
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills to identify and mitigate potential risks.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills to effectively interact with employees at all levels.
Attention to detail and the ability to enforce safety procedures and protocols.
Knowledge of Indian safety laws and regulations applicable to the industry.
Preferred skills and qualifications
Professional certifications, like NEBOSH (National Examination Board in Occupational Safety and Health), IOSH (Institution of Occupational Safety and Health), or equivalent.
Knowledge of emergency response and crisis management.
Experience in managing safety in diverse work environments.
A valid driving licence and knowledge of first-aid techniques.

jobs.Job_Description:
Senior Backend Engineer - Java

Experience: 7+ years
Salary : Competitive
Preferred Notice Period: Within 30 Days
Shift: 9:00AM to 6:00PM IST
Opportunity Type: Remote
Placement Type: Contractual
Contract Duration: Full-Time, Indefinite Period

(*Note: This is a requirement for one of Uplers' Partners)

What do you need for this opportunity
Must have skills required :
B2B, Data-led, Market Research, Modularity, Product Design, User journey mapping, UX/UI
Good to have skills :
B2C, Business Context, D2c, E-Commerce, Layout Recommendations, Self-serve

Our Hiring Partner is Looking for:
Senior Backend Engineer who is passionate about their work, eager to learn and grow, and who is committed to delivering exceptional results. If you are a team player, with a positive attitude and a desire to make a difference, then we want to hear from you.

Role Overview Description
Are you a passionate engineer eager to shape the future of healthcare technology? Join our innovation-driven team as we build a cloud-based Patient Management System to revolutionize how healthcare providers manage and deliver care. You are a great fit if you:
Are self-motivated and excel at working independently to build robust, scalable systems
from scratch, even in the face of ambiguity.

Have a talent for diving deep into vague requirements, identifying core business needs, and translating them into technical solutions.
Proactively suggest and implement improvements to systems, processes, and business logic. Take ownership of the solutions you build, aligning your work with broader product and business goals. Are results-driven, with a strategic mindset to deliver value while maintaining high standards of quality and scalability. Enjoy working collaboratively in an innovation-driven team to create cutting-edge SaaS applications that solve real-world problems This is a fully remote position, and we welcome candidates who can work comfortably within the time zones spanning Ireland to India.

Why Youll Love This Role
Impact: Play a critical role in developing a state-of-the-art Patient Management System that improves the efficiency and quality of healthcare delivery.
Innovation: Work on a cloud-based, scalable backend using cutting-edge technologies, enabling seamless real-time communication and data management.
Ownership: Drive projects from ideation to execution, collaborating with a passionate team to solve real-world challenges in healthcare.

Key Responsibilities
Architect and develop scalable SaaS applications using Spring Boot and RESTful APIs.
Design robust database schemas with PostgreSQL, optimizing queries and ensuring data integrity.
Enhance performance using Redis for caching and session management.
Create modular, reusable, and maintainable code using advanced object-oriented design principles.
Write comprehensive tests (TDD) and maintain CI/CD pipelines for automated deployment.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate backend logic with front-end systems.
Requirements
Extensive experience as a Backend Developer (typically 7+ years), with a focus on SaaS application development.
Proven expertise in Spring Boot, Java, RESTful APIs, and database design.
Deep knowledge of software architecture patterns and design principles.
Hands-on experience with Redis, Docker, and CI/CD pipelines.
Strong understanding of backend security, performance optimization, and full-stack architecture.
Passion for clean, maintainable, and scalable code.
Experience working in agile environments, including sprint planning and retrospectives.
A proactive, self-driven attitude, thriving in startup environments.
Strong communication skills and a collaborative mindset.

Bonus Qualifications
Proficiency in other programming languages, such as Go, Python, or Node.js.
Experience in Domain-Driven Design (DDD)
Experience in CI/CD pipelines and deployment strategies.
Hands-on experience with FHIR, HL7 interoperability standards, and openEHR frameworks.
Exposure to front-end technologies or frameworks to enhance integration understanding.

What We Offer
A competitive salary tailored to the individual, with options for cash-based bonuses/equity incentives.
Fully remote work, with flexibility to accommodate Irish to Indian time zones.
A culture of continuous learning, innovation, and opportunities for professional growth.
The chance to make a meaningful impact as part of a passionate, collaborative, and driven team.

Interview Process
Our hiring process is designed to identify the best fit for both you and our team. Heres what to expect:
Resume Screening
After submitting your application, our team will review your resume to ensure alignment with the role's requirements.
Recorded Video Submission [Duration: 1015 minutes.]
If your resume is shortlisted, you will receive a link to submit a video answering the following questions:To make this step as seamless and stress-free as possible:
Youll have the flexibility to record the video at a time that works for you.
The process is straightforward and designed to be quick (no more than 1015 minutes).
Along with the video submission instructions, well provide an overview of what youll be working on during Year 1 and Year 2 in this role. This will not only help you understand the role better but also make it easier to craft thoughtful and relevant responses.
We value your time and effort and want you to feel comfortable sharing your story in your own way!
Discussion with the CEO and CTO [Duration: 4560 minutes.]
Selected candidates will have a meeting with our CEO and CTO to discuss the role in detail, dive deeper into your background, experience, and follow up on your video submission.
Technical Round[Duration: 90120 minutes.]
You will then meet with our engineers for a technical assessment, designed to evaluate your expertise and problem-solving abilities.
Team Meeting & Culture Fit[Duration: 4560 minutes.]
In the final stage, youll have an opportunity to meet the team, discuss insights from previous rounds, and ensure a mutual cultural fit.

How to apply for this opportunity
Register or login on our portal
Click 'Apply,' upload your resume and fill in the required details.
Click Continue to Video Resume' & Record 2-3 mins video showcasing your skills
Get matched and crack a quick interview with our hiring partner.
Land your global dream job and get your exciting career started!

About Our Hiring Partner:
A visionary disruptor in healthcare IT

About Uplers:
Our goal is to make hiring reliable, simple, and fast. Our role will be to help all our talents find and apply for relevant opportunities and progress in their career. We will support any grievances or challenges you may face during the engagement. You will also be assigned to a dedicated Talent Success Coach during the engagement.

(Note: There are many more opportunities apart from this on the portal. Depending on the assessments you clear, you can apply for them as well).

So, if you are ready for a new challenge, a great work environment, and an opportunity to take your career to the next level, don't hesitate to apply today. We are waiting for you!

Primary Responsibilities
The Senior Database Engineer has the primary focus on:
Monitoring Database health / performance (RAC, Non-RAC and Data Guard Instance).
Review Quarterly Database Patching requirement/steps and execute the patch process.
Review Quarterly OEM Patching requirement/steps and execute the patch process.
Monitor and take appropriate action proactively on night jobs, i.e., RMAN backups and Data Purging, etc.
The overall technical support of the Oracle database, shutdown/startup database, issue troubleshooting, incident, alert and responding to requests from DevOps and other IT teams.
Performs Database/Query monitoring, ongoing performance tuning and optimization activities

Position Requirements
Must have 7+ years of experience focused on Oracle DBA Administration in medium to large corporate environments, 3+ years of Oracle 19c administration (multitenant PDB/CDB, Oracle ASM, Oracle Cluster ware, Data Guard, Oracle Single Instance and Patching process).
Installation and configuration for OEM13c for database monitoring and management.
At least 5 years experience performance tuning both instance and SQL statement level tuning, good understanding of SQL Profile and query optimization. Ability to identify the culprit with tool (i.e., OEM) and without tool (query from Oracle dictionary).
At least 5 years experience with backup and recovery procedures using RMAN.
System knowledge and experience with Unix/Linux Operating Systems.
Working knowledge of scripting programing (Shell, Python), GitHub, and Automation tools (AWX or Ansible) is a plus but not required.

Knowledge, Skills & Abilities
Must be a creative problem-solver, flexible, and proactive.
Very good people skills, plus written and oral communication skills.
Take responsibility, plan and structure all tasks (technical or non-technical) assigned as part of job role to ensure a business efficient service is delivered to customers.

Key Performance Indicators
Ability to manage multiple assignments (i.e., database/cluster patching, OEM management and troubleshooting) comfortably.
Attentive to operational process (i.e. incident management, pickup/resolve/close timely, using SN monitoring tool to proactively monitor database platform, Change Management, etc.).
Attentive to Agile process (i.e. story management, pick up/development/implementation and close timely).

jobs.Job_Description:
Job_Title: Digital Marketing Project Manager
Location: Remote

About CuringBusy:
CuringBusy is a Fully Remote company, providing subscription-based, remote Executive Assistant services to busy Entrepreneurs, Business owners, and Professionals across the globe. We help entrepreneurs free up their time by outsourcing their everyday, routine admin work like calendar management, email, customer service, and marketing tasks like social media, digital marketing, website management, etc.

Job Role :
The Digital Marketing Specialist is responsible for developing, implementing, and managing
website and marketing strategies that promote products and services across multiple digital
channels. This includes creating campaigns and driving digital marketing initiatives on search
engine marketing, email marketing, display advertising, website creation & optimization, paid
social media, email, and mobile marketing. This role will develop the digital marketing plan and
coordinate with the sales, product, content, and other teams to ensure the successful execution
of the campaigns.

Responsibilities:
Develop effective digital marketing plans to drive our products/services awareness that align with the company's business needs.
Website development on WordPress.
Manage the Search Engine Marketing (SEM), Display Advertising, Website Optimization & Conversion Rate Optimization efforts.
Lead paid social media strategies & campaigns (LinkedIn, Facebook & Instagram) and identify opportunities to leverage emerging platforms.
Manage email campaigns including segmentation strategies & automation pieces.
Provide reporting on the various online performance KPIs such as CTRs, CPMs & CPCs.
Design, build, and maintain our social media presence.
Design, and manage Social media and digital marketing Advertising campaigns and implement social media strategy to align with business goals.
Measures and reports the performance of all digital marketing campaigns and assesses against goals (ROI and KPIs).
Utilizes strong analytical ability to evaluate end-to-end customer experience across multiple channels and customer touchpoints.

Job Qualifications and Skill Sets:
Bachelors or master’s degree in Digital Marketing.
Demonstrable 3+ years of experience leading and managing SEO/SEM, marketing database, email, social media, and display advertising campaigns.
Highly creative with experience in identifying target audiences and devising digital campaigns that engage, inform, and motivate
Experience in optimizing landing pages and user funnels.
Proficiency in graphic design software including Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, and other visual design tools.
Knowledge of both front-end and back-end languages.
Familiarity with databases (e.g. MySQL, MongoDB), web servers (e.g. Apache), and UI/UX design
Solid knowledge of website and marketing analytics tools (e.g., Google Analytics, NetInsight, Omniture, WebTrends, SEMRush, etc.)
Experienced in any of the Website Platforms: WordPress, Wix, Shopify, WooCommerce, PrestaShop, and Squarespace.
Experience with advertisement tools (e.g., Google Ads, Facebook Ads, Bing Ads, Instagram Ads, YouTube ads, etc.)
Knowledge of Software like Mailerlite, Mailchimp, Sendinblue, Sender, Hubspot email marketing, Omnisend, Sendpulse, Mailjet, Moosend, etc.
Proficient in marketing research and statistical analysis.

Your Benefits
Work from Home Job/Completely Remote.
Opportunity to grow with a Fast-Growing Startup.
Exposure to International Clients.

Work Timings: Evening Shift or Night Shift 3 pm-12 am/6 pm-3 am ( Monday- Friday)

Salary: Based on company standards and skill sets.

jobs.Job_Description:
We are hiring UX Tester to assess and enhance a cutting-edge event ticketing platform featuring interactive mapping, 3D seat visualization, and immersive venue experiences. This platform is designed for seamless browsing, seat selection, and ticket purchasing across a variety of devices. The ideal candidate will have hands-on experience with interactive maps, 3D visualization technologies, and cross-platform testing to ensure a premium user experience.
Key Responsibilities
Cross-Device & Browser Testing: Validate compatibility on Windows, macOS, Android, iOS, and browsers like Chrome, Safari, Firefox, and Edge.
Interactive Features Testing: Evaluate usability, accuracy, and responsiveness of interactive maps, including zoom, pan, seat selection, and 3D seat viewer performance.
Core Functionality Testing: Ensure flawless event search, ticket booking, payment systems, and third-party integrations.
Usability Testing: Analyze workflows for intuitiveness and accessibility, documenting improvement areas.
Performance Testing: Assess loading times, network responsiveness, and stability under stress.
Bug Reporting & Collaboration: Identify and report bugs with detailed documentation and collaborate with development teams for resolution.
Required Skills & Experience
Interactive Map Testing: Proven experience testing or working with applications involving interactive maps or geospatial data.
3D Viewer Expertise: Hands-on experience with 3D rendering or visualization technologies (e.g., WebGL, Three.js, Babylon.js).
Cross-Platform Testing: Knowledge of testing applications across multiple devices, operating systems, and browsers.
Usability Testing: Strong analytical skills to evaluate and improve user experience.
Bug Reporting: Proficiency in documenting and communicating bugs using tools like Jira, Trello, or similar platforms.
Performance Testing: Familiarity with tools and techniques for measuring application performance.
Written Communication: Excellent ability to articulate findings and recommendations in clear, concise reports.
Preferred Qualifications
Familiarity with ticketing platforms or e-commerce applications.
Experience with 360-degree or panoramic view technologies.
Knowledge of accessibility standards and best practices for interactive applications.
Familiarity with Agile or Scrum development environments.
Work Requirements

Screen Size: 14 Inches
Screen Resolution: FHD (19201080)
Processor: i5 or higher
RAM: Minimum 8GB (Must)
Type: Windows Laptop
Software: AnyDesk
Internet Speed: 100 Mbps or higher
