jobs.Job_Description:
Picture Yourself At Pega

As a key contributor to the Pega Sales Consulting team, you will work closely with the Pega Sales team Account Execs, Customer Success Managers, Professional Services, Business Officers, and other groups to ensure the successful execution of our sales strategy.
You will build and leverage relationships as you spend time improving Client health and bringing in new sales opportunities as part of the account sales strategy.
Our Solutions Consultants are technically curious strategic thinkers with a customer centric mindset and most importantly - strong team players!

What You'll Do At Pega
Manage multiple clients simultaneously as part of an account portfolio assigned by the Solutions Consultant Director.
Build and leverage relationships to expand engagement with stakeholders across the offshore development organization in coordination with the Account team.
Provide development guidance and best practices to client and partner development resources.
Support customer co-production by acting as a mentor to newly enabled client system, business, and marketing architects.
Provide information and support on specific topics as they arise within projects.
Where appropriate and required for client success, providing direct oversight to the project team during the full lifecycle of the engagement, acting as the escalation point for both the customer and delivery teams.
Proactively collaborate with the client developer community on product roadmaps and gather detailed use cases that can be shared with the Account team and product teams.
Document and maintain inventory of all internal Pega applications, with descriptions, versions, owners, business outcomes, go-live and major release dates, footprint, and satisfaction measures.
Teach the client to be self-sufficient to influence technology adoption by creating enablement plans and encouraging co-production.
Guide client delivery teams in designing solutions for ease of adoption, not just functionality.
Manage knowledge by contributing best practices, artifacts, and client case studies to client knowledge repositories, as well as, an internal Client Success knowledge library.
Conduct technical adoption and awareness programs, including Lunch & Learns, PDN and Pega Academy promotions, and features on upgrades.
Who You Are
Independently, work closely with the Sales Team to create and deliver world class PRPC technical demonstrations.
Build demos, create POCs and achieve required certification levels for the Sales Consultant role.
Deliver POCs and demonstrations to meet the scope and functionality to ensure that all success criteria are delivered, and product differentiators are included.
Build the knowledge base required to maximize value of the product, including demonstrating new or upgraded functionality and using case studies to convey best practices.
Leverage industry and product knowledge to share insights about how client can maximize license to drive business benefits.
Partner with client user community to showcase existing Pega solutions to increase radiation.
Engage Pega business consultants to share operational and industry insights with clients.
Promote industry-specific application solutions.
Promote Pega Deloper even.
What You've Accomplished
BA / BS Degree, preferably in a technical field of study
8+ years relevant work experience, 5+ years in consulting or product development.
Pega Certified Senior Systems Architect (CSSA) and Pega Certified Decisioning Consultant (PCDC).
Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to effectively navigate and mediate conflict and foster honest dialog
Strong consulting skills and proven results working as a trusted advisor to drive business value for clients or stakeholders
Ability to prioritize, multi-task, and perform effectively under pressure
Strong knowledge of business processes (Sales, Marketing, Service, Support), business applications and automation
Experience in Financial Services / Telecom / Healthcare preferred.
Required to complete Solutions Consultant enablement track
Experience implementing Customer Relationship Management solutions (CRM) or other complex IT projects within large enterprises
Skilled at Program Management within large organizations, helping to effectively drive change across groups by engaging key stakeholders
Proven effectiveness at leading and facilitating technical meetings and workshops
Familiarity with Cloud Computing technologies, concepts and benefits
Working knowledge of the software development process and of software design.
Pega Offers You
Gartner Analyst acclaimed technology leadership across our categories of products.
Continuous learning and development opportunities
An innovative, inclusive, agile, flexible, and fun work environment
Competitive global benefits program inclusive of pay + bonus incentive, employee equity in the company.

jobs.Job_Description:
Paid Search Manager

Experience: 7+ years
Salary : Upto INR 17,00,000 / year
Preferred Notice Period: Within 30 Days
Shift: 6:30AM to 3:30PM IST
Opportunity Type: Remote
Placement Type: Permanent

(*Note: This is a requirement for one of Uplers' Partners)

What do you need for this opportunity
Must have skills required :
Campaign Optimization, High Media Spend, Paid Search, SEM, Stakeholder Management, Google Search Ads
Good to have skills :
B2B, Edtech, Performance Max

Our Hiring Partner is Looking for:
Paid Search Manager who is passionate about their work, eager to learn and grow, and who is committed to delivering exceptional results. If you are a team player, with a positive attitude and a desire to make a difference, then we want to hear from you.

Role Overview Description
We are seeking a seasoned Paid Search Manager to take ownership of our global paid search strategy. This role is ideal for an SEM expert who is ready to transition from day-to-day campaign management to a more strategic, consultative, and innovative position. You will be instrumental in standardizing processes, optimizing campaigns, driving innovation, and empowering a global team to deliver exceptional results.
This role focuses on leading and influencing global paid search initiatives without direct budget management or hands-on execution.

Key Responsibilities:
1) Strategic Leadership:
Standardize and streamline paid search processes across global markets.
Develop and implement best practices for keyword strategies, campaign optimization, and scaling digital products.
Lead innovation by researching and testing new products (Google, Apple Search, Microsoft, etc.).

2) Auditing & Optimization:
Conduct audits and identify areas for improvement in ongoing campaigns.
Develop guidelines, forecasts, and problem-solving frameworks to enhance performance.
Monitor and track campaign effectiveness to ensure high ROAS and continuous growth.

3) Collaboration & Influence:
Work closely with 20+ digital marketers across 21 markets managing $200k in monthly ad spend.
Train, educate, and influence team members to adopt paid search best practices.
Act as a consultant to stakeholders and global teams, providing actionable insights and recommendations.

4) Global Market Expertise:
Understand market nuances with a focus on key markets like the USA and Singapore.
Design strategies tailored to diverse regions and audiences.

5) Innovation & Testing:
Drive the adoption of new paid search products and tools to stay ahead of industry trends.
Lead the creation of a Center of Excellence (COE) for Paid Search.

6) Stakeholder Communication:
Collaborate with internal and external stakeholders to align goals and drive performance.

Key Qualifications:
Experience:
Minimum 7 years in SEM with a strong background in paid search.
Proven track record of managing and influencing global campaigns.
Exposure to high-ticket sales and B2B environments is a plus.
Experience with Performance Max is preferred.
Agency experience is welcome (not handling major accounts like Coca-Cola).

Skills:
In-depth knowledge of Google Ads and other search platforms.
Strong analytical and forecasting capabilities.
Excellent communication, training, and stakeholder management skills.

Additional Preferences:
Experience working with international teams.
Familiarity with education or similar industries is a plus but not essential.
Performance Metrics:
Your success will be indirectly measured by the performance of the Digital Marketing Strategists under your guidance and the growth of paid search initiatives globally.

How to apply for this opportunity
Register or login on our portal
Click 'Apply,' upload your resume and fill in the required details.
Post this click Apply Now' to submit your application.
Get matched and crack a quick interview with our hiring partner.
Land your global dream job and get your exciting career started!

About Our Hiring Partner:
New Zealand-based Edutech company was founded in 2013 with the idea that through personalized education, we can transform students into the world leaders of tomorrow. Since then, we have rapidly grown a mission-driven team that is dedicated to building the education system for the 22nd century. Our network includes 2,400 tutors and consultants worldwide who work with over 20,000 students. Our tech platform connects tutors and mentors to high school students aiming to achieve admission and scholarships to top universities in the US, Canada, UK, and beyond.

About Uplers:
Our goal is to make hiring reliable, simple, and fast. Our role will be to help all our talents find and apply for relevant opportunities and progress in their career. We will support any grievances or challenges you may face during the engagement. You will also be assigned to a dedicated Talent Success Coach during the engagement.

(Note: There are many more opportunities apart from this on the portal. Depending on the assessments you clear, you can apply for them as well).

So, if you are ready for a new challenge, a great work environment, and an opportunity to take your career to the next level, don't hesitate to apply today. We are waiting for you!

Monitor and analyze logs and alerts from a variety of different technologies across multiple platforms in order to identify and mitigate security incidents affecting the enterprise. This includes analysis of logs from:

Firewall.

jobs.Skills_Required: Javascript, React.Js, Node.Js
jobs.Job_Description:
Subject Matter Expert Web Development

Job Description
Position Overview:
The Subject Matter Expert (SME) plays a crucial role within our team, responsible for delivering high-quality educational content and support to students. The SME will utilize their in-depth subject knowledge and experience to perform core activities such as grading, live chat support, on-demand video support and quality assurance, ensuring that all content meets established standards. Additionally, the SME will provide on-demand video support, engage in community support initiatives, and conduct Q&A sessions to foster student understanding and engagement. This role demands proactive learning, the ability to handle complex tasks, and the capacity to offer constructive feedback and process improvements. The SME will also collaborate with mentors to identify and address weak areas within the team, contributing to the overall success and effectiveness of our educational programs.

Eligibility:
Work experience of 3 years in the relevant industry is recommended, with a portfolio to prove skill sets. Experience in EdTech will be an added advantage.
Strong communication skills are essential for delivering live lessons to students in the US.
Proficiency in facilitating sessions via Zoom or other online platforms is required.
Diversified and in-depth subject knowledge with the required degree. 
Good grasp of subject-specific software/tools.

Primary Responsibilities:
Perform all core activities (Grading, Livechat, QA, Live Lessons & Video Weekly Tutoring) within the given guidelines and achieve a QA score of 80% and above.
Deliver quality (QA score will validate) content regarding Grading and Livechat.
Review the expert’s (Mentor Sessions) content as per the latest guidelines and processes.
Proactively learn new activities/software/core subjects and be a part of projects as and when required.
Work on difficult tasks across all activities and deliver content without compromising quality.
Provide suggestions/changes to activity guidelines or process documents.
Review the content from external sources of all difficulty levels and send detailed feedback.
Identify weak areas (Subject/Process) of the MNEs in the team and update them to the Lead. 
Handle queries from outside experts (MNEs).
Provide on-demand video support for students.
Participate in community support initiatives to assist students and resolve their queries.
Conduct Q&A sessions as needed to enhance student understanding and engagement.
Train MNEs and monitor their progress throughout their first 90 days (about 3 months) of onboarding. 
Support and guide MNEs in their day-to-day processes.
Curate new tools and technology for respective subjects.
Suggest additions/corrections to the current curriculum.
Suggest new courses to be added as per market demand.
Gauge incoming volume for chat and grading and suggest redistributing working shifts as needed. 
Prepare initial reports for SME grading contribution and Livechat effectiveness.
Secondary Responsibilities:
Analyze graded checkpoints and chats/video support and rate them as per defined standards.
Present findings and recommendations in a plan that drives future process improvements.
Education -
M.Tech/ MSc/ B.Tech/BSc or any equivalent degree. (15 years full-time education)

jobs.Skills_Required: Angularjs, UI Development, Javascript, HTML, CSS
jobs.Job_Description:
As a Front End Developer, you will be responsible for implementing visual elements that are visible from the computer users vantage point within a web application. You will combine the art of design with the science of programming. You will be responsible for the translation of UI/UX design wireframes to actual code. There are times you will be expected to work independently to meet tight deadlines following design guidelines.
An ideal candidate will have a bachelor's degree in web design or a related field with a minimum of 3 years of experience in a similar role. You will have a good understanding of SEO and be expert level with MAC and OS with proficiency in code visioning tools and familiarity with Gimp and Photoshop. Additional proficiency with programming languages and ability to work independently are key for this role.

We have a custom e-commerce website with responsive design, accompanied by Figma files. The website features faceted navigation, a homepage, category and sub-category pages, as well as product and manufacturer pages, amounting to approximately 15 unique pages. The Figma files include embedded styles and design breakpoints for various screen sizes, such as desktop, mobile, and tablet views, ensuring a seamless user experience across all devices.

Roles and Responsibilities
HTML/CSS/JavaScript Requirements
We require the following for the conversion of the Figma design to HTML:

The project should be built on Bootstrap 5.2 (including styling, HTML layout, and Bootstrap JS components).
HTML should be structured in a way that allows easy integration with code. For example, when displaying information in a table-like product/supplier listing, the HTML structure should have repeated rows (with columns inside) and NOT repeated columns (since the code would iterate over products/suppliers to display each row).
CSS styles should come from Bootstrap 5.2, and any customizations should follow Bootstrap guidelines.
The project should include pluggable and reusable JavaScript components (preferably from Bootstrap JavaScript components or Bootstrap-compatible) for building blocks used across different pages, such as menus, search boxes, popups, overlays, tables, search filters, etc.
Since this is a server-side rendered application, client-side frameworks like Angular JS / Angular 2+, React, and Vue.js are not suitable for JS components. jQuery and other libraries are acceptable.

Desired Candidate Profile
3+ years of experience in a similar role
Good understanding of SEO
Expert level with MAC and OS
Proficient in code visioning tools
Familiarity with Gimp or Photoshop
Knowledge of image authoring tools
Proficient understanding of web markup
Possess proficiency in Javascript and JQuery
Ability to work independently with minimal supervision while achieving benchmarks
Proficient in Figma conversions on various levels.

Perks and Benefits
Ability to work from home

jobs.Job_Description:
Job_Title: Quality Analyst for Application Development [ GTS JC: GTS2505212]
Contract: 6 month (renewable)
Work Mode: Remote
Experience: 3+ years
CND-based location: Mumbai, Delhi, Chennai, Bangalore, or Pune (any one of the mentioned locations)
Job description:
As a Quality Analyst for Application Development, you will play a critical role in ensuring the successful delivery of high-quality applications by collaborating closely with business stakeholders, project managers, and the development team. You will be responsible for analyzing business requirements, creating detailed test cases, performing functional and non-functional testing, and driving continuous quality improvements throughout the development lifecycle.
Responsibilities:
Requirements Analysis:
Collaborate with business stakeholders and Business Analysts to review and analyze detailed requirements for application development projects
Test Strategy and Planning:
Develop comprehensive test strategies, including defining test objectives, test plans, and acceptance criteria
Test Case Design and Execution:
Create and execute detailed test cases and test scenarios covering functional, integration, regression, performance, and user acceptance testing (UAT)
Defect Management:
Identify, report, and track defects using defect management tools, ensuring timely resolution by the development team
Collaboration and Communication:
Act as a liaison between the QA team, developers, and project managers to ensure clarity in requirements, testing processes, and timelines
Automation Testing (Optional):
If applicable, design and implement automated test scripts using relevant tools to improve testing efficiency and coverage
Change Management: Assist in developing change management strategies to facilitate the smooth adoption of new applications and systems
Continuous Improvement: Contribute to process improvements, QA best practices, and adoption of new tools and technologies to enhance the overall quality of application development
Support Change Management:
Work closely with the Change Management team to ensure smooth transition and adoption of new applications and updates
Skills
Experience:
Minimum 3+ years of experience in quality analysis or quality assurance for application development or software projects
Technical Proficiency
Strong understanding of SDLC (Software Development Life Cycle) and STLC (Software Testing Life Cycle)
Experience with testing tools such as JIRA, Selenium, Postman, or similar
Familiarity with databases and SQL for data validation and testing
Knowledge of software development methodologies like Agile, Scrum, and Waterfall
Strong analytical skills with attention to detail to identify edge cases and complex scenarios
Ability to think critically and provide actionable feedback to improve application quality
Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal, to interact with technical and non-technical stakeholders
Proven ability to work collaboratively in cross-functional teams
Familiarity with QA processes, tools, and best practices in ensuring application quality
Education and Certification
Bachelors or Master degree in IT discipline
Certification in business analysis (e.g., CBAP, CCBA) is a plus.
What we need to see from you
Report to the Application Development Practice Lead and contribute actively to the QA process within agile development teams
Assist in gathering and documenting user requirements, developing test cases, and providing accurate effort estimates
Maintain a proactive approach in identifying and mitigating risks related to application quality
Support both functional and non-functional testing to ensure robust and scalable applications
Stay updated on industry trends, QA methodologies, and emerging tools to drive innovation in testing practices

About the Role :
The potential candidate will be responsible to manage and implement of projects and business analysis for Digital Channels.
The individuals will be managing all new product initiatives and support business requirements on enhancing the existing products listed. They also ensure end to end project management from analysis of business requirement, documentation of requirement, solution evaluation keeping in view effort estimation versus business justification, quality analysis of the solution through testing, process documentation and risk analysis and implementation / rollout planning and execution including end user training / communication.
Job Responsibilities :
Project Management :
- Take assigned project from original concept through final implementation.
- Define project scope and objectives and publishes project status.
- Work on multiple projects simultaneously in matrix organization.
- Create and maintains project schedules by developing project plans and specifications, estimating time requirements, establishing deadlines, monitoring milestone completion, track all phases of the project product/service lifecycle, provide timely reporting of issues that impact project progress, coordinating actions, and resolving conflicts. This includes documenting, prioritizing and tracking requests (changes, enhancements, etc.) and coordinating with the Change Control Board (CCB).
- Conduct project meetings with teams and stakeholder and management to review project deliverables and deadlines.
- Provide single point of contact for assigned projects and coordinates interaction and communication during cross functional programs
- Assist in identification and assignment of internal resources and external contractors to meet varied project requirements.
- Manage the process documentation and drives process adherence.
Business Analysis and Reporting :
- Work with appropriate personnel to allocate personnel time to project tasks and to track progress of their work.
- Assess and prepare to address the operational impacts, workflow, training, etc. issues of a project.
- Review, analyze, and create detailed documentation of business systems and user needs, including workflow, program functions, and steps required to develop or modify computer programs.
- Coordinate the development of all approved versions of business and functional specifications for specified applications.
- Prepare documents for Operation Risk Committee and Steering Committees for decision on process finalization, cost approvals and product launches.
- Review use cases and other technical documents with IT project staff to ensure business requirements are adequately reflected in technical planning documents.
- Prepare routine reports (financial, quality, production, customer service, operational efficiency, market share, etc.) relating to the specific projects ongoing.
- Manage training for the new product or process implementation and identifies any training needs with respect to process change or product launch.
- Actively participate in development of training material and process maps for all the change requests managed.
Quality Assurance and Testing :
- Manage the test leads for all small and big projects and manages outsourced testing team UATs on enhancement and production fixes.
- Should provide support on test scripting, resource allocation and tracking for all UATs to closure.
- Define, develop and implement quality assurance practices and procedures, end user test plans and other QA assessments.
- Ensures that all tests are conducted and documented according the standards agreed upon by the business unit and IT
- Responsible for the overall success of testing, including tracking of bug reports and change requests and ensuring their timely resolution and results verification and release sign-off.
- Coordinate groups of service providers or support teams who assist in bug fixes and explains the defects to relevant stakeholders who either contribute in fixing them or are to decide the change in solution to fix such defects.
Education, Work Experience, Key Skill Set Requirements:
- MBA from a reputed Tier 1/Tier 2 B-School. IIMs/ISB/MDI/FMS/XLRI preferred with experience in solution teams and B. Tech/MCA from Tier 1/Tier 2 engineering college.
- Strong program management experience.
- Banking / financial services industry preferred, candidates from other industries with relevant experience can also be considered
- Experience in automated journeys on these platforms for new customer acquisition.
- Have strong knowledge on API Management and SDK/API based integrations.
- Good exposure to cloud services (Azure/AWS/GCP)
- Ability to deliver in a agile environment.

About the Role:

We are seeking a highly organized and detail-oriented PMO Specialist to support the successful delivery of programs and projects within our organization. The ideal candidate will play a pivotal role in ensuring programs are set up for success, adhere to governance standards, and achieve their objectives.

Key Responsibilities:

Develop and support quality business cases, ensuring robust costs, benefits, schedules/milestones, scope, business impacts, and risk assessments.
Monitor and track business cases with ongoing cost and benefit forecasts, ensuring effective tracking mechanisms.
Embed appropriate project governance processes and ensure compliance with organizational standards (e.g., Westpac Transformation Delivery Standard and Policy).
Identify and escalate key risks and issues for assigned programs, including emerging and delivered risks.
Review programs to ensure they are set up for success and managed effectively to achieve objectives.
Provide recommendations on program management, including funding approvals and sequencing.
Identify and manage cross-program dependencies and resource contentions, escalating as necessary.
Regularly reassess program assumptions to confirm validity.
Deliver insights on quality and delivery issues identified through reviews and engagements.
Partner with project and business representatives to resolve risks and issues, escalating as required.
Review and guide program/project governance documentation and ensure adherence to document storage protocols.
Facilitate and lead working groups as required.

jobs.Skills_Required: SME, CSM, PSM
jobs.Job_Description:
Position Title: Scrum Master

Position Summary:
The Scrum Master will bring excellent knowledge of the scrum framework and its artifacts and
techniques. The Scrum Master will also need the ability to coordinate people and projects (occasionally facilitating changes) with a mindset on deliverables. They will need to be a strong communicator, a capable leader, and invested in Agile frameworks.

Essential Duties and Responsibilities:
The essential duties of the position include the following, and other duties may be assigned:
Represent the stakeholders and users in the AI/ML development team.
Define and communicate the product vision, goals, and roadmap to the development team, ensuring alignment with business objectives.
Collaborate with stakeholders to gather and analyse requirements and translate them into user stories and acceptance criteria.
Prioritize the product backlog based on business value, stakeholder needs, and development team capacity.
Work closely with the AI/ML development team to ensure a clear understanding of the requirements and provide guidance throughout the development process.
Facilitate sprint planning, backlog grooming, and daily stand-up meetings, ensuring that the team is focused and working efficiently.
Remove any impediments or obstacles that may hinder the team's progress, and escalate issues as needed.
Ensure the delivery of high-quality AI/ML products within the agreed-upon timelines and budget.
Collaborate with UX/UI designers and other stakeholders to ensure a seamless user experience and effective product design.
Monitor and track project progress, provide regular updates to stakeholders, and manage expectations regarding scope, timeline, and deliverables.
Conduct sprint reviews and retrospectives to gather feedback, identify areas of improvement, and drive continuous process optimization.
Stay up to date with AI/ML technologies, industry trends, and best practices in Agile development methodologies.
Qualifications:
To perform this job successfully, an individual must be able to perform each essential duty satisfactorily.
The requirements listed below are representative of the knowledge, skill, and/or ability required.
Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions.
Education/Experience:
Bachelor's degree in engineering is mandatory. Master's degree in computer science is a plus. Minimum of 5 years of experience as a Scrum Master, preferably in AI/ML or technology-related projects.
Proven experience in Agile project management methodologies, particularly Scrum, and a solid understanding of Agile principles and practices. Familiarity with AI/ML concepts, including machine learning, deep learning, data pre-processing, and model development.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to effectively collaborate with cross-functional teams and stakeholders at all levels of the organization. Strong leadership and facilitation skills, with the ability to guide and motivate a development team to achieve project goals. Proficiency in Agile project management tools for backlog management and project tracking.
Advanced skills in JIRA, with demonstrated automation, QA and release notes. Demonstrated ability to prioritize tasks, manage multiple projects simultaneously, and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment. Strong problem-solving and analytical skills, with a proactive and solution-oriented mindset. Understanding of user-centred design principles and the ability to advocate for a positive user experience.
Language Ability:
Ability to read and comprehend instructions, correspondence, and memos. Ability to write moderately complex correspondence. Ability to effectively converse and present information in one-on-one and small group situations to customers, clients, and other employees of the organization.
Math Ability:
Ability to analyze and interpret data to track team performance metrics such as velocity, burn-down charts, and cumulative flow diagrams. Proficiency in basic arithmetic for calculating sprint progress, story points, and resource allocation. Strong problem-solving skills to identify and resolve issues related to team performance and project timelines. Basic understanding of statistical concepts to analyze team performance trends and forecast future sprints.
Reasoning Ability:
Ability to solve practical problems and deal with a variety of concrete variables in situations where only limited standardization exists. Ability to interpret feedback from non-skilled technical system users to uncover the source of problems and persistence to efficiently provide solutions. Extreme attention to detail is required to ensure proper documentation of facts. Ability to adapt well in the face of workplace stressors such as customer service complaints, maintaining the security of data, competing priorities of high significance to the successful function of the department.
Computer Skills:
A significant comfort level in using accounting software and a variety of computer software programs such as Microsoft Office products, web browsers, and CRM tools.
Certificates and Licenses:
Certified ScrumMaster (CSM) or Professional Scrum Master (PSM) certification preferred.
Work Environment:
The work environment characteristics described here are representative of those an employee
encounters while performing the essential functions of this job in an office environment. Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions.
A typical, climate-controlled office environment exists. The worker is not substantially exposed to adverse environmental conditions.
Management Expectations:
Demonstrate Expertise: Serve as the foremost Subject Matter Expert (SME) within the department, possessing extensive knowledge and proficiency in the relevant field.
Lead Team Effectively: Direct and supervise a team of employees, providing training, guidance, and support to ensure the team achieves departmental objectives. Lead and guide the team while fostering a positive and productive work environment.
Manage Operations Efficiently: Oversee day-to-day operations and workflow, including prioritizing tasks, resolving escalations, allocating resources, managing time and attendance, overseeing payroll, and facilitating departmental onboarding and training.
Evaluate Performance Regularly: Monitor and assess team performance on a regular basis, offering constructive feedback, coaching, and conducting performance reviews to drive continuous improvement. Set clear goals and establish performance metrics to measure success.
Collaborate Strategically: Collaborate with senior management and cross- functional teams to develop and implement strategies, policies, and initiatives that contribute to organizational growth and success.
Ensure Effective People Management: Execute consistent and effective practices in recruiting, onboarding, professional development, succession planning, performance management, and retention.
Promote Positive Work Environment: Cultivate a positive work environment by fostering collaboration, communication, and teamwork among team members. Address departmental issues, resolve urgent matters, and lead efforts in conflict resolutions.
ISM and Privacy Statement:
Data Handling in Product Development: Ensure that products are developed with privacy by design, incorporating necessary data protections from the beginning. Data Minimization: Limit data collection to what is necessary for product functionality and ensure proper anonymization or pseudonymization of personal data where possible.
Privacy Risk Management: Conduct risk assessments related to data privacy and security for new product features or business solutions.

jobs.Job_Description:
Agile Project Manager
Position: Agile Project Manager
Experience Required: 6+ years
Overview:
We are seeking a highly skilled Agile Project Manager to lead and facilitate agile teams in delivering innovative software solutions. The ideal candidate will be an expert in Scrum practices, sprint planning, and implementing agile frameworks to drive efficient, high-quality project delivery. This role requires strong leadership, communication, and problem-solving skills to align team efforts with organizational goals.
Key Responsibilities:
Agile Software Development:
Lead and manage agile software development teams to deliver high-quality projects on time.
Promote agile best practices across the team to ensure continuous improvement and delivery.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to align project goals with business objectives.
Scrum Management:
Act as a Scrum Master, facilitating Scrum ceremonies such as daily stand-ups, sprint reviews, retrospectives, and backlog refinement.
Ensure that the Scrum process is followed and resolve any impediments faced by the team.
Foster a collaborative team environment, ensuring effective communication and accountability.
Sprint Planning:
Oversee sprint planning sessions, defining sprint goals and priorities.
Work closely with product owners to ensure a well-groomed and prioritized product backlog.
Track and report sprint progress, ensuring timely delivery of deliverables
Agile Frameworks Implementation:
Implement and adapt agile frameworks such as Scrum, Kanban, or Safe based on project requirements.
Provide coaching and guidance to team members on agile methodologies and principles.
Continuously refine and improve agile practices to enhance team performance.
Collaboration and Communication:
Serve as the primary point of contact between stakeholders and the development team.
Facilitate transparent communication, ensuring stakeholders are informed of progress and risks.
Resolve conflicts and foster a culture of open dialogue and problem-solving.
Qualifications and Skills:
Bachelors degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
6+ years of experience in agile software development and project management.
Certified Scrum Master (CSM) or equivalent certification is highly desirable.
Proficiency in agile tools such as JIRA, Trello, or Azure DevOps.
Strong understanding of Scrum, Kanban, and other agile frameworks.
Excellent organizational, leadership, and problem-solving skills.
Exceptional communication and interpersonal skills.
